src: "Hayu urang mimitian sareng penjelasan rencana Italia. Itali utamana ""adi"" ti Jérman sareng Jepang. Eta gaduh pasukan anu langkung lemah sarta angkatan laut anu langkung lemah, sanaos maranehanana cik keneh ngawangun opat kapal anyar pas sateuacan mimiti perang. Tujuan Itali anu utama nyaéta nagara-nagara Afrika. Pikeun nalukkeun nagara-nagara ieu, aranjeunna kedah ngagaduhan tapak peluncuran pasukan supados pasukan tiasa ngaliwat Laut Tengah sareng nyerang Afrika. Pikeun éta, aranjeunna kedah nyingkirkeun markas sareng kapal Inggris di Mesir. Salain tindakan éta, kapal perang Itali henteu kudu ngalakukeun anu lain. Ayeuna Jepang. Jepang nyaeta nagara pulau, sami sapertos Inggris."
mt: "Let us begin with the Italian plan. Italy is mainly "against" Germany and Japan. They have weaker armies and weaker navies, but they are building four new ships before the war begins. Their main goal is to conquer African countries. To do this, they must have bases from which troops can cross the Mediterranean and attack Africa. To do this, they must remove the British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides this action, Italian warships must not do anything else. Now Japan. Japan is an island country, just like England."
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "Pendaratan D-Day jeung pertempuran nu lain téh berhasil ngabebaskeun Prancis bagéan kalér, tapi bagéan kidul na mah acan. Diparéntah ku Perancis ""Vichy"". Aranjeunna mangrupikeun jalma Perancis anu parantos damai jeung Jerman dina 1940 sareng damel bareng penjajah tinimbang tarung aranjeunna. Di kaping 15 Agustus 1940, Sekutu narajang Perancis kidul, serangan éta disebat ""Operasi Dragoon"". Dina ngan dua minggu urang Amérika sareng pasukan Pembebasan Perancis ngabebaskeun Perancis kidul teras aranjeunna wangsul ka Jérman."
mt: "D-Day landings and battles were successful in liberating northern France, but the south was still occupied. It was ruled by the French "Vichy". They were French people who wanted peace with Germany in 1940 and collaborated with the occupiers rather than fight them. On August 15, 1940, the Allies attacked southern France, that operation was called "Operation Dragoon". In just two weeks, American and French Liberation troops liberated southern France and then they returned to Germany."
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: Kapal selam nyaéta kapal anu didamel pikeun ngalalana di jero cai, sareng tetep cicing di jero cai sababaraha waktu. Kapal selam dianggo di jaman Perang Dunia kahiji sareng Perang Dunia kadua. kapungkur, kapal sela laun pisan sareng jarak nembak na anu terbatas. Dina awal perang, aranjeunna seuseueurna ngumbara di luhur laut, tapi nalika radar mulai berkembang sareng janten langkung akurat kapal selam kapaksa lebet kana cai supados teu katingali. Kapal selam Jérman disebat U-Boats. Jérman pinter pisan dina ngarahkeun sarta ngoperasikeun kapal selamna. Kusabab kasuksésanna nganggo kapal selam, saenggeus perang urang Jerman henteu dipercaya keur seueur gaduh nukitu.
mt: A submarine is a ship that floats under water, and stays under water for some time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Recently, submarines and their range of attack are limited. At the beginning of the war, they were used to roam the seas, but when radar began to develop and became more accurate, submarines had to go under water so they could not be seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. Germany was very good at directing and operating its submarines. Because of its success with submarines, after the war, Germany was not trusted to have nuclear weapons.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Kaping 17 Séptémber 1939, pertahanan Polandia geus ancur. Hiji-hijina harepan nyaéta mundur sareng ngatur deui pertahanan di sasak Roman. Nanging, rencana ieu janten luntur sapeupeuting, nalika leuwih ti 800.000 prajurit ti Prajurit Beureum Uni Sovièt asup jeung nyiptakeun barisan Bélarus sareng Ukraina saatos nyerang Polandia bagian wétan anu ngalanggar Perjangjian Damai Riga, Pakta Non-Agregasi Soviét-Polandia sareng perjangjian internasional anu sanésna, bilateral sareng multilateral.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defense was crushed. The only hope was to retreat and reorganize the defense on the line of the River Vistula. However, this plan was dashed in the evening, when more than 800,000 Red Army soldiers crossed the border and created the Belarusian and Ukrainian fronts after attacking the eastern part of Poland, violating the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact and other bilateral and multilateral international treaties.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Perkara henteu saé kanggo urang Italia di Afrika Kalér ti mimiti ogé. Dina waktu saminggu saeunggeus Italia nyatakeun perang kaping 10 Juni 1940, pihak 11 Hussars Inggris parantos nguasai Bénténg Capuzzo di Libya. Dina serangan wétan Bardia, Inggris nangkap Kapala Angkatan Darat Italia, Jeneral Lastucci. Dina 28 Juni, Marsekal Italo Balbo, Gubernur Jendral Libya sareng ahli warisna Mussolini, tiwas ku témbakan babaturan sorangan nalika mendarat di Tobruk.
mt: It's not good news for Italy in North Africa from the start. On June 10, 1940, the 11th Hussars of Britain took Capuzzo Fort in Libya. In the western attack on Bardia, the British captured the Italian Army Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, Governor General of Libya and Mussolini's heir, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Buddhist Tibét dumasar kana ajaran agama Buddha, tapi ditambihan ku jalan cinta Mahayana sareng ku seueur téhnik ti Yoga India. Dina prinsipna, aliran Buddha Tibet téh sederhana pisan. Éta isina Kundalini Yoga, tapa, sareng jalan cinta anu ngarangkul sadayana. Jeung Kundalini Yoga, energi Kundalini (energi pencerahan) dijieun ngalangkungan gerakan yoga, latihan nafas, mantra jeung visualisasi. Pusat tapa Tibét nyaéta Yoga Dewa. Ngaliwatan visualisasi rupa-rupa déwa, saluran énérgi diberesihan, cakra diaktipkeun sareng kasadaran pencerahan diciptakeun.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of the Buddha, but supplemented by the Mahayana path and by many techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It is Kundalini Yoga, tapas, and the path of love that embraces all. Like Kundalini Yoga, Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is created by yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan tapas is Yoga of the Gods. Through visualizations of various deities, energy channels are cleansed, chakras are activated and consciousness of enlightenment is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Program ieu dimulai tabuh 8:30 wengi waktu sakitar (15.00 UTC) Penyanyi kakoncara ti sakumna nagara nawiskeun bhajans, atanapi lagu pamujaan, dina sukuna Shri Shyam. Panyanyi Sanju Sharma nu muka acara sonten éta, diteraskeun ku Jai Shankar Choudhary. Midangkan chhappan bhog bhajan ogé. Panyanyi, Raju Khandelwal ogé ngabaturan anjeunna. Teras, Lakkha Singh nu mimpin nyanyi bhajans. 108 piring Chhappan Bhog (dina kaparcayaan Hindu, 56 kadaharan nu beda-beda sapertos kue, buah, kacang-kacangan, piring jeung lainna anu nawarkeun pola daang) disajikeun kanggo Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh oge nampilkeun chhappan bhog bhajan. Panyanyi, Raju Khandelwal oge ngabarengan manehna.
mt: The program began at 8:30 am local time (15.00 UTC) Singers from all over the country sang bhajans, or devotional songs, in praise of Shri Shyam. Singer Sanju Sharma, who was the emcee, was followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. Midangkan chhappan bhog bhajan also. Singer Raju Khandelwal also joined him. Then, Lakkha Singh led the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hindu belief, 56 different dishes such as cakes, fruits, nuts, plates and others that offer a pattern of daang) were offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh also performed chhappan bhog bhajan. Singer Raju Khandelwal also joined him.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "Parayaan ieu dimimitian ku pagelaran khusus ku grup terkenal sadunya Cirque du Soleil. Teras disusul ku Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, hiji band Janissary, sareng panyanyi Fatih Erkoç sareng Müslüm Gürses. Teras Whirling Dervishes naék ka panggung. Diva Turki, Sezen Aksu, maju nyanyi jeung penyanyi ténor Italia, Alessandro Safina, jeung penyanyi Yunani, Haris Alexiou. Dina panutupanna, grup tari Turki Seuneu tina Anatolia nampilkeun penampilan ""Troy""."
mt: "The festival was opened by a special performance by the world-famous Cirque du Soleil. This was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Whirling Dervishes then took the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. The festival ended with a performance by the Turkish dance group Seuneu from Anatolia performing ""Troy""."
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "Panumpang dipasihan cai bari nungguan dina suhu 90 darajat (F). Kaptén petugas pemadam kebakaran Scott Kouns nyarios, ""Dinten éta teh dinten anu panas di Santa Clara sareng suhuna ogé 90an. di sabaraha lila wwaktos urang kajebak di roller coaster tangtu teu ngeunah, kanggo saeutikna, sarta peryogi sahenteuna sa jam kanggo hiji jelema mereskeun puteran."
mt: "Passengers were given water while waiting in 90 degree (F) heat. Captain Scott Kouns of the fire department said, "That day was a hot day in Santa Clara and the temperature was also in the 90s. for a few hours we were stuck on a roller coaster that didn't work, at least for a little while, and a prayer was said for one hour for a person to recover from a seizure."
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Ceuk kalawarta anu paling anyar, pamacaan kadar cai laut ngabejaan aya tsunami. Aya sababaraha aktivitas tsunami leutik karekam di caket Pago Pago sareng Niue. Teu aya karuksakan atawa cilaka anu gede dilaporkeun di Tonga, tapi listrik sementara teu aya, nu dilaporkeun jadi sabab aparat Tonga teu tiasa narima peringatan tsunami anu diterbitkeun ku PTWC. Opat belas sakola di Hawaii anu aya di atanapi caket garis pantai ditutup dinten Rebo sanaos peringatanna tos dicabut.
mt: According to the latest reports, the tsunami warning was canceled. There were several small tsunami events recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. There were no major damage or casualties reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily out, reported as the reason Tonga officials were unable to receive the tsunami warning issued by PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii near or on the coast were closed on Thursday after the warning was issued.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Jonny Reid, pendamping sopir tim A1GP New Zealand, dinten ieu nyiptakeun sajarah nalika nyupiran panggancangna di Jambatan Palabuan Auckland anu kolotna 48 taun, Selandia Baru, sacara sah. Mr. Reid junun numpakan mobil A1gp Selandia Anyar, Black Beauty kalawan kecepatan langkung ti 160 km/jam tujuh kali ngaléwatan jembatan. Pulisi Selandia Anyar kasulitan ngagunakeun radar kacepetan pikeun ningali kacepetan pak Reid nyetir sabab mobil Black Beauty-na rendah pisan, jeung hiji-hijina waktos pulisi tiasa ngukur kacepetan pak Reid nyaéta pas anjeunna ngalambatkeun ka 160km/jam.
mt: On Monday, New Zealand A1GP driver Johnny Reid made history by driving his A1GP New Zealand, Black Beauty, over the Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, at a speed of 160 km/h seven times. New Zealand police had difficulty using speed radar to measure Reid's speed because his Black Beauty was so low to the ground, and the only time police could measure Reid's speed was when he slowed down to 160 km/h.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Gempa sedeng ngoyagkeun wilayah Montana kulon tabuh 10:08 peuting dinten senén. Teu aya laporan karusakan langsung nu ditarima Amerika Serikat Geological Survey (USGS) sareng Pusat Informasi Gempa Nasionalna. Lini eta asalna ti 20 km (15 mil) palebah kaler - kaler wetan Dillon, jeung sakitar 65 km (40 mil) kidul Butte.
mt: A minor earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 pm local time on Monday.  No immediate damage reports were received by the United States Geological Survey and its National Earthquake Information Center.  The quake was centered 20 km (15 miles) west-northwest of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Penjara Abu Ghraib di Irak diduruk nalika karusuhan. Panjara ieu janten kasohor awon saatos kapanggihna panyiksaan tahanan di ditu saatos pasukan Amerika Serikat nyandak alih.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was destroyed during the riot. This prison became notorious after the discovery of prisoner abuse there after the U.S. military took control.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: band ngabatalkeun acara di Maui's War Memorial Stadium, anu sakirana bakal didatangan ku 9,000 jelema, sareng menta hampura ka penggemar na Perusahaan manajemen band, HK Managament Inc., teu masihan terang naha ngabatalkeun pas kaping 20 Séptémber, tapi nyalahkeun alesan logistik isukanna.
mt: The band cancelled its concert at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was expected to be attended by 9,000 people, and blamed the cancellation on logistical issues, but refused to elaborate on why it was cancelled on September 20, but blamed logistical issues.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Dilaporkeun penjarahan eta teh makin ngaluas jeung berlanjut tadi wengi, kusabab teu aya hiji pun aparat di jalan Bishkek. Bishkek digambarkeun titeuleum ka kaayaan ""anarki"" ku salah sahiji pengamat, nalika gerombolan turun ka jalan teras ngajarah toko-toko nu jual barang-barang nu tiasa dikonsumsi. Sabagian wargi Bishkek nyalahkeun pendemo ti kidul kusabab ngalanggar hukum."
mt: "Local reports say the protests are spreading and continuing overnight, because there are no police on the streets of Bishkek. Bishkek is described as being in a state of "anarchy" by one observer, as a mob descended on the streets and looted shops selling consumable goods. A large part of the Bishkek population is angry at the protesters from the south because they are breaking the law."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Sateuacanna, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, nyarios yén perusahaanna dimimitian nalika bel pantona téh teu tiasa kadangu ti tokona dina garasina. Anjeunna ngawangun bél panto anu nyambung ka WiFi, ceunah mah. Siminoff ngomong penjualan meningkat sanggeus penampilanna di 2013 di episode Shark Tank di manten panel pintonan nampik ngadanaan startup. Dina ahir 2017, Siminoff téh muncul dina saluran balanja tipi QVC. Ring ogé mereskeun gugatan hukum sareng perusahaan keamanan saingan, ADT Corporation.
mt: Previously, Ring CEO Jamie Siminoff said his company was started when he couldn't find a doorbell that worked on Wi-Fi. Siminoff designed a doorbell that connected to Wi-Fi, but didn't work. Siminoff said sales increased after his appearance on Shark Tank in 2013, when the panel of investors rejected his startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the home shopping network QVC. Ring also faced legal action and a lawsuit from security rival ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "Acara PBS ngagaduhan langkung ti dua belasan panghargaan Emmy, sareng pagelaranna langkung pondok ti Sesame Street sareng Mister Rogers 'Neighborhood. Unggal épisode acara éta bakal ngapokuskeun kana téma dina buku tertentu sareng teras ngajalajah tema jadi sababaraha carita. Setiap acara ogé bakal nyadiakeun rékoméndasi buku keur budak nu kudu dipilari lamun datang ka perpustakaan. John Grant, ti WNED Buffalo (stasiun induk Reading Rainbow), nyarios ""Reading Rainbow ngajarkeun murangkalih naha kedah maca,... resep maca - [acara ieu] ngadorong murangkalih pikeun nyandak buku sareng maca."" Sababaraha urang percanten, katut John Grant, yén krisis dana sareng peralihan filosofi pendidikan program tipi nyumbang pikeun ngaréngsékeun séri ieu."
mt: "PBS has won more than two dozen Emmy awards, and its programs have included Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the program focuses on a particular book and then explores the book's theme through stories. Each episode also provides a book recommendation for children to take to the library. John Grant, of WNED Buffalo (the program's flagship station), said, "Reading Rainbow teaches children how to read,... the recipe for reading - [this program] encourages children to read and find books." Some people, including John Grant, believe that funding cuts and a shift in educational philosophy have made this series possible."
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Pajabat kota Amsterdam sareng Musium Anne Frank nyatakeun yén tangkal éta katepaan ku jamur sareng nimbulkeun bahaya kasehatan masyarakat sabab pikir tangkal éta dina bahaya murag. éta parantos di jadwalkeun di tuar dinten Salasa, tapi disimpen saatos kaputusan pangadilan darurat.
mt: City officials and the Anne Frank Museum announced that the tree was infested with fungus and posed a public health hazard because the tree was in danger of falling. It was scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after a last-minute court ruling.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: "Kelompok Pembebasan Satwa sareng Masyarakat Kerajaan keur Pencegahan Kekejaman terhadap Sato (RSPCA) nyarios deui bahwa wajib masang kaméra CCTV di kabéh tempat jagal di Australia. Kapala Inspektur RSPCA New South Wales Davic O'Shannessy ngawartoskeun ka ABC yén pangawasan sareng pamariksaan rumah potong kedah jadi biasa di Australia. CCTV pasti bakal ngirim sinyal anu kuat ka jalma anu damel sareng sato yén kasejahteraan anjeunna anu di prioritaskeun."""
mt: "The Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) group for Animal Liberation again said that all Australian abattoirs should be fitted with CCTV. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that monitoring and inspection of abattoirs should be routine in Australia. CCTV would send a strong signal to people and animals that their welfare is a priority."
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Berita di Red Lake ngabewarakeun yen dina dinten ieu, pas pamakaman kanggo Jeff Weise sareng tilu tina salapan korban nuju lumangsung, aya murid sejen anu ditewak polisi lantaran manehna berhubungan sareng kasus penembakan di sakola tanggal 21 Maret. Aparat teu seueur saur sacara resmi salian ti mastikeun prosés néwak dinten ieu. Nanging, narasumber anu apal penyelidikan éta masihan terang  ka Minneapolis Star-Tribune yén éta téh si Louis Jourdain, murangkalihna Kepala Suku Red Lake Tribal Floyd Jourdain anu umurna 16 taun. Teu apal ayeunamah tuduhan naon anu bakal dituduhkeun téh atanapi anu ngarahkeun aparat ka budak éta tapi prosés pendakwaan budak parantos dimulai di pengadilan pusat.
mt: Local news reports that on this day, as the funeral for Jeff Weise and eight of the nine victims was to take place, another student was taken into police custody for allegedly having some connection to the school shooting on March 21.  Authorities were not immediately available for comment other than to confirm that the process of removing the student from school was taking place.  However, a source close to the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that the student was Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain.  It is not yet known what charges, if any, will be brought against the boy or what led police to take him into custody, but the process of prosecuting juvenile offenders is taking place in federal court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Nu ngayakeun démo nyatakeun yén kira-kira 100,000 jalmi wedal di dayeuh-dayeuh di Jerman, contona Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, sareng Hanover. Di Berlin pulisi perkirakeun aya 6,500 demonstran. Protes oge kajadian di Paris, di Sofia, Bulgaria, di Vilnius, Lithuania, di Valette, Malta, di Tallin, Estonia, jeung di Edinburg oge Glasgow di Skotlandia. Di London, kira-kira 200 urang ngalakukeun protes diluar kantor pemegang hak cipta. Sasih tiheula, kajadian protes gede di Polandia keur nagara eta nandatanganan ACTA. Iyeu nyebabkeun pamarentah Polandia mutuskeun kanggo nunda ratifikasi. Latvia sareng Slovakia duanana nunda prosés gabung ACTA.
mt: 100,000 people protested in cities across Germany, including Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. Police estimated 6,500 demonstrators in Berlin. Protests also occurred in Paris, Sofia, Bulgaria, Vilnius, Lithuania, Valette, Malta, Tallin, Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside the copyright holder's office. Last month, large protests occurred in Poland for the country to sign the ACTA. This caused the Polish government to suspend the ratification process. Latvia and Slovakia both suspended the ACTA joining process.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Sakitar 60 kasus iPods anu kapanasan sareng teu hurung dilaporkeun, nyebabkeun total genep kaduruk teras nyebabkeun opat jalmi beunang luka kaduruk anu leutik. Menteri Ekonomi, Perdagangan, jeung Industry Jepang (METI) nyarios bahwa nyadar kana 27 insiden nu patali jeung parangkat eta. Minggon kamari, METI ngumumkeun Apple tos ngainpokeun tambahan insiden panas leleuwih, anu perusahaan nyebutkeunna ""teu serius"". Kementrian nanggepanna ku nyebutkeun penundaan laporan Apple téh ""bener-bener disesalkeun""."
mt: "About 60 cases of overheating and non-explosion iPods have been reported, causing a total of six injuries resulting in four minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade, and Industry (METI) said it was aware of 27 incidents involving the device. On Monday, METI announced Apple had failed to report additional incidents of overheating, which the company called "not serious." The ministry said Apple's delay in reporting the incidents was "very regrettable.""
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "CEO Apple Steve Jobs ngawanohkeun ieu perangkat sabari mapah naék kana panggung teras ngaluarkeun iPhone tina saku calana jins na. Dina 2 jam pidatona, anjeunna nyatakeun yén ""Ayeuna Apple badé nyiptakeun HP deui, urang bakal nyétak sajarah dinten ieu."""
mt: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled this device by pulling it out of his jacket pocket. In a two-hour presentation, he announced that ""Apple is now creating a computer again, we will make history today."""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Senator ayeuna sarta Ibu Nagara Argéntina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner ngumumkeun pencalonana minangka présidén kamari wengi di La Plata, hiji dayeuh 50 kilométer (31 mil) ti Buenos Aires. Ny. Kirchner ngumumkeun niatna pikeun nyalonkeun janten présidén di Téater Argéntina, lokasi anu sami pas anjeunna ngamimitian kampanye Sénat taun 2005 salaku anggota délégasi propinsi Buénos Airés.
mt: Senator now and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president late last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires. Ms. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Teatro Argentino, the same location where she began her Senate campaign in 2005 as a delegate from the province of Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: ACMA ogé mendakan bahwa sanajan pideo na diputer di Internet, Big Brother henteu ngalanggar hukum sénsor kontén daring sabab pideo na henteu disimpen dina halaman web Big Brother. UU penyiaran nyayogikeun régulasi pikeun konten internét, nanging anu disebat kontén internét téh nyaéta data anu sacara fisik aya dina sérver.
mt: ACMA also noted that although the video was uploaded to the Internet, Big Brother did not breach censorship laws because the video was not stored on the Big Brother website. The Broadcasting Act regulates content for the Internet, but what is referred to as Internet content is data that is physically stored on servers.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Peter Costello, bendahara na Australia jeung jelema anu paling mungkin ngagantikeun Perdana Menteri John Howard salaku pingpinan partai liberal, geus mere dukungan ka industri listrik tanaga nuklir di Australia. Mr Costello nyarios yén nalika pembangkit tanaga nuklir sacara ekonomi layak didamel, Australia kedah ngudag pamaksudanana. Upami éta janten komérsial, arurang kedah ngaduhan éta. Hartina, henteu aya bantahan ngeunaan énergi nuklir,"" saur Costello."
mt: "Peter Costello, Australia's treasurer and the most likely person to replace Prime Minister John Howard as leader of the Liberal Party, has expressed support for the nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that if nuclear power was economically viable, Australia should pursue it. If it was commercially viable, it should be pursued. In other words, there is no argument against nuclear power," Mr Costello said.
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Kalayan ngan aya dalapan belas medali nu di sayogikeun sapoéna, sababaraha nagara aya anu gagal menangkeun medali. Salah sahiji na nyaéta Walanda, ku Anna Jochemsen réngsé di urutan ka salapan dina katégori wanoja di Super-G kamari, disusul Finlandia anu diwakilan ku Katja Saarinen anu réngsé di urutan ka sapuluh dinu acara anu sami. Mitchell Gourley asal Australia ayana di urutan kasebelas dina men's standing Super-G. Sainganna, Oldrich Jelinek asal Ceko ayana di urutan kagenep belas dina men's standing Super-G Arly Velasquez ti Mexico pungkas di urutan kalima belas dina Super-G jang lalaki. Adam Hall ti Selandia Anyar pungkas di urutan kasalapan dina Super-G jang lalaki. Pemaén ski tunanétra lalaki Polandia Maciej Krezel sareng pemandu na Anna Ogarzynska réngsé diurutan katilu belas di Super-G. Jong Seork Park ti Korea Kidul aya diurutan ka dua puluh opat di katégori lalaki Super-G .
mt: With only eighteen medals awarded so far, some countries have failed to win any. One of these is the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing in 8th place in the women's standing Super-G, followed by Finland, represented by Katja Saarinen, who finished in 10th place in the same event. Mitchell Gourley of Australia finished in 11th place in the men's standing Super-G. The competition, Oldrich Jelinek of the Czech Republic finished in 19th place in the men's standing Super-G Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished in 15th place in the men's standing Super-G Adam Hall of New Zealand finished in 8th place in the men's standing Super-G. The Polish men's standing skier Maciej Krezel and his guide Anna Ogarzynska finished in 13th place in the Super-G. Jong Seork Park of South Korea finished in 24th place in the men's standing Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Sidang éta lumangsung di Pengadilan Birmingham Crown teras bérés kaping 3 Agustus. Pamawa wartos eta, anu ditewak di tempat, ngahindar panarajang sareng nyarios yen manehna nganggo tihang kanggo ngalindungan dirina sorangan tina botol-botol anu dialungkeun ka manehna ku nepi ka tilu puluh jelema. Blake ogé dinyatakeun salah kusabab nyoba ngarobah kaadilan. Hakim ngabéjaan Blake yén ""ampir heunteu tiasa dihindarkeun"" ajeunna badé dilebetkeun kana panjara."
mt: "The trial is due to take place at Birmingham Crown Court on 3 August. The defendant, who was remanded in custody, avoided sentencing and said he was using a shield to protect himself from bottles thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also found guilty of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake that he was ""almost impossible to avoid"" and would be sent to prison."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: "Sidang éta lumangsung di Pengadilan Birmingham Crown teras bérés kaping 3 Agustus. Pamawa wartos eta, anu ditewak di tempat, ngahindar panarajang sareng nyarios yen manehna nganggo tihang kanggo ngalindungan dirina sorangan tina botol-botol anu dialungkeun ka manehna ku nepi ka tilu puluh jelema. Blake ogé dinyatakeun salah kusabab nyoba ngarobah kaadilan. Hakim ngabéjaan Blake yén ""ampir heunteu tiasa dihindarkeun"" ajeunna badé dilebetkeun kana panjara."
mt: "The trial is due to take place at Birmingham Crown Court on 3 August. The defendant, who was remanded in custody, avoided sentencing and said he was using a shield to protect himself from bottles thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also found guilty of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake that he was ""almost impossible to avoid"" and would be sent to prison."
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Jejer sanés dina agenda di Bali kaasup nyalametkeun leuweung dunya anu masih keneh aya, sareng ngembangkeun téknologi pikeun ngabantosan nagara berkembang maju léwat cara nu kirang berpolusi. PBB ogé ngaharepkeun pikeun méréskeun dana pikeun ngabantosan nagara-nagara anu kapangaruhan ku pemanasan global pikeun ngatasi épékna. Acisna tiasa dianggo pikeun ngawangun imah tahan banjir, ngelola cai supados langkung sae, atanapi nyeeran tutuwuhan.
mt: Other items on the agenda in Bali include preserving the world's remaining forests, and developing technology to help developing countries advance in a non-polluting way. The UN also hopes to raise funds to help countries affected by global warming to adapt to its effects. The ice could be used to build flood-resistant homes, manage water supplies more efficiently, or to grow crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "Nigeria saacanna ngumumkeun yén bakal ngagabung jeung AfCFTA saminggu saacan konperensi. Komisioner dagang sarta industri AU Albert Muchanga nyabarkeun Benin badé ngagabung. Komisaris nyarios, ""Urang teu acan ragem ngeunaan aturan awal sareng konsési tarif, tapi kerangka anu dipimilik ku urang tos cekap pikeun ngamimitian dagang dina 1 Juli 2020""."
mt: "Nigeria previously announced it would join the AfCFTA one week before the conference. AU Trade and Industry Commissioner Albert Muchanga said Benin would join. The commissioner said, ""We don't have the details of the initial rules and tariff concessions, but the framework we have in place is robust enough to start trade on July 1, 2020."""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Anjeunna dipuji ku krititikus pas anjeunna keur di Atlanta sareng diaku ku élmu perkotaan anu inovatif. taun 2009, anjeunna dibere gelar Pangawas Nasional Taun ieu Basa pas panghargaan éta, sakola Atlanta tos ningal parkembangan dina nilei-nilei murid. Sajongjonan sanggeusna, Konstitusi-Jurnal Atlanta mempublikasikeun laporan anu nembongkeun masalah dina kénging tés. Laporan nunjukeun yén nilai ulangan téh ningkatna gancang, teras nuduh sakola atos apal masalah ieu tapi henteu bertindak nanaon dina panemuan éta. Buktos saatos éta nunjukkeun yén kertas ujian nu diruksak ku Hall, sareng 34 patugas pendidikan nu sanés, anu didakwa di taun 2013.
mt: He was praised by critics for his work in Atlanta and recognized by innovative urban scholars. In 2009, he was awarded the National Teacher of the Year award, Atlanta schools praised his development of students. Afterward, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report highlighting problems in standardized testing. The report showed that test scores were rising quickly, then showed that the school was aware of this problem but did not act on the finding. After that, the report showed that Hall, and 34 other educators, were charged in 2013.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Hiji bom ngajelegur di luar kantor gubernur jendral. 3 deui bom ngabeledag dekeut gedung pamarentah disajeroeun waktos 2 jam. Sababaraha laporan nyebutkeun anu resmi tewas nyaeta dalapan, jeung laporan resmi mastikeun bahwa sakitar 30 luka-luka, tapi jumlah nu benerna can kanyahoan.
mt: A bomb exploded outside the governor's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a two-hour period. Several reports say the official death toll is eight, and official reports confirm that about 30 were injured, but the actual number is unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: Jesus nalika yuswa 21 taun ngagabung ka Manchester City taun kamari dina Januari 2017 ti klub Brasil Palmeiras jang dibayaran saloba £27 juta. Ti saprak éta, pamaén Brazil ieu parantos tampil dina 53 partandingan pikeun klub dina sadaya kompetisi sareng parantos nyétak 24 gol.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has played in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: Hiji hostél rugrug di Mekah, kota suci umat Islam, tabuh 10 énjing waktos satempat. Bangunan iyeu nganampung sajumlah peziarah anu datang jang daratang ka kota suci di peuting haji. Sémah pamondokan seseueurna wargi Uni Émirat Arab. Korban anu maot sahenteuna 15, anu diperkirakeun bakal naék.
mt: A hostel in Mecca, a holy city for Muslims, crashed at 10 am local time. The building accommodated a number of pilgrims arriving by land to the holy city during the night of Hajj. The hotel was owned by the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is currently 15, with more expected.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: Eta satelit, anu dua-duana ngagaduhan beurat langkung ti 1.000 pon, sareng melaju dina jarak kirang langkung 17.500 mil perjam, tabrakan kana 491 mil diluhureun bumi. élmuwan nyarios yén ledakan anu disababkeun tabrakan éta gedé pisan. Aranjeunna keur usaha jang nangtukeun sakumaha gedé tabrakan éta sareng kumaha dunya bakal kapengaruh. Komando Strategis Amérika Serikat ti kantor Departemen Pertahanan AS nuju ngalacak ruruntuhan éta. Hasil analisis perencanaan éta bakal diposting di halaman situs publik.
mt: The two satellites, each weighing more than 1,000 pounds, and traveling at about 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion was huge. They are working to determine how big the collision was and how the world will be affected. The United States Strategic Command at the Department of Defense headquarters is tracking the debris. The results of the analysis will be posted on the public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Batten rengking dina ka-190 dina 2008 400 daftar jalmi pang beungharna Amerika kalayan diperkirakeun untung $2,3 milyar. Anjeunna lulus ti perguruan tinggi seni jeung sains Universitas Virginia taun 1950 jeung ogé salah sahiji pendonor utama keur institusi éta.
mt: 190th on the 2008 Forbes 400 list of richest Americans with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the University of Virginia's School of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and is also a major donor to that institution.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: "Gubernur California Arnold Schwarzenegger nandatanganan undang-undang  anu ngalarang icalan atawa nyewakeun video gim kekerasan ka budak leutik. RUU eta negeskeun yen video gim nu aya kekerasanna nu dijual di nagara bagéan California kudu ditandaan ""18"" jeung upami dijual ka budak alit bakal dihukum ku denda $1000 tiap nu ngalanggar."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires that violent video games sold in California be labeled ""18"" and if sold to minors will be fined $1000 per violation."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "Duvall, anu tos nikah sareng gaduh dua murangkalih nu tos ageung, henteu ninggalkeun kesan anu saé ka Miller, anu patali sareng carita éta. Waktos diménta koméntar, Miller nyarios ""Mike seueur nyarios keur sidang lumangsung... Abdi nuju siap-siap janten abdi heunteu ngadangukeun naon anu anjeunna omongkeun."""
mt: "Duvall, who was married and had two grown children, did not leave any immediate family to Miller, who was involved in the story. When asked for comment, Miller said ""Mike was very much involved in the trial... I was ready to see what he was talking about."""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper parantos satuju keur ngirimkeun 'Clean Air Act' na pamaréntah ka komite kabéh partai keur dipariksa, sateuacanna bacaan kadua, saatos 25 menit rapat dinten salasa jeung ketua NDP Jack Layton di PMO. Layton atos nyuhungkeun parobahan dina RUU lingkungan konsérvatif salami pasamoan kalawan PM, nyuhungkeun opiken ""ditulis ulang sadayana teras lengkep"" tina RUU lingkungan partai Konservatif. Saprak Pamarentah Federal turun tangan kanggo nyokot alih ngadanaan Rumah Sakit Mersey di Devonport, Tasmania, pamarentah nagara haturan sarta sababaraha anggota parlemen federal atos wagel tindakan ieu minangka aksi dina bubuka pemilu federal anu bade disauran dina sasih Nopember. Tapi Perdana Mentri John Howard nyarios  lamun tindakan éta téh ngan saukur keur ngalindungi pasilitas rumah sakit anu diturunkeun ku pamaréntah Tasmania, ku masihan tambahan 45 juta dollar Australia."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper is expected to agree to send the 'Clean Air Act' to all-party committee for review, after 25 minutes of meeting on Tuesday with NDP leader Jack Layton at PMO. Layton agreed to rewrite the Conservative Party's environmental bill, after meeting with PM, agreeing to ""rewrite the whole thing"" from the Conservative Party's environmental bill. Since the Federal Government took over the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the Tasmanian government and several federal parliamentarians have been paid to take this action as a pre-election move to be held in November. But Prime Minister John Howard said that this action is only to protect the hospital facilities that were taken over by the Tasmanian government, by providing an additional 45 million Australian dollars."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Asam sianurat sareng melamin dipanggihan dina sampel urin sato peliharaan nu geus paéh saenggeus ngonsumsi kadaharan sato nu terkontaminasi. Kadua sanyawa saling ngabentuk kristal anu tiasa ngaruksak pungsi ginjal, ceuk panaliti di salah sahiji kampus. Panalungtik ningali kumaha kristal kabentuk dina cikiih ucing ku nambahkeun melamin jeung asam cyanuric. Komposisi tina kristal-kristal ieu teh cocok jeung komposisi anu dipendakan dina cikiih piaraan anu kapangaruhan pas dibandingkeun nganggo spektroskopi infra merah (FTIR).
mt: Cyanuric acid and melamine were found in the urine of dead pets that had consumed contaminated pet food. The two substances form crystals that can damage the kidneys, researchers at one university found. The researchers saw how crystals form in the urine of affected pets by adding melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches the composition of crystals found in the urine of affected pets when compared with infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua ngalaporkeun yen panyidik pamarentah mendak 2 perekam pangapungan 'kotak hideung' dina dinten Rebo. Sobat-sobat pegulatna ogé masihan panghormatan kanggo Luna. Tommy Dreamer nyarios ""Luna nyaeta Ratu kahiji anu ekstrim. Bos kahiji kuring. Luna ngantunkeun dina wengi dua bulan. Unik sapertos anjeunna. Awéwé anu kuat."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels ngoméntaran yén ""Luna mangrupikeun anéh sami salaku kuring ... sigana deui anu langkung ... mikanyaah anjeunna sareng bakal sono pisan ... mugia anjeun aya di tempat anu langkung saé."""
mt: "Xinhua reports that police seized two floating black boxes on Thursday. Wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first extreme queen. My first boss. Luna brought it in the dark two months. Unique as she is. A strong girl."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was a strange as me... more... watching her and will be so... she's there in a better place... she's gone now.""
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Sanaos tilu urang aya di jero bumi pas mobil na nabrak, teu aya anu cidera. Tapi, supir ngalaman tatu parah dina sirahna. Jalan di mana aya kacilakaan ditutup samentara jeung layanan darurat ngabébaskeun supir ti mobil Audi TT beureum. Anjeunna mimitina dirawat di Rumah Sakit James Paget di Yarmouth Raya. Anjeunna teras dialihkeun ka Rumah Sakit Addenbrooke di Cambridge.
mt: Three people were inside the car when it crashed, but no one was injured. However, the driver suffered a serious head injury. The road where the accident occurred was closed temporarily and emergency services freed the driver from his red Audi TT. He was initially treated at the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was then transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Pertandingan mulai tabuh 10:00 enjing di cuaca anu caang saatos gerimis sakeudap enjing-enjingna, ieu mangrupikeun dinten anu pas pikeun 7 Rugbi. Bibit luhur dina turnamén Afrika Kidul dimimitian dina catetan katuhu nalika aranjeunna meunang gampang 26 - 00 ngalawan bibit ka 5 Zambia. Katempo jelas kualitas na nurun dina pertandingan ngalawan dulur-dulur na ti kidul, Afrika Kidul teras-terasan ningkat nalika turnamen lumangsung. Partahanan disiplin manehna, kaahlian pangendalian bal sareng kerja sama tim anu sae midamel manehna menonjol sareng jelas yen ieu tim anu kudu dielehkeun.
mt: The match started at 10:00 am in overcast weather after a night of rain, this is the day for 7 Rugby. The higher seeds in the South African tournament began with a record 26 - 00 easy win against the 5th seeds Zambia. The quality of the team was clearly reduced in the match against their southern brothers, South Africa has risen steadily during the tournament. The discipline of their defense, ball handling skills and teamwork was highlighted and it was obvious that this team should be eliminated.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Salama 3 abad kapungkur, sanaos tetep janten nagara komunis, Tiongkok tiasa ngembangkeun pasar ékonomi. Kamajuan ekonomi anu mimiti ajeg dihandap kapamingpinan Deng Xiaoping. Ti saprak eta, ekonomi Tiongkok jadi tumbuh 90 kali lipat. Pikeun kahiji kalina, taun kamari Cina ngékspor mobil langkung seueur ti Jerman sareng ngelehkeun Amérika Serikat salaku pasar panggedéna pikeun industri ieu. Angka PDB Tiongkok leuwih gedé dibandingkeun Amérika Serikat dina dua dekade terahir.
mt: For over three centuries, while remaining a communist state, China has developed its economy. The initial economic growth was under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economy has grown 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the largest market for this industry. China's GDP is greater than that of the United States in the last two decades.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: "Kami bakal milarian cara ngirangan émisi karbon dioksida per unit GDP ku margin anu signifikan di 2020 ti tingkat 2005,"" saur Hu. Anjeunna henteu netepkeun angka pikeun pemotongan éta, nyarios bahwa éta bade didamel dumasar tina hasil ekonomi Tiongkok. Hu ngadesek nagara-nagara berkembang ""pikeun nyingkahan jalan pencemaran udara anu lami sareng ngabersihan engkéna."" Anjeunna nambahan bahwasana ""aranjeunna henteu kedah ditaros nyandak kawajiban saluareun tahap kamekaran, tanggung jawab sareng kamampuan aranjeunna."""
mt: "We will reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin in 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said. He did not specify the reduction target, saying it would be made based on China's economic growth. Hu urged developing countries to "avoid the long detour of air pollution and clean up later." He added that "we should not be shackled by the constraints of past development, responsibility and ability."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Badan amal medis Mangola, Medecines Sans Frotieres sareng Organisasi Kasehatan Dunya nyatakeun yén éta mangrupikeun wabah paling parah anu kacatet di nagara éta. Juru carios Medecine Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman nyarios: ""Angola téh nuju nyanghareupan badai parah jeung kaayaanna masih parah pisan,"" saur anjeunna."
mt: "Medical charity Medecines Sans Frontiere and the World Health Organization have said the outbreak is the worst ever recorded in the country. Medecine Sans Frontiere spokesman Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is facing a terrible storm and it is still very bad,"" he said."
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Direktur Penuntutan Publik Kier Starmer QC, masihan pernyataan enjing ieu ngumumkeun panuntutan Huhne jeung Pryce. Huhne tos ngundurkeun diri jeung anjeunna bakal digantos di Kabinet ku Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP diharapkeun keur ngajabat Menteri Bisnis nu ditinggalkeun Davey. Huhne sareng Pryce kedah dongkap ka Paradilan Westminster Magistrates tanggal 16 Febuari.
mt: Director of Public Prosecutions Keir Starmer QC, issued a statement this morning announcing the charges against Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has since resigned and will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take over the vacant Business Secretary post. Huhne and Pryce are due to appear at Westminster Magistrates Court on 16 February.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "Caritana dimawakeun dina opera Perancis ku Camille Saint-Saens ngeunaan hiji seniman ""anu hirupna diatur ku kacintaan anjeunna kana obat-obatan jeung Jepang."" Hasilna, para pamaén ngisep ganja di luhur panggung, sareng téater éta ngadorong penonton ekeur miluan ogé."
mt: "The story is set in a French opera by Camille Saint-Saens about a musician ""whose life is directed by his love for drugs and Japan."" The result is that the players smoke marijuana on stage, and the theater drives the audience into a frenzy as well."
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "Leonov, katelah ogé salaku ""kosmonot No. 11"", nyaéta bagian tina tim kosmonot Soviét anu mimiti. dina tanggal 18 Maret taun 1965, manehna ngamimitian ngalakukeun manned extravehicular activity (EVA) nayeta ""leumpang di luar angkasa"", nyesakeun manehna sorangan diluar kapal ngaleuwihan dua belas menit. Anjeunna nampi ""Pahlawan Uni Soviet"", Panghormatan anu pangluhurna ti Uni Soviet, pikeun karyana. 10 taun kapengker, anjeunna mingpin bagian Soviet tina misi Apollo-Soyuz, anu ngalambangkeun yén balap ruang angkasa parantos réngsé."
mt: "Leonov, also known as "Cosmonaut No. 11", was a member of the Soviet crew that first performed a manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or "spacewalk", on March 18, 1965, when he spent 12 minutes outside the spacecraft. He was awarded the title of Hero of the Soviet Union, the highest honor of the Soviet Union, for his achievement. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz Test Project, which symbolized the end of the space race."
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "Saatos kacilakaan kajantenan, Gibson dicandak ka rumah sakit nanging ngantunkeun teu lami saatosna. Supir truk eta, anu umurna 64 taun, heunteu ngalaman raheut tina kacilakaan eta. Kandaraan anu terlibat parantos dipindahkeun ti tempat kajadian cilaka kira-kira tabuh 12:00 GMT dinten éta kénéh. Batur anu damel di garasi caket tempat kacilakaan kajantenan nyarios: 'Aya murangkalih ngantosan nyebrang jalan sareng aranjeunna sadaya téh ngajerit sareng ceurik."" Manehna kabeh lalumpat dimana kacalakaan eta kajadian."
mt: "After the accident was secured, Gibson was taken to the hospital but did not last long after that. The truck driver, who was 64 years old, was not injured in the accident. The vehicles involved were moved from the scene of the accident about noon GMT on that day. A witness at the garage where the accident occurred said: 'There were two people crossing the road and they all ran and screamed and cried.'" All of them scattered where the accident occurred.
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Padamelan nu rengse seuseueurna teori hungkul, tapi programna didamel pikeun simulasi panalitian anu dilakukeun ka galaksi Sagitarius. Éfék anu di téangan ku tim bakal disababkeun ku gaya pasang surut antara materi gelapna galaksi éta jeung materi gelapna Bima Sakti. Siga bulan anu ngerahkeun gaya tarik ka bumi, nyebabkeun pasang surut, kitu oge Bima Sakti ngerahkeun gaya ka galaksi Sagitarius. Para élmuwan tiasa nyimpulkeun yén materi gelap méré pangaruh ka materi gelap nu lianna nganggo cara anu sami sapertos matéri biasa. Teori ieu nyebutkeun yén seueurna matéri poék disakitaran galaksi téh aya disakitaran hiji galaksi dina bentuk buletan cahaya, teras kadamel tina seueur partikel leutik.
mt: The team's calculations were based on a theory that predicts the effect of dark matter in the Sagittarius galaxy, which is being pulled by the Milky Way's dark matter. Like the moon's gravity pulls the Earth, the Milky Way's gravity pulls the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists can infer that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as normal matter. The theory predicts that the dark matter in the galaxy is in the form of a spherical cloud of tiny particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: "Debat éta dipicu ku kontrovérsi kusabab kaleuleuwihan dina pamakéan biaya keur bantosan jeung rékonstruksi saatos Badai Katrina; anu sababaraha jalmi konsérvatif fiskal téh nyebatkeunna ""Kasepakatan Bush di New Orleans"". Kritik liberal dina upaya rékonstruksi atos mokuskeun dina masihan kontrak rékonstruksi pikeun warga lokal Washington anu diaku."
mt: "The debate was sparked by controversy over the cost of aid and reconstruction after Hurricane Katrina; some fiscal conservatives have criticized the "Bush deal in New Orleans." Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort focuses on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to local Washington residents."
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: "Debat éta dipicu ku kontrovérsi kusabab kaleuleuwihan dina pamakéan biaya keur bantosan jeung rékonstruksi saatos Badai Katrina; anu sababaraha jalmi konsérvatif fiskal téh nyebatkeunna ""Kasepakatan Bush di New Orleans"". Kritik liberal dina upaya rékonstruksi atos mokuskeun dina masihan kontrak rékonstruksi pikeun warga lokal Washington anu diaku."
mt: "The debate was sparked by controversy over the cost of aid and reconstruction after Hurricane Katrina; some fiscal conservatives have criticized the "Bush deal in New Orleans." Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort focuses on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to local Washington residents."
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: "ngeke jam 5 isuk-isuk (waktos wetan) pas kapsul eta nepi ka bumi jeung asup ka atmosfir, kapsul eta teh bakal nyieun cacaangan nu tiasa ditingali ku urang-urang di Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, sareng Utah. Kapsulna bakal katingalina siga bentang murag anu ngaliwatan langit. Kapsulna bakal ngumbara sakitar 12,8 kilometer atawa 8 mil per detik, lumayan gancang waktos nu dibutuhkeun angkat ti San Francisco ka Los Angeles ngan salami samenit. Stardust bakal mecahkeun rékor salamina nu anyar janten kapal angkasa panggancangna anu balik ka Bumi, ngelehkeun rekor sateuacana sasih Mei taun 1969 nalika balikna modul parintah Apollo X. Ieu teh bakal ngalangkungan pantai kulon di kaler California jeung bakal nyaangan langit ti California dugi ka Oregon tengah teras dugi ka Nevada sareng Idaho sareng Utah,"" saur Tom Duxbury, manajer proyek Stardust."
mt: "At 5 a.m. (PDT) as the capsule entered the atmosphere and began its descent, the Stardust capsule will be visible to people in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will appear as a bright streak across the sky. The capsule will travel about 12.8 kilometers (8 miles) per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in about 30 minutes. Stardust will break the record for the fastest return from space to Earth, eclipsing the record set in May 1969 by the Apollo X command module. It will fly along the West Coast of California and will be visible from California to Oregon, then to Nevada and Idaho and Utah," said Tom Duxbury, Stardust project manager.
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Hiji dokter anu damel di Rumah Sakit murangkalih di Pittsburg, Pennsylvania bakal didakwa kalawan pembunuhan sadis sanggeus indungna kapanggih tiwas di bagasi mobil na dina dinten Rebo, sanggem pihak berwenang di Ohio. Doktor Malar Balasubramanian, usia 29, kapanggih di Blue Ash, Ohio, bagian sisi kota kirang langkung 15 mil ti Cincinnati kalér. Anjeunna ngagolér di sisieun jalan nganggo kaos sareng cangcut, jeung anjeunna jiga nembé dirawat. Anjeunna ngarahkeun aparat ka Oldsmobile hideung anu jarakna sakitar 500 kaki. Di dinya, aranjeuna manggih bugang Saroja Balasubramanian, 53 taun, ditutupan simbut anu pinuh ku getih. Pulisi nyatakeun yén layonna parantos aya di ditu sakitar sadinten.
mt: A doctor who worked at a small hospital in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with murder after his mother was found dead in the trunk of a car on Thursday, as authorities in Ohio. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, about 15 miles north of Cincinnati. He was wearing a T-shirt and shorts, and appeared to be recently treated. He led police to an Oldsmobile sedan about 500 feet away. Inside, they found Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, wrapped in a sheet soaked with blood. Police said the body had been there for several days.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: ieu teh mangrupakeun akuisisi pangbadagna dina sajarah eBay. Parusahaan ngaharepkeun pikeun ngamisahkeun asal kauntunganna sareng ningkatkeun kasohoranana dimana Skype gaduh posisi anu kuat, sapertos Cina, Éropa Wétan, sareng Brasil.
mt: This is eBay's largest acquisition in its history. The company hopes to capitalize on Skype's strong position in China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Nalika gelut di eureunkeun saatos anu tatu diangkut ka rumah sakit, sakitar 40 tahanan anu sejen tetep cicing di pakarangan sareng nolak balik ka sélna. Tukang negosiasi na keur nyoba ngabenerkeun kaayaan éta, tapi tungtutan tawanan na teu jelas. Antawis tabuh 10:00-11:00 wengi MDT, kahuruan dimimitan ku para tahanan di halaman. Teu lami, patugas anu dilengkepan ku pakakas anti huru hara lebet ka buruan sarta nyedekkeun narapidana maké gas cipanon. Pamadam kahuruan nyalametkeun antukna seuneu dina jam 11:35 peuting.
mt: When the riot ended, about 40 other inmates remained in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators were trying to calm the situation, but the demands of the inmates were unclear. Around 10:00-11:00 p.m. MDT, the riot began with inmates in the yard. Shortly after, officers armed with riot gear entered the yard and used tear gas to subdue the inmates. The riot was quelled by 11:35 p.m.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.
