src: "komentar eta, anu disiarkeun langsung di tv, nyaeta mimiti na sakabeh senior-senior Iran ngaku yen sanksi eta aya efekna. Éta kalebet pembatasan keuangan sareng larangan ku Uni Eropa kanggo ngirim lisah atah ka luar negri, nu ti mana ékonomi Iran kenging 80% panghasilan luar negrina. Di laporan bulanan terakhir, OPEC nyebatkeun yén ékspor bahan atah téh turun nepi ka pangrendahna salami dua dékade ieu, nyaeta 2.8 juta tong sapoéna. Pamingpin pangluhurna nagara éta, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, atos pernah ngajelaskeun yén katergantungan kana minyak téh ""perangkap"" dimimitian ti saacan revolusi islam di Iran taun 1979 sareng dimana nagara éta kedah ngabebaskeun dirina nyalira. The phrase from which the country should free itself"" is understood as ""from before the independence of Iran country""."
mt: "This comment, which was broadcast live on TV, was the first time that senior Iranian officials admitted that these sanctions have an effect. This includes financial restrictions and the ban by the European Union to send oil abroad, which has reduced Iran's economy by 80% of its foreign income. In the latest monthly report, OPEC has stated that oil exports have fallen to their lowest level in two decades, to 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's top leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has never explained that the dependence on oil is a ""trap"" that was started before the Islamic Revolution in Iran in 1979 and that the country must free itself from it. The phrase from which the country should free itself"" is understood as ""from before the independence of Iran country""."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Di Prancis, pemilu téh kurang nganggo téknologi: nu badé milih téh lebet ka hiji blik, bari nyandak kertas anu aya jalmi nu badé dipilihna teras éta dilebetkeun kana amplop. Saatos patugas mastikeun idéntitas pamilih, pamilih ngalebetkeun amplop kana kotak suara sareng nandatangan daptar pamilih. Hukum pamilihan umum Prancis sacara ketat ngatur prosésna. Ti saprak taun 1988, Kotak sora kudu dijieun transparan nu matak pamilih sareng pengawas tiasa ningali lamun teu aya amplop dina awal pemungutan sora jeung teu aya amplop nu ditambahkeun lian ti nu diitung jeung ti pamilih nu sah. Kandidat tiasa ngirimkeun wawakil kanggo nyaksian saban haturan ti prosés éta. Wengina, soanten diétang ku sukarélawan anu dihandap pangawasan ketat, nuturkeun aturan husus.
mt: In France, the election is not using technology: the voters enter a booth, take a paper with the names of the candidates to be voted for, and then put the paper into an envelope. After the election officials check the identity of the voter, the voter puts the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voter list. French electoral law strictly regulates the process. Since 1988, the ballot box must be made transparent so that voters and observers can see if there are no envelopes at the beginning of the vote and no envelopes added other than those counted and from eligible voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness each step of the process. Despite the difficulty of the process, which is followed by strict control, special rules apply.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Upami parantos dikonpirmasi, penemuan éta ngabereskeun penemuan Allen salila dalapan taun kanggo Musashi. Saatos pametaan dasar laut, bangké kapal éta kapendak nganggo ROV. Salah sahiji jalmi pangbeungharna di dunya, Allen dilaporkeun ngainvéstasi seueur kakayaan na pikeun éksplorasi laut teras mimitian pikeun mendakan Musashi tina minat saumur hirup dina perang.
mt: If confirmed, the discovery would end Allen's eight-year search for Musashi. After mapping the ocean floor, the ship used a ROV to locate the wreck. One of the world's richest men, Allen was reported to have invested considerable resources in ocean exploration, beginning with the search for Musashi from a lifelong interest in war.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Laporan tipi nunjukeun haseup bodas asalna tina pépélakan. Aparat satempat tos miwarang wargi nu linggih di sakitaran pabrik pikeun cicing di jero imah, mareman ac, sareng teu eeut ti cai keran. Numutkeun badan nuklir Jepang, cesium radioaktif sareng yodiumna parantos dipendakan dina pabrik. Pihak nu boga kawasa nganggap éta wadah anu keur nyimpen bahan bakar uranium di daérah éta tiasa waé geus retak jeung bocor.
mt: A local report said the white smoke was from burning plastic. Local authorities have asked residents living near the plant to stay indoors, turn off air conditioners and not use tap water. According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been detected at the plant. Authorities believe the container holding uranium fuel in the area may have ruptured and leaked.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "Dokter Tony Moll manggihan panyakit Tuberkolosis anu tahan pisan kana landong (XDR-TB) di propinsi Kwazulu-Natal, Afrika Kidul. Dina hiji wawancara, anjeunna nyebatkeun bentuk nu énggal téh""pikasieuneun pisan sareng mangkhawatirkeun kusabab angka mematikan na ageung."" Dr Moll nyangka sababaraha pasién panginten katularan panyakit éta teh di rumah sakit, sareng sahenteuna 2 nu katular téh nyaéta pagawé kaséhatan rumah sakit. Dina 1 waktu sataun, jalmi anu katépaan ku virus tiasa népatkeun 10 dugi ka 15 jalmi anu caket jeung anjeunna. Sanajan kitu, persentase XDR-TB dina sakumna jumplukan jalma kalayan TB sigana masih keneh rendah; 6,000 tina total 330,000 jalma nu kainféksi iraha waé dina hiji kaayaan di Afrika Kidul."
mt: "Dr Tony Moll discovered a strain of tuberculosis that is highly resistant to treatment in the province of Kwazulu-Natal, South Africa. In an interview, he said that the new strain was ""very scary and worrying because of the high mortality rate."" Dr Moll believes that several patients with the disease were in the hospital, and certainly two of them were hospital staff. In one year, a person infected with the virus can infect 10 to 15 people with whom he is in contact. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with TB is still low; 6,000 out of a total of 330,000 people infected with any condition in South Africa."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: "Dokter Tony Moll manggihan panyakit Tuberkolosis anu tahan pisan kana landong (XDR-TB) di propinsi Kwazulu-Natal, Afrika Kidul. Dina hiji wawancara, anjeunna nyebatkeun bentuk nu énggal téh""pikasieuneun pisan sareng mangkhawatirkeun kusabab angka mematikan na ageung."" Dr Moll nyangka sababaraha pasién panginten katularan panyakit éta teh di rumah sakit, sareng sahenteuna 2 nu katular téh nyaéta pagawé kaséhatan rumah sakit. Dina 1 waktu sataun, jalmi anu katépaan ku virus tiasa népatkeun 10 dugi ka 15 jalmi anu caket jeung anjeunna. Sanajan kitu, persentase XDR-TB dina sakumna jumplukan jalma kalayan TB sigana masih keneh rendah; 6,000 tina total 330,000 jalma nu kainféksi iraha waé dina hiji kaayaan di Afrika Kidul."
mt: "Dr Tony Moll discovered a strain of tuberculosis that is highly resistant to treatment in the province of Kwazulu-Natal, South Africa. In an interview, he said that the new strain was ""very scary and worrying because of the high mortality rate."" Dr Moll believes that several patients with the disease were in the hospital, and certainly two of them were hospital staff. In one year, a person infected with the virus can infect 10 to 15 people with whom he is in contact. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with TB is still low; 6,000 out of a total of 330,000 people infected with any condition in South Africa."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: Nextgen nyaeta sistem anu diklaim FAA nu matak bisa ngapungkeun kapal udara kalawan rute anu langkung pondok sarta ngahemat jutaan galon bahan huru saban warsih sarta motong emisi karbon. Ieu ngagunakeun téknologi berbasis satelit anu janten lawan tina téknologi berbasis radar darat anu leuwih lami keu ngatur lalu lintas hawa keur nunjukan posisi pesawat nu leuwih jelas sareng masihan inpo ka pilot nu leuwih akurat.
mt: Nextgen is an FAA claimed system that is supposed to allow aircraft to fly closer routes and save millions of gallons of fuel per year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology that is more accurate and faster than ground-based radar technology that has been used to guide air traffic for clearer and more accurate information to pilots.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Sejarawan ngritik kabijakan FBI anu kapengker anu mokuskeun dina kasus anu gampil dibéréskeun, khususna kasus maling mobil, anu dimaksudkeun keur ningkatkeun tingkat kasuksesan agensi. Kongres mimiti ngabiayaan inisiatif ngeunaan tindakan nu jorang dina fiskal 2005 sareng nyatakeun yén FBI kedah ngayogikeun 10 agén kana pornografi sawawa.
mt: Historians criticized the FBI's policy of focusing on easy-to-solve cases, especially car theft, which was intended to increase the agency's success rate. Congress first funded the initiative in fiscal year 2005 and declared that the FBI must assign 10 agents to pornography as well.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Kapal JAS 39 C Gripen rugrug kana landasan sakitar tabuh 9:30 enjing waktu lokal (0230 UTC) teras ngabeledug, nu nyebabkeun bandara tutup pikeun penerbangan komérsil. Pilot éta nyaéta pamimpin skuad Dilokrit Pattavee. Berita lokalan ngalaporkeun yen mobil pemadam kebakaran tiguling pas nyamperkeun.
mt: 9:30 local time (0230 UTC) the Gripen aircraft landed on the runway, then crashed, causing the airport to close for commercial flights. The pilot was Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local news reported that a fire truck overturned when approaching.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: Salami taun 1960an, Brzezinski damel kanggo John F. Kennedy salaku panaséhatna teras salajengna salaku pagawé administrasi kanggo Lyndon B. Johnson. Dina pemilihan taun 1976 anjeunna jadi penasehat Carter dina urusan kabijakan luar negeri, teras salajengna ngawula salaku National Security Advisor (NSA) ti taun 1977 nepi ka taun 1981,  ngagantikeun Henry Kissinger. Salaku NSA, anjeunna ngabantos Carter nguruskeun urusan hubungan diplomatis dunya, sapertos Camp David Accords, 1978; nganormalkeun hubungan AS-China dina akhir 1970an; Revolusi Iran, nu nyababkeun krisis penyanderaan Iran, 1979; sareng invasi Soviet di Afganistan, 1979.
mt: In the 1960s, Brzezinski served as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and later as an official in the administration of Lyndon B. Johnson. In the 1976 election, he was a foreign policy advisor to Carter, and later served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he helped Carter manage the world's diplomatic affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalization of US-China relations in the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Wedal di ibukota Kroasia, Zagreb, Bobek janten kakoncara pas maén keur Partizan Belgrade. Anjeunna ngagabung jeung aranjeunna dina taun 1945 jeung bertahan nepi ka taun 1958. Waktos anjeunna masih gabung dina kalompok éta, anjeunna nyétak 403 gol saeunggeus 468 tanding. Teu aya jalmi anu kantos langkung sering tampil atanapi nyitak gol pikeun klub salain Bobek. Dina taun 1995 anjeunna kapilih salaku pamaén anu pangsaéna dina sajarah Partizan.
mt: Bobek was a striker for the capital city of Croatia, Zagreb, for Partizan Belgrade. He joined the group in 1945 and remained until 1958. During his time with the group, he scored 403 goals in 468 games. There was no other player who appeared more often or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was elected as the club's best player in its history.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "Hesperonychus elizabethae nyaéta spésiés kulawarga Dromaeosauridae sareng misan Velociraptor. Manuk pamangsa anu pinuh ku bulu ieu, dipercaya geus bisa leumpang tegak make 2 suku jeung boga cakar sapertos Velociraptor. Cékér kaduana gede pisan, jadina anjeunna dipasihan nami Hesperonychus anu hartina ""Cékér Kulon""."
mt: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and close relative of Velociraptor. This bird-like predator, believed to have stood about two feet tall and sported claws like Velociraptor, was named Hesperonychus, meaning "western claw."
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Sahenteuna aya 100 urang hadir dina pesta eta, kanggo ngarayakeun ulang taun nu ka hiji panganten anu dilaksanakeun sataun ka tukang. Acara ulang taun atos resmi dijadwalkeun kanggo kaping engké, saur pajabat. Panganten eta nikah di Texas 1 taun kamari sareng sumping ka Buffalo kanggo ngarayakeun sareng babaturanna sareng barayana. Salaki umur 30 taun, anu lahir di Buffalo, mangrupikeun 1 korban ti 4 korban anu maot dina penembakan, tapi pamajikanana henteu kunanaon.
mt: 100 people were present at the party, to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple who had been married a year ago. The anniversary party was officially scheduled for next year, according to officials. The couple had been married in Texas a year ago and moved to Buffalo to celebrate and visit their relatives and friends. The 30-year-old, who was born in Buffalo, was one of four victims killed in the shooting, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Luno ngagaduhan bahan bakar saloba 120-160 méter kubik dina kapal nalika kapalna ancur teras angin anu kuat sareng ombak nyorong kana témbok laut. Helikopter-helikopter nyalamatkeun dua belas awak teras hiji-hijina anu cidera nyaéta irungna potong. Kapal 100 meter eta keur di perjalanan kanggo nyandak kargo pupuk biasa jeung para pejabat mimiti na honcewang eta kapal bisi ngabahekeun muatan.
mt: The ship was carrying 120-160 cubic meters of fuel when it sank after strong winds and waves crashed it into the shore. Helicopters rescued twelve crew members who were the only ones injured, with their ears cut. The 100 meter ship was on its way to deliver regular fertilizer and officials said the ship was carrying a dangerous cargo.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Prestasi Vautier sajaba janten sutradara nyaéta mogok dahar taun 1973 ngalawan hal anu anjeunna pandang salaku sénsor pulitik. Hukum Perancis atos dirobah. Aktivisme na balik deui ka umur 15 waktos anjeuna ngagabung jeung Parlawanan Perancis salami Perang Dunya II. Manéhna téh nyeratkeun kahirupanna dina kitab 1998. Dina 1960-an anjeunna balik ka Algeria anu nembé merdeka pikeun ngajarkeun ngarahkeun pilem.
mt: Vautier's achievements also include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he saw as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism returned at the age of 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He wrote his life story in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he returned to Algeria, which had just gained independence, to teach film direction.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Langkung ti 4 juta urang angkat ka Roma pikeun ngadatangan pamakaman Jumlah jalmi nu dongkap seueur pisan matak teu sadayana tiasa lebet ka astana di St. Peter's Square. Sababaraha tipi ageung dipasang di sababaraha tempat di Roma supados warga tiasa nyaksian upacara éta. Di seueur dayeuh sanes di Italia sarta di sakumna dunya, utamana di Polandia, pangaturan sarupa didamel, anu tos ditingali ku seueur jalmi.
mt: 4 million people are expected to attend the funeral. Several large screens have been set up in several places in Rome so that people can watch the ceremony. Similar arrangements have been made in several other cities in Italy and all over the world, especially in Poland, where many people are expected to watch the ceremony.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Numutkeun laporan, imah susun di Jalan Macbeth téh kahuruan kusabab bocor gas. Hiji aparat perusahaan gas éta ngalaporkeun ka tempat kajadian saatos saurang tatangga nelepon perkawis kabocoran gas. Nalika patugas dugi, imah susunna ngabeledug. Teu aya anu cidera nu dilaporkeun, tapi sahenteuna aya lima urang di éta tempat pas ngabeledug dirawat ku margi ginggiapeun kénéh. Teu aya 1 jalma oge di leubeut apartemen. Dina waktos ieu, ampir 100 wargi diévakuasi ti wewengkon éta.
mt: According to reports, a house on Macbeth Street was damaged due to a gas leak. A gas company employee reported to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the crew arrived, the house exploded. There were no reported injuries, but five people at the scene were treated for smoke inhalation. There was also one person in the apartment building. At this time, about 100 people were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Korban nu maot nya eta Nicholas Alden, 25, jeung Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback nyaeta nu nyupir na. Edgar Veguilla cédera dina panangan sareng rahang upami Scheneider kudu ngajalanan oprasi ulang pamenteuna. Pakarang Uka gagal diarahkeun kana sirah jalmi kalima. Schneider nyeri teterusan, buta sabelah socana, kaleungitan hiji bagéan tangkorak sareng pameunteu anu didamel tina titanium. Schneider masihan kasaksian nganggo videolink ti pangkalan USAF di kampungna.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed. Cuddeback was the pilot. Edgar Veguilla suffered a broken jaw and Schneider had to undergo a partial craniectomy. Schneider's skull was shattered, he lost part of his vertebrae and the titanium plate implanted in his head. Schneider gave his testimony via video link from his USAF base in his hometown.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Korban nu maot nya eta Nicholas Alden, 25, jeung Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback nyaeta nu nyupir na. Edgar Veguilla cédera dina panangan sareng rahang upami Scheneider kudu ngajalanan oprasi ulang pamenteuna. Pakarang Uka gagal diarahkeun kana sirah jalmi kalima. Schneider nyeri teterusan, buta sabelah socana, kaleungitan hiji bagéan tangkorak sareng pameunteu anu didamel tina titanium. Schneider masihan kasaksian nganggo videolink ti pangkalan USAF di kampungna.

src: Golf sareng rugby bakal balik deui kana Olimpiade. Komite Olimpiade Internasional milih kanggo ngalebetkeun cabang olahraga dina pasamoan déwan éksékutipna di Berlin poé ieu. Rugbi, hususna rugbi union, sarta golf dipilih ti 5 olahraga lainna pikeun ditimbang-timbang kanggo ngiringan Olimpiade. Olahraga squash, karaté, sareng sapatu roda diusahakeun lebet kana Olimpiade sapertos bésbol sareng softball, anu dikaluarkeun tina Pertandingan Olimpiade di taun 2005. Pamilihan sora masih kedah disahkeun ku sadaya anggota IOC dina rapat sasih Oktober di Copenhagen.
mt: Golf and rugby will return to the Olympics. The International Olympic Committee chose to include the sports in a meeting of its executive board in Berlin today. Rugby, particularly rugby union, and golf were selected from five other sports to be considered for the Olympics. Squash, karate, and roller skating were also sought to be included in the Olympics as baseball and softball were removed from the Olympic Games in 2005. The selection must still be approved by all IOC members in an October meeting in Copenhagen.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: Kaping 24 Séptémber, 1759, Arthur Guinness nanda tangan kontrak salila 9000 taun keur St James' Gate Brewery di Dublin, Irlandia. 250 taun saterusna, Guinness geus maju jadi bisnis nu mendunia ngahasilkeun leuwih ti 10 milyar euro ($14.7 milyar) per taunna.
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown into a global business producing more than €10 billion ($14.7 billion) per year.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: Rupi flu manuk anu bahaya keur jalmi, H5N1, atos dipastikeun ngainféksi entog liar anu paéh, kapanggih dinten Senén, di ranca cakeut Lyon di daérah wétan Perancis. Prancis nyaéta negara katujuh di Uni Éropa anu ripuh ku panyawat ieu; nuturkeun Austria, Jérman, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Yunani, jeung Italy. Kasus H5N1 anu dicurigai di Kroasia jeung Denmark tetep teu ka konpirmasi.
mt: The highly pathogenic avian flu virus H5N1 has been confirmed to infect wild birds, found on Monday, in the eastern French region of Lyon. France is the seventh country in the European Union to be hit by this disease; followed by Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece, and Italy. Cases of H5N1 suspected in Croatia and Denmark have yet to be confirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: Pasukan perdamaian PBB, anu dugi di Haiti saatos gempa taun 2010, janten disalahkeun ku sumebarna panyawat anu mimiti kapendak caket markas tentara. Numutkeun kana gugatan hukum, limbah ti markas PBB teu bener-bener dibersihkeun, nyaéta nu nyebabkeun baktéri asup ka susukan Artibonite, salah sahiji nu panggedena di Haiti. Sateuacan datangna pasukan, Haiti can pernah ngalaman masalah anu berhubungan jeung panyawat ieu ti saprak taun 1800an. Lembaga Haiti kanggo Kaadilan sarta Demokrasi atos ngarujuk studi independen anu ngusulkeun pangjaga katengtreman batalion UN Nepal nu tanpa sadar ngabantun panyakit eta ka Haiti. Danielle Lantage, pakar panyawat di PBB, nyarios yén ieu pandemi meureun disababkeun ku pasukan anu miara katengtreman.
mt: United Nations peacekeepers, who arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed by a new report of UN observers who first came close to the military base. According to a lawsuit, the UN's waste was not properly cleaned, causing bacteria to enter the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's most important rivers. Haiti had never experienced problems related to this disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy refers to an independent study that suggested the UN's careless Nepalese battalion helped spread the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantage, a UN observer, said this pandemic was not caused by careless soldiers.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "Pamaréntah Irlandia negaskeun kapentingan undang-undang parlemén pikeun ngabenerkeun kaayaan éta. Undang-undang eta penting jang buburu dilakukeun alus tina segi kasehatan masyarakat oge kaadilan kriminal"", ceuk juru ngomong pamarentah. Menteri kesehatan nunjukeun kaprihatinana pikeun kasejahteraan jalmi anu ngamanfaatkeun légalitas samentawis substansi anu terlibat, jeung kanggo hukuman patali narkoba dijatuhkeun samenjak parobahan-parobahan anu ayeuna atos henteu konstitusional deui mulai berlaku."
mt: "The Irish government has indicated its intention to enact the legislation. The legislation is important in terms of public health and criminal justice," said a government spokesman. The health minister said he was concerned about the welfare of individuals who avail of the legal status of the substance involved, and the penalties for drug-related offences are to be reduced in line with changes that are currently not constitutional and will not come into effect."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "Christopher Garcia, juru carios Departemen Pulisi Los Angeles, nyatakeun bahwasana kasangka lalaki keur ditaliti kusabab anjeuna asup henteu ijin lain karna vandalisme. Tanda éta henteu ruksak bentukna mah; dibenerkeunna nyaéta nganggo terpal hideung anu dihias ku tanda perdamaian sareng hate pikeun ngubah aksara ""O"" janten aksara alit ""e""."
mt: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesman for the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspect was being investigated for trespassing because he was seen vandalizing the sign. The sign was not damaged; it was covered with a black tarp and decorated with peace signs and hate symbols to change the letter ""O"" to a small ""e""."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karno nyaéta guru Basa Inggris anu kasohor nanging kontroversial anu ngajar dihandap Atikan Modéren sareng King's Glory anu disebut-sebut gaduh 9,000 murid di puncak karirna. Dina catetanana anjeunna nganggo kecap-kecap anu di anggap ku sababaraha kolot anu kurang ajar, sareng anjeunna di kabarkeun ngucapkeun kecap-kecap nu kotor di kelas. Atikan modéren nuduh anjeunna nyetak iklan anu ageung di bus-bus tanpa ijin sareng ngabohong ku ngaku-ngaku anjeunna ketua guru lés Bahasa Inggris. Anjeunna sateuacana atos pernah dituduh ngalanggar hak cipta saméméhna, tapi henteu dihukum. Hiji alumni nyaritakeun nyaeta manehna 'osok ngagunakeun bahasa santai, ngajarkeun carana bobogohan, jeung sapertos babaturan jang murid.'
mt: He is a well-known but controversial English teacher at Modern Education and King's Glory, which is said to have 9,000 students at its peak. In his notes he uses words that are considered by some to be vulgar, and he is reported to have uttered vulgar words in class. Modern education shows that he printed large ads on buses without permission and admitted that he was the chairman of the English language teachers. He was previously accused of copyright infringement before, but was not convicted. An alumnus reported that he was "using a relaxed language, teaching how to be vulgar, and so on, interacting with students."
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Saurang tilas pulisi Filipina nahan para turis Hong Kong kalawan ngabajak beus maranehanana di Manila, puseur dayeuh Filipina. Rolando Mendoza nembakeun bedil M16 ka turis. Sababaraha sandra tos diselamatkeun jeung sahenteuna genep nu tos ka konpirmasi maot sajauh ieu. 6 sandera, kaasup barudak sareng kolot, dibebaskeun tipayun, sareng fotografer Filipina ogé  . Para fotografer ngagentos hiji awewe anu tos kolot kusabab anjeunna kedah ka cai. Mendoza maot dibedil.
mt: A former Philippine policeman held Hong Kong tourists hostage in Manila, the Philippines' capital. Rolando Mendoza fired an M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages were rescued and at least six were confirmed dead as of this writing. Six hostages, including children and an elderly woman, were released unharmed, along with a Filipino photographer. The photographer was forced to take a woman to the bathroom because she was elderly. Mendoza was killed by police.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Brasil mangrupikeun nagara Katolik Romawi pangageungna di Dunya, tur Garéja Katolik Romawi salawasna teu satuju pikeun ngesahkeun nikah sasama jinis di nagara éta. Kongrés nasional Brazil debat soal légalisasi geus 10 taun, jeung kawinan sipil samacam éta téh sah ngan di Rio Grande do Sul hungkul. Rancangan undang-undang nu aslina di kintunkeun ku walikota Sao Paolo nu lawas, Marta Suplicy. Panerapan nu diajukeun, sanggeus di obah, ayeuna aya di Roberto Jefferson. Anu protés ngaharepkeun tiasa ngumpulkeun 1,2 juta tandatangan jang petisi pikeun dikintunkeun ka Kongrés Nasional pas bulan Nopémber.
mt: Brazil is the world's largest Catholic country, and the Catholic Church has long opposed same-sex marriage there. The national congress has debated legalizing it for 10 years, and civil unions are only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was introduced by the mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The bill, after being amended, is now being pushed by Roberto Jefferson. Those who oppose it are collecting 1.2 million signatures for a petition to be presented to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "5 menit deui kana angin ngawitan ngagulung kana layar, kira-kira samenit saatosna angin tos dugi ka 70km/jam terus kakara wéh hujan téh turun, tapi meni ageung pisan nepikeun karasa jiga ditojosan ku jarum lamun nepi ka beunang éta hujan kanu kulit urang, teras hujan és murag tina langit, jalma panik sareng jerit sareng silih udag. Abdi kaleungitan adi awewe abdi sarta rerencanganana, sarta dina lalampahan abdi aya 2 jalmi cacad dina korsi roda, jalmi-jalmi ngan ngaluncat sarta nyorong maranehanana,"" sanggem Armand Versace."
mt: 5 minutes later the wind started to turn over the sails, about 5 minutes after that the wind reached 70km/h and then the rain started to fall, but it was very light, like being pricked by a needle until that rain stopped falling from the sky, people panicked and screamed and fought. I lost my wife and my children and their belongings, and in the journey there were 2 injured people on the wheelchairs, people just ran away and pushed each other," said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

Abdi kaleungitan adi awewe abdi sarta rerencanganana, sarta dina lalampahan abdi aya 2 jalmi cacad dina korsi roda, jalmi-jalmi ngan ngaluncat sarta nyorong maranehanana,"" sanggem Armand Versace."
mt: 5 minutes later the wind started to turn over the sails, about 5 minutes after that the wind reached 70km/h and then the rain started to fall, but it was very light, like being pricked by a needle until that rain stopped falling from the sky, people panicked and screamed and fought. I lost my wife and my children and their belongings, and in the journey there were 2 injured people on the wheelchairs, people just ran away and pushed each other," said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Badai na, anu kira-kira sakitar 645 mil (1040 km) di kuloneun pulo Cape Verde, sigana bakal leungit saacan nepi daratan, ceuk peramal cuaca. Fred ayeuna kecepatan anginna sakitar 105 mil per jam (165 km/jam) keur gerak ka kalér wétan. Fred téh nyaéta angin puyuh anu pangkuatna nu pernah aya palebah kidul jeung wétan di Atlantik samenjak muncul di satelit, jeung ogé badai nu katilu panggedéna di wétan 35 W.
mt: Fred, which is about 645 miles (1040 km) northeast of Cape Verde, is expected to dissipate before reaching land, according to forecasters. Fred currently has winds of about 105 mph (165 km/h) moving toward the northeast. Fred is the strongest hurricane ever recorded in the southern and eastern Atlantic since satellite observations began, and the third largest in the western 35 W.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 802.11 anu standar tiasa beroprasi dina frékuénsi 2.4 Ghz atawa 5.0 Ghz. Ieu bakal ngijinkeun éta ngabalik sareng bisa kangge 802.11a, 802.11b sareng 802.11g, upami stasiun utamana ngagaduhan dua radio. Kecepatan 802.11n jauh leuwih tereh tibatan pangheulana jeung hasil teoritis maksimum 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11 can operate at frequencies of 2.4 Ghz or 5.0 Ghz. This will allow it to work with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, if the station has two radios. The speed of 802.11n is much faster than its predecessors and the theoretical maximum is 600Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Juara medali emas Olimpiade dijadwalkeun ngojay bébas 100m sareng 200m jeung dina tilu relay di Commonwealth Games, tapi kusabab ngeluh, kabugaran awakna diragukeun. Anjeunna moal tiasa nginum obat-obatan anu diperyogikeun pikeun ngungkulan kanyeri kusabab dilarang di Pertandingan.
mt: 100m and 200m gold medalist and three relay member of the Commonwealth Games team were disqualified because of a doping violation. They were not allowed to take the banned drug because of the Games.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Peta gempa internasional ti Survéi Geologi Amérika Serikat nunjukkeun henteu aya gempa di Islandia saminggu saméméhna. Kantor Météorologi Islandia ogé ngabarkeun teu aya lini di wilayah Hekla salami 48 jam kapengker. Gempa bumi anu gede pisan anu ngakibatkeun parobahan fase kajadian tina 10 Maret ti belah timur laut kaldera puncak gunung berapi. Awan poék anu teu aya hubunganna sareng dilaporkeun aktivitas gunung api katingali di dasar gunung. Awan nampilkeun poténsi pikeun ngabingungkeun naha letusan parantos kajantenan.
mt: An international earthquake map from the United States Geological Survey shows no earthquakes in Iceland last week.  The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours.  A major earthquake that changed the phase of the event from 10 March from the northeast of the caldera of the volcano.  A cloud of unknown origin was reported to be associated with volcanic activity at the base of the volcano.  The cloud showed potential for confusing whether an eruption was imminent.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: Kapal tanpa panumpang nu keur ngorbit ka bulan Chandrayaan-1 ngaluarkeun Moon Impact Probe (MIP), anu ngaluncur ngaléwatan dataran bulan ku kecepatan 1.5 kilométer per detik (3000 mil per jam), teras suksés mendarat dekeut kutub kidul bulan. Salain mawa tilu instrumen ilmiah anu penting, kapal penjelajah bulan mawa ogé gambar bendéra nagara India, anu dicet dina kabéh sisi.
mt: The unmanned spacecraft that was orbiting the moon to study it, Chandrayaan-1, released the Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which was ejected from the lunar surface at 1.5 kilometers per second (3000 miles per hour), successfully landing near the moon's south pole.  In addition to carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar explorer also carried an image of the Indian flag, which was printed on all sides.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Kasus mimiti panyawat ieu di usum ieu dilaporkeun di ahir juli. Panyakit ieu téh di bawa ku bagong, teras ditularkeun ka manusa liwat reungit. Ieu bala téh ngabalukarkeun pamaréntah India kudu ngukur sumebarna di wilayah tukang bagong anu terdampak kalawan serius, ngirimkeun rébuan reungit sarta nyemprotkeun péstisida. Pamaréntah atos ngajangjian jutaan botol vaksin encephalitis, anu tiasa ngabantuan nyiapkeun kasehatan agensi warsih payun. Rencana penyaluran vaksin ka area anu paling terdampak sacara historis taun ieu katunda margi kurangna dana jeung handapna prioritas dibandingkeun jeung panyawat lainna.
mt: The first case of this disease was reported in July. The disease is spread by mosquitoes, then transmitted to humans through their bites. This has forced the Indian government to take the threat seriously, sending thousands of mosquitoes and spraying pesticides. The government has ordered millions of bottles of encephalitis vaccine, which can help prepare health agencies for the coming year. Plans to distribute the vaccine to the most affected areas this year have been postponed due to lack of funds and lower priority compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Amandemen anu diusulkeun parantos sukses di dua dewan taun 2011. Hiji parobahan didamel dina sidang legislatif ieu pas kalimah kadua dihapus langkung tipayun ku DPR sarta saterasna disahkeun dina wangun sarupa ku Sénat Senen. Kagagalan kalimah kadua, anu badé ngalarang sarékat sipil kanggo sami jenis kelamin, tiasa muka panto kanggo sarékat sipil ka payunna. Saatos prosés éta, HJR-3 bakal ditinjau deui ku législatif anu kapilih salajengna di 2015 atanapi 2016 pikeun tetep dina prosés.
mt: 2011 amendments were successful in two chambers of the legislature. A change was made in the legislative session this year when the second word was removed from the bill by the House and then passed in the same form by the Senate. The removal of the second word, which would have prohibited same-sex civil unions, could pave the way for civil unions for same-sex couples. After that process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in 2015 or 2016 to continue the process.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: "Dokumen Panama"" nyaeta istilah pikeun kira-kira 10 juta dokumen ti Kantor Hukum Mossack Fonseca ti Panama, nu bocor ka wartawan pas musim semi 2016. Dokumen éta nunjukeun opat belas bank nu ngabantu klién beunghar nyumputkeun miliaran dollar kekayaan keur ngahindar ti pajak jeung kawajiban nu sanésna. Koran Inggris The Guardian nyarankeun Deutsche Bank ngontrol kira-kira sapertilu ti 1200 perusahaan shell kanggo ngagapai ieu. Protes lumangsung di sakumna dunya, sababaraha tuntutan kriminal, teras pamingpin pamaréntahan Islandia jeung Pakistani duanana mundur."
mt: "The Panama Papers" is the name given to about 11.5 million documents from the Panama-based law firm Mossack Fonseca, which leaked to journalists in the spring of 2016. The documents show 18 banks helping wealthy clients to hide billions of dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other obligations. The Guardian newspaper reported that Deutsche Bank controlled about 1,200 shell companies for this purpose. Protests took place around the world, some criminal charges were filed, and the leaders of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Kacilakaan udara téh umum di Iran, kusabab kapalna tos lami sareng teu bener-bener dirawat bade sipil atawa militér. Sanksi internasional mutuskeun heunteu meunang meser kapal anyar. Awal minggon ieu, hiji helikopter polisi ragrag anu nyebabkeun tilu jalmi maot jeung tilu séjénna luka-luka. Sasih kamari Iran ngalaman bencana hawa anu paling parah di sababaraha taun nalika hiji pesawat anu ngapung ka Arménia ragrag, maéhan 168 jalmi di jero pesawat. Bulan anu sami nempo airliner nu sejen nyerbu hiji landasan di Mashhad sareng nyerang témbok, maéhan tujuh belas.
mt: Air crashes are common in Iran, as its aircraft are old and not properly maintained by either civilian or military authorities. International sanctions have prevented the purchase of new aircraft. Earlier this month, a police helicopter crashed, killing three and injuring two others. Last month Iran experienced its worst air disaster in years when a passenger airliner bound for Armenia crashed, killing 168 people on board. The same month another airliner crashed into a runway at Mashhad airport and crashed through a wall, killing seventeen.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Kelompok Diajar Iraq maparkeun laporana tabuh 12.00 GMT dinten ieu. Ieu ngingetkeun yén teu aya 1 pun anu tiasa ngajamin yén tindakan di Irak dina waktos ayeuna bakal ngeureunkeun perang sekte, ningkatna kakerasan, atanapi ngageser kana huru hara. Laporan eta diawalan ku nyuhungkeun debat terbuka jeung formasi konsensus dina United States ngeunaan kebijakan keur Timur Tengah. Laporan éta kritis pisan ti hampir sadaya aspék ngeunaan kebijakan ti Eksekutif ka Irak jeung ngabutuhkeun perubahan arah anu geura. Salah sahiji ti 78 rékoméndasina nyaéta inisiatip diplomatik kedah dilaksanakeun saméméh akhir taun kanggo ngamankeun perwatesan Iraq ti serangan musuh sareng mulai deui hubungan diplomatik sareng nagara tatangga.
mt: The Iraq Study Group report was released at noon GMT on Thursday. It suggests that no one can guarantee that current actions in Iraq will end sectarian violence, reduce brutality, or lead to stability. The report calls for open debate and consensus formation in the United States on Middle East policy. The report is highly critical of almost every aspect of executive policy in Iraq and calls for a change of direction. One of 78 recommendations is that diplomatic initiatives should be undertaken before the end of the year to protect Iraq from enemy attack and to re-establish diplomatic relations with neighboring countries.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Numutkeun Ansa, ""pulisi sieun ka sababaraha serangan tingkat tinggi anu aranjeunna sieun bakal micu perang terusan anu langkung ageung . Pulisi nyatakeun yén Lo Piccolo diuntungkeun kusabab anjeuna tangan kanan Provenzano di Palermo sareng pangalamana nu langkung seueur  nyieun anjeunna dihormatan ku bos-bos anu tos kolot nalika aranjeunna ngusahakeun kabijakan Provenzano sarendah mungkin sarta nguatkeun kakuatan jaringanna. bos-bos ieu dikekang ku Provenzano nalika manehna mereskeun Perang Riina ngalawan nagara anu newaskeun korban tentara mafia Giovanni Falcone sareng Paolo Borsellino di taun 1992"
mt: "According to Ansa, "the police are investigating several high-level attacks that you will ignite a continuous war that will be even more intense. The police have stated that Lo Piccolo was favored because he had the right hand of Provenzano in Palermo and the more powerful bosses honored him when he was trying to implement Provenzano's policies as little as possible and strengthening his network. These bosses were controlled by Provenzano when he was fighting the state that killed the mafia soldiers Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992"
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Atlit judoka Jepang Hitoshi Saito, pinunjul dua medali emas Olimpiade, nilar dina umur 54 taun. Panyabab pupusna diumumkeun nyaéta kusabab kanker saluran émpedu intahepatic. Anjeunna pupus di Osaka dinten Salasa. Kitu oge urut jawara Olimpiade sarta Dunya, Saito nyaéta pupuhu komite palatihan Féderasi Judo Sakumna Jepang dina waktos pupusna.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, a two-time Olympic gold medalist, died. The cause of his death was announced to be liver cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. He was also the head of the Japanese Judo Federation's training committee at the time of his death.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Salila perjalanan na, Iwasaki ngalaman masalah dina seueur waktosna. Anjeunna dirampok ku bajak laut, diserang ku anjing anu gélo di Tibet, kabur ti pernikahan di Nepal jeung ditangkep di India.
mt: During his travels, Iwasaki had several problems. He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a dog in Tibet, ran away from a wedding in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Giancarlo Fisichella kaleungitan kendali mobilna sarta teu lila ereun balapna pas karak dimulai. Batur hiji timna Fernando Alonso anu mingpin sapanjang balapan, tapi akhirna eureun saatos pit-stop, kamungkinan disebabkeun ku roda hareupna tisoledad ka katuhu. Michael Schumacher ngabereskeun balapan teu  lami saatos Alonso, kusabab suspensi na rusak pas pertarungan di balapan eta.
mt: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and crashed early in the race. Team-mate Fernando Alonso led the race for most of the race, but retired after a pit-stop, possibly due to a front wing failure. Michael Schumacher retired shortly after Alonso, due to a suspension failure during the race.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Dina 3 sasih anu kapengker, langkung ti 80 tahanan dibebaskeun tina fasilitas Perpolahan Tengah tanpa biaya resmi. Dina sasih April taun ieu, paréntah keur penahanan sementara dikaluarkeun ku Hakim Glynn ka pasilitas éta pikeun ngabébaskeun jalmi-jalmi anu ditahan langkung ti 24 jam saatos panarimaan aranjeuna anu teu narima sidang ti komisaris pangadilan. Komisaris netepkeun jaminan, lamun dipasihan, teras ngaresmikeun tungtutan anu diajukeun ku patugas nu néwak. Tuduhan kasebat saterusna diasupkeun ka jero sistem komputer nagara bagian dimana kasus éta dilacak. Sidang ogé nandaan tanggal hak na tersangka pikeun diadili langkung gancang.
mt: 3 months ago, more than 80 prisoners were released from the Central Detention Facility without official charges. In April of this year, the government released prisoners on temporary detention to the facility to release prisoners who had been detained for more than 24 hours after their arrival, who had not accepted the hearing of the commissioner. The commissioner kept the guarantee, if given, then he would confirm the demands made by the officers. The charges were then absorbed into the state's computer system where the case was tracked. The hearing also noted the date of the defendant for faster trial.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin ogé nyebutkeun yén para pajabat mutuskeun kanggo ngabolaykeun puteran kadua sangkan nyalametkeun urang Afghanistan tina resiko waragad sarta kaamanan pamilihan lianna. Diplomat nyatakeun bahwasana aranjeunna manggihan babaraha anu teu jelas dina konstitusi Afghanistan nu mutuskeun pamilihan salaku hiji hal nu teu perlu. Bareda jeung laporan tiheula anu nyaritakeun bahwa ngabatalkeun pamilihan bertentangan jeung konstitusi.
mt: The statement also said officials had decided to suspend the second round of voting to save Afghan lives from the risk of money and other security threats. Diplomats said they found several unclear in the Afghan constitution that decided the election as an unnecessary thing. Bareda and previous reports that the cancellation of the election contrary to the constitution.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "Samenjak Pakistan merdeka ti kekuasaan Inggris di taun 1947, Presiden Pakistan nunjuk ""Agen Politik"" keur marintah FATA, anu ngalakuken kontrol otonom gede di daerah eta. Agén-agén ieu anu tanggung jawab kanggo nyadiakeun layanan pamaréntah sarta peradilan dumasar kana Pasal 247 Konstitusi Pakistan."
mt: "Since Pakistan gained independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani president has appointed "political agents" to govern the FATA, which has enjoyed considerable autonomy in the region. These agents are responsible for providing government services and administering justice under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Film anu dibintangan ku Ryan Gosling jeung Emma Stone narima nominasi di babaraha kategori utama. Gosling sareng Stone masing-masing janten aktor sareng aktris terbaik. Nominasi séjén kaasup Pilem Panghadéna, Sutradara, Sinématografi, Rarancang Kostum, Pangropéa Pilem, Penata Musik, Rarancang Produksi, Pangropéa Sora, Adumanis Sora sarta Skénario Asli. 2 lagu tina filem, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) jeung City of Stars, meunang nominasi keur lagu asli nu pang alusna. Lionsgate Studio meunang 26 nominasi -- langkung ti studio nu lian na.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in several major categories. Gosling and Stone were both nominated for Best Actor and Best Actress. Other nominations included Best Picture, Best Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Music (Original Score), Production Design, Sound Mixing, Sound Editing, and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the film, "Audition (The Fools Who Dream)" and "City of Stars," were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate Studio received 26 nominations -- more than any other studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK ngalaporkeun pembangkit listrik tenaga nuklir Kashiwazaki Kariwa di Niigata Prefektur beroperasi normal. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. ngalaporkeun teu aya pangaruh ti lini eta sareng réaktor Nomer 1 sarta 2 di pembangkit listrik tanagi nuklir Shika ditutup. Dilaporkeun yén kira-kira 9400 imah di daérah éta teu aya cai jeung sakitar 100 teu aya listrik. Sajumlah jalan rusak, layanan karéta pegat di daerah-daerah nu kapangaruh, jeung Bandara Noto di Prefektur Ishikawa ogé tetep ditutup.
mt: NHK reports the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture is operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reports there is no effect from the line and reactor No. 1 and 2 at the Shika nuclear power plant were closed. It is reported that about 9,400 homes in the area are without water and about 100 are without power. Some roads are damaged, train service is suspended in affected areas, and Noto Airport in Ishikawa Prefecture is also closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Dokumen éta, ceuk warta anu bocor, bakal patali kana pasalisihan wates nagara, anu dipikahoyong ku Palestina dumasar kana wates saméméh Perang Timur Tengah 1967. Topik-topik sanes anu dicakup ngalaporkeun kaasup oge kaayaan masa anu bakal sumping ti Yerusalem anu sakral kanggo kadua nagara sareng masalah Jordan Valley. Israél nungtut neraskeun ayana militér di lebak salami sapuluh taun saatos perjanjian na ditanda tangan nalika PA satuju keur ninggalkeun ayana militer ngan ukur lima taun.
mt: The documents, according to leaked reports, will relate to border negotiations, which are being conducted by the Palestinians based on pre-1967 Six-Day War borders. Other topics covered include also the status of Jerusalem, which is holy to both states and the Jordan Valley. Israel demands the removal of troops from the valley ten years after the signing of the agreement, when the PA agreed to leave troops only five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "Babar di Hong Kong, Ma kuliah di Universitas New York sareng Institut Hukum Harvard teras pernah gaduh ""green card"", nyaéta ijin linggih salamina di Amerika. Hsieh nyiratkeun nalika pamilihan éta Ma  panginten kabur ninggalkeun nagara salila krisis éta. Hsieh ogé nyatakeun yén Ma anu fotogénik téh langkung gaya wungkul tibatan watak aslina. Sanajan beunang tuduhan-tuduhan eta, Ma meunang babari di platform anu ngadukung hubungan anu leuwih deukeut ka daratan Cina."
mt: "In Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and has previously held a "green card," a permit to live in the United States. Hsieh said that during the crisis, Ma fled the country. Hsieh also noted that the photogenic Ma is more glamorous than her true nature. Despite these allegations, Ma won the platform that supports a closer relationship with the mainland China."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."

src: Saatos katingali seueur kulawarga anu néangan bantuan hukum keur ngalawan pangusiran, hiji rapat diayakeun kaping 20 Maret di East Bay Community Law Center keur korban panipuan padumukan. Nalika nu nyéwa nyaritakeun anu tos kajadian ka aranjeuna, seseueurna kulawargi nu kaajak nyadar upami Carolyn Wilson ti OHA parantos maok acis jaminan aranjeuna, teras kabur wéh ka luar kota. Panyewa di Lockwood Gardens percaya yén aya kamungkinan 40 atawa leuwih kulawarga nu nyanghareupan pangusiran, sabab aranjeunna terang yén pulisi OHA ogé nalungtik perumahan umum di Oakland nu tiasa kajiret dina panipuan perumahan.
mt: 20 March, a meeting was held at the East Bay Community Law Center for victims of eviction. When the landlord told the tenants what had happened to them, some of the tenants realized that Carolyn Wilson of OHA had moved out of the house, and then fled the city. Tenants in Lockwood Gardens believe that there is a possibility of 40 or more families facing eviction, because they know that OHA police also investigated public housing in Oakland that could be raided in the housing of the house.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: dinu balap eta, Keselowski jadi pamuncak Drivers' Championship ku 2,250 poin Tinggaleun tujuh poin, Johnson aya di urutan ka dua kalawan 2,243. Di urutan katilu, Hamlin katinggaleun dua puluh poin, tapi lima poin payuneun Bowyer. Kahne sareng Truex, Jr. aya di urutan kalima sareng kagenep, masing masing tos ngempelkeun 2.220 sareng 2.207 poin. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, sareng Harvick ngeusian posisi sapuluh besar di Kejuaraan Balap anu dimana aya keneh sesa opat kali balap deui di musim ieu.
mt: Keselowski became the points leader in the Drivers' Championship with 2,250 points, seven points ahead of Johnson in second. Hamlin moved up to third, but only five points ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are in fifth and sixth, respectively, with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top ten in the Chase, with four races remaining in the season.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Ieu dipercaya janten kalima kalina dina sajarah yén jalma-jalma parantos diperhatoskeun naon bahan kimia mars anu dikonfirmasi turun ka Bumi. Ti kira-kira 24,000 météorit anu dipikanyaho tos labuh ka Bumi, ngan kira-kira 34 anu atos dipastikeun asalna ti Mars. Lima belas batu ieu teh mangrupikeun hasil tina hujan meteor di bulan Juli kamari. Sababaraha batu, anu jarang pisan aya di Bumi, tiasa dijual ti $11,000 AS dugi ka $22,500 per ons-na, sakitar sapuluh kali lipet ti harga emas.
mt: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have been alerted to a possible Martian meteorite that has been confirmed to have fallen to Earth. Of the approximately 24,000 meteorites known to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been confirmed to be of Martian origin. Fifteen of these rocks are the result of a meteor shower in July this year. Some of the rocks, which are rare on Earth, can be sold for between $11,000 and $22,500 per ounce, about ten times the price of gold.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Schumacer anu pénsiun di taun 2006 saatos kéngingkeun kajawaraan Formula 1 7 kali, dijadwalkeun ngagentos Felipe Massa anu nuju cilaka. Pembalap Brasil cilaka parah tina sirah saatos tabrakan dina pahelatan Hungarian Grand Prix 2009. Massa diperkirakeun teu ngiringan sahenteuna usum 2009.
mt: 2006 Formula One champion Michael Schumacher, who retired after winning seven titles, is scheduled to replace Felipe Massa, who was seriously injured in a crash. Brazilian Massa is expected to miss the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Dugi ka ayeuna, AOL parantos ngagerakeun sareng ngembangkeun pasar IM ku lajuna nyalira, kusabab dianggé ku saantéro Amérika Serikat. Kusabab panataan éta, kabébasan ieu téh kamungkinan bakal moal aya deui. Jumlah nu nganggo Yahoo! sareng Microsoft anu digabungkeun bakal saingan sareng jumlah pelanggan AOL.
mt: As of now, AOL continues to develop and expand its IM market share, as it is dominated by American users. Because of this, this freedom may not be available again. The number of users of Yahoo! and Microsoft combined will compete with the number of AOL subscribers.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Hiji bom mobil diledakeun dina markas pulisi di Gaziantep, Turki kamari isuk, maehan 2 patugas pulisi sareng nyilakakeun langkung ti duapuluh jalmi nu sanes. Kantor gubernur nyatakeun salapan belas jalmi anu cidera téh nyaéta aparat pulisi. Polisi nyarios aranjeunna curiga ka tersangka militan Daesh (ISIL) anu bertanggung jawab dina serangan éta.
mt: A car bomb exploded at a police station in Gaziantep, Turkey this morning, injuring two police officers and killing more than twenty other people. The governor's office said seventeen of the injured were police officers. Police say they suspect the attack was carried out by Daesh (ISIL) militants.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Tilas gubernur Massachusetts Mitt Romney meunang pemilu présiden partai republik Florida dina dinten salasa kalawan langkung ti 46 persén soanten. Urut juru ngomong Gedung Putih Newt Gingrich aya di posisi kadua ku 32 persen. Salaku nagara bagéan anu unggul, Florida nyandak lima puluh atlitna ka Romney, ngadorong anjeunna maju janten calon anu pangpayuna pikeun nominasi Partéi Républik.
mt: Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Republican Party's Florida primary on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Newt Gingrich, a former House speaker, was in second place with 32 percent. As a state with the most delegates, Florida awarded 50 of its 57 delegates to Romney, propelling him to the front of the pack in the race for the Republican Party's nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.
