src: "Tilas ketua DPR New Gingrich, Gubernur Texas Rick Perry, jeung anggota kongres Michelle Bachmann masing-masing diurutan ka opat, lima, jeung ka genep. Saatos hasilna kaluar, Gingrich muji Santorum, tapi anjeunna rada ambek ka Romney kusabab iklan nu ngagogoréngna disiarkeun di Iowa ngalawan Gingrich. Perry nyatakeun bahwa anjeunna bakal ""balik deui ka texas ker nganilai hasil kaukus wengi ieu, nentukeun upami aya jalan keur anjeunna dina pamilihan ieu"", tapi salajeungna anjeunna nyarios bakal tetep dina pamilihan éta jeung berjuang di kaping 21 Januari keur pamilihan Carolina Kidul. Bachmann, anu meunang dina jajak panyawang Ames Straw bulan Agustus, mutuskeun pikeun ngeureunkeun kampanyeuna."
mt: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michelle Bachmann each finished fourth, fifth, and sixth respectively. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum, but he was a bit annoyed at Romney because of the negative ads aired against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas and reevaluate whether there is a path for him in this election"", but later he said he would continue in the race and fight on to the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "Stasiun radio eta ngagambarkeun pintonan eta minangka ""teater radio sakola sepuh kalawan puteran culun anu anyar sarta kabina-bina!"" Mimitina, program ieu ngan ukur disiarkeun dina situs radio internet TogiNet Radio anu parantos lami mengudara, éta teh situs anu difokuskeun kana radio wicara. Dina ahir 2015, Toginet ngadegkeun Astronet Radio minangka stasiun anak parusahaan. Acarana mimitina nampilkeun palaku sora pemula, wargi lokal Texas wétan."
mt: "This radio station describes itself as ""radio school theater with new and fresh voices and cabinets!""  Initially, this program was only broadcast on the TogiNet Radio website, which has been broadcasting for a long time, a site focused on radio talk.  In late 2015, Toginet launched Astronet Radio as a subsidiary station.  The initial lineup featured novice voice actors, local East Texas residents."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Penyerang Kota Mumbai dugi pikeun kapal dina kaping 26 November 2008, mawa granat Jeung senjata otomatis pikeun nembak loba target kaasup ririungan dina stasiun karéta api Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus sareng hotel kakoncara Hotel Taj Mahal. Tenjoan sareng pangumpulan informasi ti David Headley ngabantosan berlangsungna operasi panembakan ku 10 jagal tembak ti grup militan Pakistan anu gaduh nami Laskhar-e-Taiba. Serangan éta nempatkeun tekanan anu gedé dina hubungan India jeung Pakistan.
mt: 26 November 2008, a group of armed militants attacked the city of Mumbai, with grenades and automatic weapons to attack many targets including the railway station at Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus and the luxury hotel Taj Mahal Palace Hotel. Information from David Headley helped the operation to take place by 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack put great pressure on the relationship between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "Nadal saimbang ngalawan Kanada nyaéta 7-2. Anjeunna anyar éléh ngalawan Raonic dina Brisbane Open. Nadal kéngingkeun 88% poin bersih dina pertandingan kéngingkeun 76 poin dina tempat kahiji. Bérés pertandingan, Raja Clay nyarios, ""abdi bungah kusabab balik deui ka babak final ti acara nu paling penting. Abdi didieu keur meunangkeun ieu."""
mt: "Canada is tied 7-2. He just lost to Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal won 88% of the points in the match and won 76 points in the first set. After the match, King Clay said, "I am happy because I am back to the final of the most important event. I am ready to win this.""
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Minggu kamari, Naked News nyebarkeun yén aranjeunna bakal seueur ningkatkeun mandat basa internasional kanggo pelaporan berita, kalawan tilu siaran anyar. Saatos ngalaporkeun dina basa Inggris sareng Jepang, organisasi dunya ayeuna nerbitkeun program basa Spanyol, Itali, sareng Koréa, pikeun tipi, situs, sareng télpon sélulér.
mt: Last Sunday, Naked News announced it would greatly increase its international reporting mandate with three new broadcasts. After reporting in English and Japanese, the world organization now publishes programs in Spanish, Italian, and Korean, for web, site, and cell phone.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Di luar acara dinten Rebo, Carpanedo ngiluan 2 balapan peorangan di Kejuaraan. Mimitian keur anjeunna nyaeta Slalom, dimana anjeunna teu nepi akhir dina balapan mimitina. 36 ti 116 peserta nu sanes nampi hasil nu sami di balapan eta. Dina pertandingan nu sanés, Giant Slalom, katingal anjeunna réngsé di tempat kasapuluh kalayan waktos gabungan sakabeh pertandingan 4:41.30, 2:11.60 menit langkung laun ti juara kahiji Austrian Claudia Loesch jeung 1:09.02 menit ti juara kasalapan Gyöngyi Dani nu dongkap ti Hungaria. Opat pemaén ski di grup istri téh gagal ngaréngsékeun lombana, teras 45 ti sadaya 117 pemaén teu kéngéng peringkat di perlombaan éta.
mt: On Thursday, Carpanedo competed in two individual events at the Championships. First was Slalom, where he did not finish the first run. 36 of 116 competitors who did not receive the same result in this run. In the second event, Giant Slalom, he finished in tenth place with a combined time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than Austrian champion Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the eighth-place finisher Gyöngyi Dani from Hungary. Four female skiers failed to finish the event, leaving 45 of the 117 competitors without a ranking in this event.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. src: Dina Rebo, Persatuan Bola Basket Amerika Serikat (NBA) nunda musim baskét ahli margi prihatin ngeunaan COVID-19. Kaputusan NBA ieu kusabab hasil tes pamaen Utah Jazz anu positif beunang virus COVID-19.
mt: On Friday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) postponed its season due to concerns over the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19). The NBA's decision came after Utah Jazz player Rudy Gobert tested positive for COVID-19.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Pamaen Dinten ieu nyaeta Alex Ovechkin ti Washington Capitals. Anjeunna nyétak 2 gol sareng 2 bantosan dina kamenangan 5-3 Washington ka Atlanta Thrashers. Umpat mimiti Ovechkin's di pertandingan wengi ieu nyaéta gol kameunangan ku pemaén muda Nicklas Backstrom; Gol kadua anjeunna éta téh gol ka 60 anjeunna di musim ieu, anjeunna janten pamaén kahiji anu nyetak 60 gol langkung dina samusim ti saprak 1995 - 96, anu kantos oge diraih ku Jaromir Jagr sareng Mario Lemieux.
mt: Tonight's player of the day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He scored two goals and two assists in the Capitals' 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first goal of the night was a game-winner by young Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal was his 60th of the season, making him the first player to score 60 goals in a season since 1995-96, when it was also accomplished by Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: Bank Northern Rock parantos dinasionalisasi di taun 2008 saatos bewara lamun pausahaan nampi dukungan darurat ti Pamaréntah Inggris Raya. Batu Kaler parantos ngabutuhkeun dukungan kusabab paparanna nalika krisis hipotek subprima taun 2007. Grup Budha Sir Richard Branson ngalebetkeun tawaran kanggo bank anu ditolak sateuacan nasionalisasi bank. Taun 2010, nalika dinasionalisasi, bank jalan raya Northern Rock  Plc ayeuna dipisahkeun ti 'bank jahat', Northern Rock (Manajémen Asét). Virgin ngan ngagaleuh 'bank anu saé' di Northern Rock, sanes perusahaan manajemén asét.
mt: Northern Rock was nationalised in 2008 after it received emergency support from the British government. The bank was forced to seek support after its share price collapsed during the 2007 subprime mortgage crisis. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group made an offer for the bank before it was nationalised. In 2010, when it was nationalised, Northern Rock Plc is now split from 'bad bank', Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only owns 'good bank' in Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Kaputusan Pak Rudd pikeun nandatangan perjanjian iklik Kyoto ngasingkeun Amerika Serikat, anu ayeuna bakal janten hiji-hijina nagara maju anu henteu ngaratifikasi perjanjian eta. Tilas pamaréntahan konservatif Australia nampik kanggo meratifikasi Kyoto, nyarios yén éta bakal ngaruksak ékonomi kalawan kagumantungan anu ageung kana ékspor batubara, sedengkeun nagara sapertos India sareng Tiongkok henteu terikat ku udagan émisi.
mt: Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto protocol isolates the United States, which will now be the only major developed country not to ratify the agreement.  The previous conservative Australian government rejected Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy by relying too heavily on coal exports, while countries such as India and China are not bound by emissions targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Panémbak dina uji cobi pengendalian hama tambahan kedah diawasi sacara heureut ku penjaga, margi uji cobi dipantau sareng épektivitasna dinilei. Dina kamitraan NPWS jeung Asosiasi Penembak Olahraga Australia (NSW) Inc., relawan anu nyumponan syarat direkrut di bawah program perburuan Asosiasi Penembak Olahraga. Nurutkeun Mick O'Flynn, Direktur Palaksana Perlindungan Taman jeung Pusaka sareng NOWS, 4 panémbak nu atos dipilih kanggo operas panémbakan nu kahiji téh tos nampi wawaran kanggo kaamanan sareng atos dilatih ogé.
mt: The shooters in the trial must be closely monitored by guards, as the trial is monitored and its effectiveness is evaluated. In a partnership with the NSW National Parks and Wildlife Service (NPWS) and the Australian Shooting Association (NSW) Inc., volunteers who meet the requirements are recruited under the Hunting Association program. According to Mick O'Flynn, Director of the Conservation and Heritage Protection and NOWS, 4 shooters who were selected for the first hunting operation have already received a safety notice and have also been trained.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "Dumasarkeun fosil iyeu, berarti pamisahanna leuwih awal tibatan anu ditunjukkeun ku bukti molekuler. Éta hartosna sadayana kedah dipulangkeun,"" saur panaliti di Layanan Panalungtikan Rift Valley di Étiopia sareng salah sahiji panulis panalungtikan, Berhane Asfaw."
mt: "Based on the fossils, it means the split was earlier than indicated by molecular evidence. That means everything has to be rethought," said one of the study's researchers, Berhane Asfaw, of the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia.
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Dina presentasi poe Kemis ku Tokyo Game Show, presiden Nintendo Satoru Iwata ngaluarkeun desain pengontrol kanggo konsol Nintendo Revolution anu anyar. Sarupa jeung remot TV, pangontrol make dua sensor anu aya di deukeut pangguna TV pikeun ngukur posisina dina ruangan tilu dimensi. Ieu bakal nyieun pamaén ngendalikeun tindakan sareng gerakan na dina pidéo gém ku cara ngalihkeun alat na ka udara.
mt: In a Thursday presentation at the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the design of the controller for the company's new Revolution console. Similar to a TV remote, the controller has two sensors near the user's TV to measure their position in three dimensions. This will allow players to control actions and movements in a video game by moving the controller through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Sateuacanna, media berita Cina, Xinhua, ngalaporkeun bakal aya kapal anu dibajak. Laporan anyar nyatakeun yén pesawat nampi ancaman bom ku kituna penerbangan  dialihkeun deui ka Afghanistan sareng pesawat kasebut ngadarat di Kandahar. Laporan saacanna nyebarkeun bahwa kapal eta dibalikkeun deui ka Afganistan pas beres ditolak keur mendarat darurat di Urumqi.
mt: Previously, Chinese media Xinhua reported that a hijacked ship was involved. The latest report states that the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted again to Afghanistan and the plane landed in Kandahar. The previous report spread that the ship was diverted again to Afghanistan after being refused to land in an emergency in Urumqi.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "Dinten Senén, Sara Danius, sekretaris permanén Komite Nobel pikeun Sastra di Akademi Swedia, umum diumumkeun salila hiji program radio dina Sveriges Radio di Swedia nu panitia, teu tiasa ngahontal langsung Bob Dylan ngeunaan unggul 2016 Nobel Prize dina karya Sastra, geus ditinggalkeun usaha anak pikeun ngahontal manéhna. Danius nyarios, ""Ayeuna urang henteu ngalakukeun nanaon. Abdi parantos nelepon jeung ngirim surél ka kolaborator anu pangdeketna jeung anjeunna sareng waleranna téh soméah pisan. Kanggo ayeuna, éta cekap."""
mt: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Swedish Academy for Literature, announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden that the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had left a message with his closest collaborator and wife, who was unavailable. "We're not doing anything right now," Danius said. "We've tried to call and send a letter to his closest collaborator and wife, who is very busy."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "Presiden Amerika Serikat George W. Bush ngabageakeun bewara éta. Juru bicara Bush Gordon Johndroe nyebut yen jangji Korea Utara ""lengkah anu mantep pikeun tujuan denuklirisasi semenanjung Korea anu bisa diverifikasi."""
mt: "U.S. President George W. Bush condemned the threat. White House spokesman Gordon Johndroe said the statement was a "positive step toward the verified denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "Dina 1956 Slaina ngalih ka Swedia, dimana 3 taun saatosna téh anjeun mimiti damel di kantor pos Swedia sareng janten tukang ngukir utama anjeunna. Anjeunna ngahasilkeun langkung ti 1,000 perangko kanggo Swedia sarta 28 nagara lianna. Karyana gaduh kualitas sareng rinci anjeunna mangrupikeun 1 ti sababaraha nu lain ""ngaran somah"" di antara philatelists. Sababaraha ngahususkeun pikeun ngumpulkeun pagawéanna nyalira. Perangkona anu ka 1.000 nyaéta ""Perlakuan Hadé Raja Swedia"" anu luar biasa ku David Klocker Ehrenstrahl di 2000, anu lebet ka daftar Buku Rékor Dunya Guinness. Anjeunna ogé kallebet dina ngukir artos kanggo sababaraha nagara, salah sahiji contona nyaéta gambar perdana menteri dina payun artos $5 sareng $100 dollar Kanada anu anyar."
mt: 1956, he moved to Sweden, where three years later he began working at the Swedish Post Office and became the main engraver. He produced more than 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work has quality and detail that he is one of the few who are not "nameless" among philatelists. Some are devoted to collecting his work. The stamp of 1,000 is "The Hard Treatment of the Swedish King" by David Klocker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is included in the Guinness Book of World Records. He also engraved the portraits for several countries, one example is the first prime minister in the portrait of $5 and $100 Canadian dollars.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Sistem jalur pipa trans-Alaska anu panjang na 800 mil teh ditutup heula kusabab aya minyak atah bahe di Fairbank kidul, Alaska. Listrik konslét saatos nguji sistem paréntah-seuneu rutin nyababkeun klep pelepas kabuka lega sareng minyak tanah mudal caket pompa Fort Greely 9. Pamukaan katup tiasa ngalepaskeun tekanan keur sistem sareng ngalirkeun oli kana tangki nu ngaliwatan bantalan nu tiasa nampung 55.000 tong (2,3 juta galon). Dugi ka Rebo soré, liang hawa tank masih keneh bocor kamungkianan kusabab hawa panas dina jero tank naék. area tambihan paranti nunda barang nu sejenna di handap ieu bisa nampung 104,500 tong eta ge can ka eusian kabeh
mt: The Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, which is 800 miles long, was closed because of a leak of crude oil in Fairbanks, south, Alaska. Electricity was cut off after a routine test caused a valve to open wide and oil flowed into the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valve could release pressure for the system and flow oil into a tank that can hold 55,000 tons (2.3 million gallons). By Friday morning, the tank was still leaking because the heat inside the tank rose. The area of the spill could hold 104,500 tons and could contain all of the oil.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Sistem jalur pipa trans-Alaska anu panjang na 800 mil teh ditutup heula kusabab aya minyak atah bahe di Fairbank kidul, Alaska. Listrik konslét saatos nguji sistem paréntah-seuneu rutin nyababkeun klep pelepas kabuka lega sareng minyak tanah mudal caket pompa Fort Greely 9. Pamukaan katup tiasa ngalepaskeun tekanan keur sistem sareng ngalirkeun oli kana tangki nu ngaliwatan bantalan nu tiasa nampung 55.000 tong (2,3 juta galon). Dugi ka Rebo soré, liang hawa tank masih keneh bocor kamungkianan kusabab hawa panas dina jero tank naék. area tambihan paranti nunda barang nu sejenna di handap ieu bisa nampung 104,500 tong eta ge can ka eusian kabeh
mt: The Trans-Alaska Pipeline System, which is 800 miles long, was closed because of a leak of crude oil in Fairbanks, south, Alaska. Electricity was cut off after a routine test caused a valve to open wide and oil flowed into the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valve could release pressure for the system and flow oil into a tank that can hold 55,000 tons (2.3 million gallons). By Friday morning, the tank was still leaking because the heat inside the tank rose. The area of the spill could hold 104,500 tons and could contain all of the oil.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: Korps insinyur A.S ngira-ngira curah hujan 6 inci tiasa nembus tanggul anu samemehna geus ruksak. Bangsal Kasalapan, anu ngalaman caah saluhur 20 suku salila Badai Katrina, ayeuna karendem cai saluhur cangkéng kusabab tanggul di deukeutna na ngaluap. Cai ngaleber dina tanggul dina bagian anu lebarna 100 kaki.
mt: The US Army Corps of Engineers estimates that 6 inches of rain could breach the levees, which have already been damaged.  The Crescent City, which has been flooded for over 20 years since Hurricane Katrina, is now under water up to the chest because the levees in the area have breached.  The water has flooded the levees in a 100-foot wide area.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton mastikeun Howard University Hospital ngaku pasien dina kaayan sae Pasién éta pernah indit ka Nigeria, anu dimana pirus Ebola muncul. Rumah sakit tos ngiringan protokol keur ngontrol penyebaran, kaasup dina misahkeun pasien ti nu sanés keur nyegah kamungkinan nyebarkeun ka batur.
mt: Hamilton confirmed that Howard University Hospital admitted a patient who had recently traveled to Nigeria, where the Ebola virus first appeared. The hospital is following protocols to control the spread, including isolating the patient from others to prevent possible spread to others.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Komet panginten tiasa janten sumber pangiriman cai ka bumi bareng jeung bahan organic anu tiasa ngabentuk protein sareng ngadukung kahirupan. Para élmuwan hoyong terang kumaha mimitina planet kabentuk, utamina kumaha Bumi kabentuk, saprak komet nabrak Bumi basa kapungkur.
mt: Comets may have brought water to Earth along with organic material that could have formed proteins and supported life. Scientists are trying to figure out how planets formed, especially how Earth formed, since comets hit the Earth in the past.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Samentara aparat teu yakin kana ancaman éta, Aparat Transportasi Maryland nutup ku ngadesak FBI. Treuk sampah dimanfaatkeun pikeun nutupan lawang torowongan jeung 80 pulisi siap ngabantos kanggo ngarahkeun pengendara motor supados malik arah. Teu aya katelatan patalimarga anu dilaporkeun di jalur beltway, jalur alternatip dayeuh.
mt: While authorities were unsure of the threat, Maryland Transportation Authority closed the tunnel with the FBI. Trash trucks were used to block the entrance and 80 police were ready to direct drivers to turn around. No reported accidents were reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "Fotografer dicandak ka Rumah Sakit Ronald Reagan UCLA, dimana anjeunna pupus. Anjeunna dilaporkeun usiana 20 taunan. Dina hiji pernyataan, Bieber nyatakeun ""sanajan abdi teu aya didinya sareng teu terlibat dina kacilakaan tragis eta, abdi turut belasungkawa ka kaluwargi korban."" Situs web wartos hiburan TMZ ngartos yen fotografer ngeureunkeun tumpakan na di sisi sanes Sepulveda Boulevard sarta usaha kanggo nyokot gambar ti pangeureunan pulisi sateuacan nyeberang jalan sarta neruskeun, nyorong patugas pulisi patroli jalan tol California anu ngalakukeun ngaeureunkeun lalar-liwat kanggo miwarang na balik,dua kali. Numutkeun pulisi, supir kendaraan anu nabrak fotografer eta moal mungkin nyanghareupan tungtutan pidana."
mt: "The photographer was taken to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he died. He was reported to be 20 years old. In a statement, Bieber said, "Although I was not present and was told while performing at the Grammy's that there was an accident involving my car, I want to make it clear to everyone that I was not behind the wheel of my car and had left all business in LA the day before, and was nowhere near the accident." TMZ entertainment news site reports that the photographer was knocked down on the side of the road opposite Sepulveda Boulevard and was trying to take a picture of police officers before crossing the road and continuing, hitting a California Highway Patrol officer who was conducting a traffic stop for a vehicle that was illegally crossing the road, twice. According to police, the driver who hit the photographer may not be facing criminal charges."
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Arias parantos diuji positip jang virus hampang, saur Présidén Menteri Rodrigo Arias. Kondisi présiden teh stabil, tapi anjeunna bakal diisolasi di bumina sababaraha dinten. Iwal ti harééng jeung peurih tikoro, urang ngarasa cageur jeung nuluykeun padamelan ti jarak jauh. Kuring ngarepkeun bakal balik deui ka pagawéan kuring dinten Senén,"" saur Arias dina hiji pernyataan."
mt: "Arias tested positive for the virus, said President Minister Rodrigo Arias. The president's condition is stable, but he will be isolated for several days. Except for the staff and the press, we feel sad and continue working from afar. I hope to return to work on Monday," said Arias in a statement."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Dina puncakna, Angin Gonu Tropis, anu namina dicandak ti sakantung daun palem dina basa Maladewa, ngahontal angin anu tuluy 240 kilometer per jam (149 mil per jam). Dina awal poe ayeuna, angin sakitar 83 km / jam, sareng diperkirakeun bakal terus ngeleuleuskeun.
mt: At its peak, the Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named after the Maldivian word for coconut palm, reached winds of up to 149 miles per hour (240 km/h). Early today, winds were around 52 mph (83 km/h), and are expected to continue to increase.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Ombak beureum disababkeun ku konsentrasi Karenia brevis anu langkung luhur ti normal, organisme laut bersel tunggal anu lumangsung sacara alami. Faktor alami tiasa pangaruh keur ngahasilkeun kaayaan nu ideal, nu matak ganggang jumlahna gancang pisan nambahna. Alga ngahasilkeun neurotoksin anu bisa ngarusak saraf jelema jeung lauk. Lauk sering paéh kusabab loba racun di jero cai. Manusa tiasa katepaan tina ngahirup cai anu tos katepaan anu kacandak ku angin sareng ombak.
mt: The red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a single-celled marine organism that occurs naturally. Natural factors can contribute to ideal conditions, which cause the algae to rapidly increase in number. The algae produce neurotoxins that can damage the nervous system of humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high levels of toxins in the water. People can be poisoned by drinking water that has been contaminated by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Felicia, pernah jadi kategori 4 badai Saffir-Simpson ngalemah janten depresi tropis sateuacan ngaleungit dinten Salasa. Sésa badai éta ngahasilkeun hujan di kalolobaan pulo, sanaos dugi ka ayeuna, teu aya karusakan atanapi banjir nu dilaporkeun. Curah hujan nepi 6,34 inci gauge di Oahu. Iyeu dianggap ""nguntungkeun"". Sababaraha kali hujan dibarengan ku angin tarik jeung sering dibarengan ku kilat kingkilaban."
mt: "Felicia, was a category 4 hurricane on the Saffir-Simpson scale before it dissipated on Tuesday. The remnants of the storm brought rain to many islands, but there have been no reports of damage or flooding. Oahu received 6.34 inches of rain. This is considered ""beneficial"". Several times the rain was accompanied by strong winds and was often accompanied by lightning."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. tabrakan di balapan Grand Prix Singapura di taun 2008 saatos eureun langkung gancang di pit stop nu mimiti pikeun Fernando Alonso, nu matak nyieun mobil kaamanan turun tangan. Nalika mobil-mobil di payuneun Alonso lebet pikeun ngisi bénsin di handap mobil kaamanan, teras anjeunna nyusul keur menangkeun balapan. Piquet Jr. dipecat saeunggeus Grand Priz Hungaria taun 2009.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix crash occurred when Piquet Jr. overtook Fernando Alonso on the first pit stop. While the cars were lining up to refuel behind the safety car, he passed Alonso. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Hasil panalitian anu diterbitkeun poe Kemis di Jurnal Sains ngalaporkeun pembentukan spésies manuk anyar di Kapuloan Galapagos, Ekuador. Panaliti ti Universitas Princeton di Amérika Serikat sareng Universitas Uppsala di Swédia ngalaporkeun spésiés anyar anu berevolusi ngan dina dua generasi, sanajan proses ieu téh ngabutuhkeun waktos nu kantun lami, kusabab pengembangbiakan antara Finch Darwin éndemik, Geospiza fortes, sareng kaktus Finch Imigran, Geospiza conirostris.
mt: A study published Thursday in the journal Science reports the creation of a new bird species on the Galapagos Islands, Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden report a new species that evolved in just two generations, although the process took a long time, because of breeding between the endemic Darwin's finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Acara artistik éta téh mangrupikeun bagian kampanye ti Balé kota Bucharest anu ngupayakeun ngaluncurkeun deui citra ibukota Romania sebagai kota metropolitan anu berwarna sareng kreatip. Kota ieu bakal janten kota anu pangpayunna di tenggara Eropa anu janten tuan rumah CowParade, acara seni umum pangageungna sadunya, antara bulan Juni sareng Agustus taun ayeuna.
mt: The event is part of a campaign by Bucharest City Hall to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a colorful and creative metropolitan city. It will be the first city in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, from June to August this year.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Pesawat ieu angkat ka Irkutsk sareng dioprasikeun ku pasukan jero. Penyelidikan diayakeun pikeun nalungtik. Pasawat militer Il-76 mangrupikeun komponen utama pikeun kakuatan militer Rusia sareng Soviet ti saprak taun 1970an, sareng tos ngalaman kacilakaan serius di Rusia bulan kamari. Kaping  7 Oktober, hiji mesin kapisah pas mulai ngapung, tanpa nyebabkeun cidera. Rusia teras nyetop Il-76s saatos kacilakaan éta.
mt: The plane was flying to Irkutsk and was operated by the military. An investigation is underway to determine the cause. The military Il-76 is a key component of the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and has previously experienced serious crashes in Russia this month. On October 7, a separate engine caught fire, without causing any injuries. Russia has grounded Il-76s after this crash.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Sateuacanna The Simpsons Simon tos gawe dina sababaraha acara dina rupa-rupa jabatan. Dina taun 1980an anjeuna gawé dina acara-acara siga Taxi, Cheers, jeung Tracy Ullman Show. Dina taun 1989 anjeunna ngabantosan nyiptakeun The Simpsons babarengan Brooks sareng Groening, jeung boga tanggung jawab ngarékrut tim panulis munggaran jang acara éta. Sanajan ninggalkeun tina acara di taun 1993, anjeunna masih nyekel gelar produser éksekutif, sarta tuluy narima honor sapuluh juta dolar unggal usumna.
mt: Previously, The Simpsons has appeared in various other shows in various roles. In the 1980s, he worked on shows like Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for recruiting the original writing team for that show. Although he left the show in 1993, he still held the title of executive producer, and later accepted a ten million dollar honorarium each season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke nyeratkeun yén usaha sababaraha jalmi pikeun ngahalangan istri nyarios ngeunaan kesehatan istri téh teu aya hasil. Anjeunna ngagaduhan kacindekan ieu kusabab seueur komentar positip sareng dukungan anu di kirimkeun ka dua awéwé sareng lalaki anu ngadesek yén ubar kontrasépsi dianggap kabutuhan medis.
mt: Fluke wrote that efforts by some individuals to prevent their wives from speaking about their health had failed. They had obtained this injunction because of several positive comments and support sent to two women and a man who had argued that contraceptives were considered a medical necessity.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: "iyeu bakal siga cai. Transparan siga sakumaha cai"". Jadi, lamun maneh nangtung disisi laut, maneh tiasa ningali kerikil jeung babatuan di hanap laut. Sakumaha anu urang terang, ngan aya hiji awak planét anu ningalikeun dinamisme leuwih ti Titan, namina téh Bumi,"" saur Stofan."
mt: "It will be like water. Transparent like water." So, if you stand on the side of the ocean, you can see the pebbles and the sand on the bottom of the ocean. Just as we know, there is only one planetary body that can see the dynamics more than Titan, its name is Earth,"" said Stofan.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Hal iyeu teu ngan mastikeun lamun aya sababaraha dinosaurus anu boga bulu, hiji teori anu geus nyebar, tapi teu tiasa nunjukeun detail fosil anu cukup, siga warna jeung susunan 3 dimensina. Élmuwan nyatakeun yén bulu sato éta luhurna coklat kastanye nanging bagéan handapna pias atanapi karotenoid. Pendakan éta masihan wawasan dina parobahan bulu-bulu manuk. Kusabab bulu dinosaurus henteu gaduh poros anu saé perkembanganana, anu disebut rachis, tapi gaduh ciri-ciri bulu sanesna - cucuk sareng barbules - panaliti nyimpulkeun yén rachis sigana mah hasil tina épolusi langkung ahir tibatan ciri-ciri nu lainna. Struktur bulu na nunjukkeun yén éta henteu dianggo kanggo hiber tapi pikeun ngaturan suhu atanapi tampilan. Panalungtik ngusulkeun yén, sanaos ieu buntut dinosaurus anu ngora, conto ieu nunjukkeun bulu anu déwasa sanés bulu hayam. Para peneliti mikeun gambaran yen, sanaos ieu teh buntut dinosaurus anom, sampel nembongkeun bulu sawawa sarta sanes anak.
mt: This report does not confirm whether there were any dinosaurs with feathers, a widely spread theory, but cannot show the details of the fossil, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. Scientists have revealed that the color of the feathers was chestnut brown but the lower part was either yellow or carotenoid. This discovery provides insight into the evolution of bird feathers. Because the dinosaur feathers lacked a proper rachis, but had other characteristics of feathers - quills and barbules - researchers concluded that the rachis was a later development than the other characteristics. The structure of the feathers indicates that they were not used for insulation but for temperature or display. Researchers suggest that, although this is a tail of a dinosaur, the sample shows adult feathers and not baby feathers.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Sanaos aya hiji vaksin hasil ékspérimen anu mungkin bakal tiasa ngirangan jumlah korban jiwa akibat ebola, tapi dugi ka kiwari, teu acan aya landong anu jelas kabuktosan tiasa ngalandongan inféksina. Hiji koktail antibodi, ZMapp, mimitina katingali ngajanjikeun di lapangan, nanging studi resmi nunjukkeun yén manpaatna langkung alit tibatan anu dipilarian, nyaéta nyegah pati. Dina tés PALM, ZMapp lalakon salaku kontrol, anu hartosna élmuwan nganggo éta salaku titik awal pikeun ngabandingkeun tilu parawatan sanés.
mt: While there is a vaccine in experimental trials that may reduce the number of deaths from Ebola, there is no proven treatment for the disease. A cocktail of antibodies, ZMapp, initially looked promising in the field, but official studies showed that it was less effective than the placebo, which scientists used as a starting point to compare three other treatments.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Dina dinten Senen, para ilmuan ti Universitas Stanford Fakultas Kedokteran ngumumkeun manggihan alat diagnosa anyar anu tiasa misahkeun sel didasarkeun jenisna: chip leutik anu tiasa dicetak ngagunakeun printer inkjet standar sareng biaya masing-masing sakitar hiji sen Dollar Amerika. Nu mimpin penelitian éta nyarios bahwa ieu téh tiasa ngadeteksi kanker, tbc, HIV sareng malaria leuwih awal keur pasien di negara miskin, anu dimana tingkat bertahan hidup na jang panyakit kos kanker payudaya ngan saukur satengah ti negara-negara nu beunghar.
mt: On Monday, Stanford University medical school researchers announced a new diagnostic tool that can distinguish between different types of cells: a tiny chip that can be printed using a standard inkjet printer and costs about a dollar each. Leading the study, he said that this could detect cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria earlier for patients in poor countries, where the survival rate for cancer is only half that of rich countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Para élmuwan atos mendakan bentang alam anu ancur di dataran bulan nu disebat lobate scarps sigana kusabab bulan ngaalitan saalit-saalit. Tanda ieu katingali di sadaya bulan sareng katempo di cuaca anu minimal, nunjukkeun yén kajadian geologis anu nyiptakeuna hasil anu anyar. Teori ieu bertentangan sareng claim yén bulan henteu ngagaduhan kagiatan géologis.
mt: Scientists have long debated the origin of the lunar landscape's "lobate scarps," which they believe were formed by the moon's crust contracting as it cooled. These features are seen on all the moon's major craters and are most prominent in the moon's coldest regions, suggesting that they are the result of recent geological activity. This theory contradicts claims that the moon has no geological activity.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "Adekoya parantos di Pangadilan Edinburgh Sheriff dituduh kalayan ngabunuh putrana. Anjeunna keur ditahan sareng nungguan dakwaan sareng sidang, tapi buktos saksi mata rada kacemar kusabab gambar anjeunna tos seueur dipublikasikeun. Iyeu biasa dilakukan ditempat lain di Inggris tapi peradilan Skotlandia garawe sacara bareda jeung pengadilan ngaranggap publikasi foto berpotensi ngarugikeun. Profesor Pamela Ferguson ti Universitas Dundee nyatet ""wartawan sigana leumpang dina garis anu bahaya lamun nyebarkeun foto tersangka jsb."" Kantor Mahkota, nu mana nyekel tanggung jawab dina penuntutan, tos nunjukkeun ka wartawan yén moal aya koméntar salajengna dugi ka dakwaan."
mt: "A teenager appeared in Edinburgh Sheriff Court accused of murdering his son. He is being held and awaiting charges and trial, but witnesses are confused because his picture has been widely published. This is common in other parts of England but Scottish courts are wary and consider publication of photos potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee said ""journalists are treading on dangerous ground if they disseminate suspect photos."" The Crown Office, which oversees prosecutions, has advised journalists not to comment further until charges are laid."
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Salain es anu ancur, cuaca anu jore oge ngahambat upaya panyelametan. Pittman masihan terang yén ieu moal ningkat dugi ka minggu payun. Jumlah sareng kandelna lapisan és, numutkeun ka Pittman, mangrupikeun anu paling parah pikeun tukang moro anjing laut dina 15 taun.
mt: In addition to the melting ice, the weather also hampered the rescue effort. Pittman said this was not improving until last week. The thickness and extent of the ice layer, according to Pittman, is the worst in 15 years for the dogsled teams.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: "Roberts teges nolak nyarios perihal iraha kahirupan dimimitian, hiji pertanyaan penting lamun mikirkeun tentang étika aborsi, nyarios yén teu pantes koméntar dina kasus nu spésipik siga éta. Nanging, manehna ngulangi deui pernyataan sateuacana margi Roe v. Wade nyaeta ""hukum tata negara"" nekankeun pentingna kaputusan Mahkamah Agung anu konsisten. Anjeunna ogé negaskeun bahwa anjeunna percaya ka hak privasi tersirat anu ngagantung kana kaputusan Roe."
mt: "Roberts declined to comment on what life begins, an important question if one is thinking about the ethics of abortion, saying that it is not appropriate to comment on a specific case like that. But he reiterated his previous statement that the Supreme Court's decision in Roe v. Wade is "the law of the land" and that he believes in the consistent decisions of the Supreme Court. He also denied that he believes in the implied right to privacy that underlies the decision in Roe."
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Pas tepat tabuh 8:46 enjing, nalika dayeuh keur sepi pisan, nyirian waktos anu pas pikeun kapal jet mimiti ngahantem sasaranna. 2 senter atos di pasang pikeun nyorot ka langit sapeupeuting. Pamekaran lima gedong pancakar langit anyar nuju lumangsung di lokasi, sareng pusat transportasi sarta astana di tengahna.
mt: 2 minutes before 8:46 am, when the city was nearly empty, the time was perfect for the first jet to reach its destination. 5 buildings were erected in the area, and the transportation center and palace were in the middle.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

Pamekaran lima gedong pancakar langit anyar nuju lumangsung di lokasi, sareng pusat transportasi sarta astana di tengahna.

Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: "Sadayana lawang guha, anu dingaranan ""The 7 Sister"", sahenteuna 100 dugi 250 meter (328 dugi ka 820 kaki) dina diameter. Gambar infrared nunjukeun perubahan suhu ti beurang sareng peuting nunjukeun bahwa sigana éta téh guha. éta langkung tiis tibatan permukaan sakuriling siang sareng haneutna wengi. Laku-lampah suhu panasna teu stabil sapertos goa-goa ageung di Bumi nu suhuna stabil, tapi ieu janten stabil kusabab liang-liang jero dina taneuh,"" saur Glen Cushing di Survey Geologi Amérika Sarékat (SGAS) Tim Astrogéologi sareng Univérsitas Arizona Kalér aya di Flagstaff, Arizona."
mt: "All seven openings, named "The 7 Sister", are 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show temperature changes from day to night indicating that the object is a cave. It is colder than the surrounding surface during the day and warmer at night. The temperature of the hot object is not stable like the caves on Earth that have stable temperatures, but this is stable because the openings are deep in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Planetary Geology and University of Arizona Northern Arizona Observatory in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Lalaki éta diduga nyupiran kendaraan roda tilu anu aya bahan peledak ka kumpulan jelema. Lalaki anu disangka ngabeledug bom eta ditahan,sanggeus ngalaman tatu-tatu alatan bitu. Ngaranna heunteu kénéh dipikanyaho ku pihak berwenang, sanaos maranehanana teurang anjeunnya nyaéta anggota jumplukan etnis Uighur.
mt: The man is suspected of driving a three-wheeled vehicle containing explosives to a group of people. The suspected bomber was detained after suffering minor injuries from the blast. His name has not been released by authorities, but he is believed to be a member of the Uighur ethnic group.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Afrika Selatan ngelehkeun All Blacks (Selandia Baru) di pertandingan rugby union Tri Nations di stadion Royal Bakofeng di Rustenburg, Afrika Selatan. Skor paneuri ngan béda hiji poin, nyaéta 21 - 20. Ieu ngeureunkeun 15 kamenangan tutuluyan All Black. Pikeun Springboks, atos réngsé tilas éléh 5 patandingan. Éta pertandingan pamungkas pikeun All Blacks, anu atos menangkeun piala dua minggu katukang. Pertandingan pamungkas ti kompetisi eta bakal diayakeun di Ellis Park di Johannesburg minggon payun, pas Springboks ngalawan Australia.
mt: South Africa beat the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bakofeng stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The score was only one point apart, 21 - 20. This ended the All Black's 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, this ended a five game losing streak. This was the last match for the All Blacks, who won the trophy two weeks ago. The last match of the competition will be held at Ellis Park in Johannesburg on Saturday, as the Springboks play Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: Stasion luar angkasa teh netep tina kabiasaanana, kungsi kaleungitan giroskop dina tugas, nepi ka akhir spacewalk. Chiao sareng Sharipov ngalaporkeun, maranehna araya dina jarak anu aman ti mesin pendorong pangatur katinggian. Kontrol darat Rusia ngaktifkeun jet sareng malikkeun kaayaan stasiun janten normal.
mt: The station's attitude control system, which had been malfunctioning during the mission, was restored to normal operation. Russian ground controllers fired thrusters to reorient the station, and the crew was able to resume normal operations.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Kasus ieu dituntut di Virginia kusabab éta téh tempat asal keur penyedia layanan internét nu terkenal AOL, perusahaan anu micu tuduhan. Ieu anu pangmimitina hukuman nganggo undang-undang anu tos disahkeun di taun 2003 pikeun ngalarang Imél masal atawa spam, améh pangguna teu narima imel nu teu dipikahayang.
mt: The case is being prosecuted in Virginia because AOL, the Internet service provider, is based there and is the first company to be charged under the 2003 law that prohibits mass e-mailing, or spam, unless the recipient has agreed to receive it.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: 28 taun Vidal gabung ka Barca tilu musim katukang, ti Sevilla. Samenjak pindah ka ibukota Catalan, Vidal geus maén 49 pertandingan keur tim.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal joined Barca three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 games for the team.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: Jarque harita nuju latian dina latian pra-musim di Coverciano, di Italia. anjeunna cicing di hotél tim sateuacan pertandingan anu dijadwalkeun dinten Minggu ngalawan Bolonia Anjeunna netep di hotel tim sateuacan pertandingan anu direncanakeun kanggo Minggu ngalawan Bolonia.

src: teu aya nu masihan pepeling ngeunaan tsunami jeung ceunah ceuk Badan Geofisika Jakarta, moal aya pepeling ngeunaan tsunami kusabab lini na teh teu nepi kak 6.5 magnitudo. Sanajan teu aya ancaman tsunami, wargi parantos panik sareng langsung niggalkeun usaha sareng imahna.
mt: There were no tsunami warnings and no tsunami threat from the Indonesian Meteorological and Geophysical Agency, as the quake was only 6.5 on the Richter scale. However, people panicked and immediately abandoned their businesses and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Aranjeuna manggihan lamun matahari beroperasi numutkeun prinsip anu sami sareng bentang anu sanes; Aktifitas kabeh bentang dina sistem kapendak didorong ku cahayana, rotasina sorangan, eta hungkul. Luminositas sareng rotasi dianggo pikeun nangtukeun nomor bintang Rossby , anu nyambung jeung aliran plasma. Beuki leutik bilangan Rossby-na, beuki kurang aktif béntangna nu patali jeung pembalikan magnétna.
mt: It is found that if the Sun were to operate according to the same principles as a planet, all its activity would be driven by light, its own rotation, and that alone. Luminosity and rotation are used to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to plasma flow. The lower the star's Rossby number, the less active it is in relation to magnetic reversal.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Tina 1.400 urang ditaliti sateuacan pamilihan federal 2010, jalma anu nentang Australia anu janten republik tumuwuh 8 persén ti taun 2008. Dina kampanye pamilihan umum federal 2010, Perdana Menteri Sementawis Julia Gillard nganyatakeun yen anjeunna percaya Australia bakal janten républik dina akhir pamaréntahan Ratu Elizabeth II. 34 persen jalma dina polling di gaduh pendapat ieu, nyaeta hoyong Ratu Elizabeth II janten monarkis pamungkas di Australia. Dina polling ekstrim, 29 persén jalma anu ditaliti percaya yén Australia kudu janten républik sagancang-gancangna, sedengkeun 31 persén dipercaya Australia henteu tiasa janten républik.
mt: 1,400 people were surveyed before the 2010 federal election, those who opposed Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 percent from 2008. In the 2010 federal election campaign, Prime Minister Julia Gillard announced that she believed Australia would become a republic at the end of the reign of Queen Elizabeth II. 34 percent of people in the poll had this opinion, that Queen Elizabeth II would be the last monarch of Australia. In the extreme poll, 29 percent of people believed that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 percent believed that Australia could not become a republic.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.

src: Leslie Aun, juru nyarios Komen Foundation, nuturkeun margi organisasi eta nerapkeun aturan anyar anu heunteu masihan hibah atanapi ngadanaan organisasi-organisasi anu keur diselidiki secara hukum. Kabijakan Komentar ngadiskualifikasi rencana parental kusabab panilitian anu ngantosan kumaha parencanaan parentitas nyéépkeun sareng ngalaporkeun artosna ku Perwakilan Cliff Strearns. Stearns keur menyidak perkawis duit pajak anu dipake kanggo ngadanaan aborsi tina Planned Parenthood kumargi anjeunna  sebagai ketua Subkomite Pengawasan jeung Investigasi, anu dihandapeun paguyuban Komite Energi jeung Perdagangan DPR.
mt: Leslie Aun, a Komen Foundation spokeswoman, said the organization is implementing new guidelines that no longer provide grants or funding to organizations under investigation by law enforcement. Komen's decision to disqualify Planned Parenthood from consideration for grants because of ongoing controversy over the use of federal funds for abortions by Planned Parenthood's president, Cecile Richards, who is also the chair of the subcommittee on oversight and investigations, which is under the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: "Pulisi Madhya Pradesh manggih laptop jeung HP anu dicolong. Wakil Inspektorat Jeneral D Arya nyarios, ""Kami parantos néwak lima jalmi anu merkosa awéwé Swiss sareng nyalameutkeun hp sareng laptopna"". Nami jalmi-jalmi anu jadi terdakwa nyaeta Baba kanjar, Bhutha kanjar, Rampro kanjar, Gaza kanjar jeung Vishnu kanjar. Inspektur pulisi Chandra Shekhar Solanki nyarios tersangka dongkap ka pengadilan nutupan beungeutna."
mt: "Madhya Pradesh police found a laptop and HP that was stolen. Deputy Inspector General D Arya said, "We have arrested five people who are Swiss women and stole their HP and laptop." The accused are Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Inspector of Police Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the suspects were arrested and their cases were closed."
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: ASUS Eee PC, anu sateuacanna diluncurkeun di sakumna dunya pikeun ngahémat biaya sareng faktor fungsionalna, janten topik haneut di Wulan IT Taipei 2007. Tapi pasar pembeli laptop bakal macem-macem jeung berubah pisan saenggeus Asus juara dina Penghargaan Berkelanjutan Taiwan taun 2007 ku Pejabat Yuan ti nagara Tiongkok.
mt: The ASUS Eee PC, which was previously launched worldwide for cost and functional factors, became a hot topic at the Taipei 2007 IT Week. But the laptop market will be different and change drastically after Asus won the Taiwan Sustainable Award 2007 from the Chinese government.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Masalahna dimimitian dina 1 Januari, nakila warga lokal mimiti ngeluh ka kantor pos Obanazawa yén aranjeunna henteu nampi kartu tadisional sareng kartu taun baru anu biasa. Kamari, kantor pos ngahapunteun ka para wargi sarta média saatos mendakan yén budak éta nyumputkeun langkung ti 600 dokumén pos, kalebet 429 kartu pos Taun Anyar, anu henteu dikirimkeun ka panarima anu dituju.
mt: The problem began on January 1, when local residents began complaining to the Obanazawa post office that they had not received their traditional and new year's cards.  There, the post office apologized to the residents and the media after discovering that the child had stolen more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's cards, which had not been sent to the intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Masalahna dimimitian dina 1 Januari, nakila warga lokal mimiti ngeluh ka kantor pos Obanazawa yén aranjeunna henteu nampi kartu tadisional sareng kartu taun baru anu biasa. Kamari, kantor pos ngahapunteun ka para wargi sarta média saatos mendakan yén budak éta nyumputkeun langkung ti 600 dokumén pos, kalebet 429 kartu pos Taun Anyar, anu henteu dikirimkeun ka panarima anu dituju.
mt: The problem began on January 1, when local residents began complaining to the Obanazawa post office that they had not received their traditional and new year's cards.  There, the post office apologized to the residents and the media after discovering that the child had stolen more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year's cards, which had not been sent to the intended recipients.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Murray éléh di babak mimiti dina pertandingan panentu saatos duanana nyekel masing-masing sérpis di babak éta. Del Potro sempet menang di set kadua, tapi ieu oge kudu istirahat seri pas nepi 6-6. Potro sempet diubaran taktak na pas harita jeung akhirna sanggup neruskeun pertandinganna.
mt: Murray lost in the first set after both players took a set apiece in that set. Del Potro took a 6-6 lead in the second set, but this was also tied at 6-6. Del Potro was broken in the tiebreak and eventually lost the set.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: "Dibaturan ku para pejabat, anjeunna mastikeun ka urang Téxas yén léngkah-léngkah pikeun nangtayungan kaamanan umum geus dilaksanakeun. Perry sacara spésipik ngomong yén ""Aya tempat-tempat di dunya anu sasaéna nyiapkeun diri nyanghareupan tangtangan anu wedal ti perkawis ieu. Gubernur ogé nyatakeun, ""Dinten ieu, urang apal yén sababaraha budak murangkalih anu sakola parantos kanyahoan yén aranjeunna ogé parantos kontak sareng pasien."" Anjeunna neruskeun nyarios, ""Perkawis ieu téh serius. Yakin wéh yén sistem urang téh berfungsi sakumaha semestina."""
mt: "Officials said the steps taken to protect the public have been implemented. Perry specifically said, ""There are places in the world that are better prepared for this kind of attack. The governor also stated, ""Today, some young children who are in school have learned that they have also been in contact with the patient."" He continued to say, ""This is serious. Be assured that our system is working as intended."""
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: Jauh sateuacan The Daily Show sareng The Colbert Report, Heck sareng Johnson atos ngabayangkeun publikasi anu bakal ngaparodikeun berita sareng pembaca berita, pas aranjeunna masih janten mahasiswa di UW taun 1988. Ti saprak diadegkeun, The Onion tos janten karajaan parodi anu leres, kalayan edisi cetak, halaman web anu gaduh 5 juta pangunjung unik di sasih Oktober, iklan nyalira, jaringan warta 24 jam, podcast, sareng atlas dunya anu anyar dibuka anu dipasihan nami Dunya Urang nu Bodo. Al Gore sareng Jendral Tommy Franks sok ngobrol santi pikeun ngobrolkeun judul berita karesep maranehanana (Anu dipikaresep Gore mah nyaeta pas The Onion ngawartakeun manehna sareng Tipper pernah ewean nu raos pisan saatos eleh di pemilu universitasna taun 2000). Panulisna seueur anu masihan pengaruh anu ageung kana acara berita parodi Jon Stewart sareng Stephen Colbert.
mt: Before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson began publishing a news and reader parody publication while still students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has been a respected parody empire, with a print edition, a 5 million unique visitor web site in October, advertising revenue, a 24-hour news network, a podcast, and a new world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks have been known to argue over headlines (Gore's favorite was when The Onion reported that he and Tipper had been seen "making out" after his defeat in the 2000 university election). Many of its writers have gone on to have a significant impact on the parody news programs of Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.
