src: eta protes mimiti der tabuh 11:00 waktos satempat (UTC+1) di sebrang Whitehall, polisi ngajaga tempat asup ka Downing Street, tempat cicingna Perdana Menteri Saatos tabuh 11:00 jalmi nu protes minuhan jeung nyetop jalanan dina bagian gerbong kalér di Whitehall. Jam 11:20, polisi ménta pendémo pindah ka trotoar, ngomong bahwa anjeunna kudu nyaimbangkeun hak keur demo jeung kalancaran jalan. Kira-kira tabuh 11.29, anu protés sadayana gerak ka Whitehall, ngaliwatan Trafalgar Square, teras maju sapanjang Strand, teras ngaliwatan Aldwych naék ka Kingsway ngarah ka Holborn anu dimana Partéi Konsérvatif ngayakeun Forum Usum Semi di hotél Grand Connaught Rooms.
mt: 11:00 local time (UTC+1) in front of Whitehall, police guard the entrance to Downing Street, where the Prime Minister lives, protesters blocked the road in the northbound lane of Whitehall. At 11:20, police asked the demonstrators to move to the sidewalk, saying that they had to respect the right to demonstrate and the flow of traffic. Around 11.29, all protesters moved to Whitehall, through Trafalgar Square, then along Strand, then through Aldwych up to Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party was holding a semi-annual forum at the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: "Urang ayeuna ngagaduhan beurit umur 4-bulan anu anjeunna ngagaduhan diabetes ayeuna atos henteu diabetes,"" Tambahan Anjeunna. Dr. Ehud Ur, profésor bidang kedokteran di Universitas Dalhousie di Halifax, Nova Scotia sareng ketua divisi klinis sareng ilmiah ti Asosiasi Diabétés Kanada ngingetkeun yén panalungtikan ieu karék permulaan hungkul. Sapertos sababaraha ahli anu sanés, anjeunna henteu percanteun upami diabétés tiasa disembuhkeun, kusabab pamanggihan ieu téh henteu aya hubunganana jeung jalma anu parantos gaduh diabétés tipe 1."
mt: "We now have a 4-month-old baby who has diabetes now doesn't have diabetes," said Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chairman of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association, recalling the study's early days. Like many other experts who are not, he does not believe diabetes can be cured, because this discovery has no relationship with people who have type 1 diabetes."
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: Twin Otter nyobian ngadarat di Kokoda kamari salaku Maskapai PNG jeung nomor penerbangan CG4684 tapi kantos sakali dibatalkeun. Sakitar sapuluh menit pas waktuna ngadarat pas pisan saacan kapal éta ngaleungit kadua kalina. Tempat kacilakaan kapendak dinten ieu sareng lokasina hésé diakses nepikeun ka dua polisi diturunkeun ka leuweung pikeun naék ka tempat kajadian jeung malarian anu salamet. Prosés néang éta kawagel ku cuaca awon anu ogé jadi kusabab pendaratan dibatalkeun.
mt: A Twin Otter was attempting to land at Kokoda as PNG Air flight CG4684 but was cancelled once. About ten minutes before its scheduled landing, the plane disappeared again. The location of the crash site today and its accessibility are difficult to access for two police officers who were lowered into the forest to reach the crash site and rescue the survivors. The process was hampered by bad weather which also became the cause of the landing being cancelled.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: "Untung teu aya kajadian nanaon ka kuring, tapi kuring ningali adegan anu pikasieuneun, sabab jalma coba ngarusak jandela pikeun kaluar. Jarelema ngagebugan pigura jandéla ku korsi, tapi jandélana teu tiasa rusak. Salah sahiji panel tungtungna peupeus, teras aranjeuna mulai kaluar liwat jandela, ""saur anu salamet Franciszek Kowal."
mt: "I'm lucky nothing happened to me, but I saw a scene that was scary, because people were trying to break the window to get out. The people were smashing the window with a chair, but the window didn't break. One of the panels at the end was cracked, then it started to come out through the window," said Franciszek Kowal, who survived.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: Badai Tropis Danielle, badai kaopat anu ngarana musim badai Atlantik 2010, geus kabentuk di Samudra Atlantik wetan. Topan anu lokasina sakitar 3.000 mil ti Miami, Florida, gaduh kecepatan angin maksimum 40 mph (64kph). Élmuwan di Pusat Badai Nasional ngaduga Danielle bakal nguatan janten topan dinten Rebo. Kusabab badaina jauh ti darat, masih hésé pikeun nganilai dampak poténsial ka Amérika Serikat atanapi Karibia.
mt: Tropical Storm Danielle, the fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, formed in the western Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located about 3,000 miles east of Miami, Florida, had maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64kph). National Hurricane Center forecasters said Danielle could become a hurricane on Friday. Because the storm was far from land, it was too early to assess its potential impact on the United States or the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Dr. Lee ogé nembongkeun kasalempangna ngeunaan laporan yén murangkalih dina Turki atos terinfeksi flu bagong A (H5N1) tapi teu udur. Babaraha penelitian ngungkapkeun nyaeta panyawat eta kuduna heunteu maehan samemeh bisa nyebabkeun epidemi global, saurna. Aya kasalempang yén pasién tiasa nularkeun langkung seueur jalmi kalayan upami tetep ngajalankeun kagiatan sapopoé lamun gejala fluna teu ripuh.
mt: Dr. Lee also pointed out that the reports of two deaths in Turkey from the new strain of avian flu (H5N1) were incorrect. Several studies have shown that the patients were not contagious until after they died, and that they did not spread the disease to more people if they continued normal activities if their symptoms did not worsen.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: Dina 9 Agustus peuting, pusat badai Morakot aya sakitar tujuh puluh kilometer ti provinsi Fujian, Tiongkok. Puting beliung dipastikeun nimpa China dina kecepatan sabelas kilométer per jam.
mt: On the night of August 9, the typhoon Morakot was about seventy kilometers from Fujian province, China.  The storm was reported to be hitting China at a speed of eleven kilometers per hour.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: Présidén Amérika Serikat George W. Bush sumping di Singapura subuh kaping 16 Nopémber, mimitian wisata saminggu anjeunna di Asia. Anjeuna di tampi ku Wakil Perdana Menteri Singapura Wong Kan Seng teras ngadiskusikeun isu perdagangan sareng térorisme babarengan Perdana Menteri Singapura Lee Hsien Loong. Saatos saminggu éléh dina pertengahan pemilu, Bush ngomong ka panongton ngeunaan ékspansi dagang di Asia.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore early on November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and later discussed trade and terrorism issues with Singapore's Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of campaigning, Bush spoke to reporters about expanding trade in Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Bewara dinten ieu oge manjangkeun komitmen pamarentah anu dilakukeun di bulan Maret taun ayeuna kanggo ngabiayaan gerbong tambahan. Tambihan 300 gerbong ngajadikeun total 1.300 gerbong jang ngabereskeun kapinuhan penumpang.
mt: The government's commitment to subsidize additional carriages in March this year is also extended. An additional 300 carriages will bring the total to 1,300 carriages to ease passenger congestion.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: "Saur anjeunna, ""Teu aya intelijen pikeun nunjukkeun yén seranganna diperkirakeun bakal lumangsung. Kumaha ogé, ngurangna tingkat ancaman sanés berarti sadayana ancaman atos leungit."""
mt: "They had no intelligence to indicate that the attacks were imminent. How could they, when the threat level was lowered?"
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly ngalantik Dewan Pamilihan Sementara (CEP) anu jumlahna salapan urang basa dinten kamari. Ieu teh CEP kalima Martelly dina 4 warsih. Sasih kamari komisi kepresidenan ngarekomendasikeun pengunduran diri CEP saacanna salaku bagian tina paket tindakan pikeun ngamajukeun negara di pemilu nu anyar. Komisi nyaéta réspon Martelly kana protés anti-rézim anu nyebar dina Oktober. Protes anu sakapeung dibarungan kekerasan eta dipicu ku kagagalan ngayakeun pemilihan umum, sababaraha di antarana saprak 2011.
mt: Martelly inaugurated a nine-member Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) on Thursday.  This is the fifth CEP appointed by Martelly in four years.  On Thursday, the presidential commission recommended the resignation of the previous CEP as part of a package of measures to revamp the country for the new elections.  The commission is the government's response to anti-regime protests that spread in October.  The protests, which sometimes turned violent, were sparked by the failure to hold elections, some since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: Kelompok Senam USA ngadukung surat Komite Olimpiade Amérika Serikat sareng narima sagala kabutuhan keur kaluwargi Olimpiade supados tiasa ngapromosikeun lingkungan nu aman keur atlet urang sadaya. Urang satuju sareng pernyataan USOC téh kapentingan atlit sareng klub urang, sareng olahragana, tiasa langkung saé kalayan maju jeung parobahan anu berarti di organisasi urang, tibatan penghapusan sértipikasi. Organisasi Senam USA ngadukung panyilidikan mandiri anu tiasa nyorot soal panyalahgunaan proporsi anu digambarkeun ku wantunna ku para penyintas Larry Nassar nepi ka teu kanyahoan sakitu lami sareng mencakup parobahan anu sesuai sareng diperlukeun. Organisasi Senam Nasional AS sareng USOC gaduh tujuan anu sami - ngusahakeun olahraga senam, sareng sajabana, saaman mungkin pikeun atlit nuturkeun impianna di lingkungan anu aman, positip sareng diberdayakeun.
mt: The USA Gymnastics group supports the letter from the U.S. Olympic Committee and accepts all the requirements for the family of the Olympic Games so that they can promote a safe environment for all athletes. We agree and support the statement of the USOC that is important for athletes and clubs in our country, and sports can move forward and make meaningful changes in our organization, rather than the elimination of such specifications. The USA Gymnastics organization supports independent research that can track the abuse of proportions depicted by the victims of Larry Nassar until it is unknown for so long and covers the changes that are needed. The National Gymnastics Association of the United States and the USOC have the same goal - to pursue gymnastics, and others, as possible for athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: "Angkatan Laut AS oge nyarios lamun aranjeunna oge nuju mariksaan kajadian eta. Maranehna oge marere pernyataan, ""Awak kapal keur garawe neangan metode anu pang tepatna jang ngangkatkeun kapal jeung aman"". Kapal nu nyegah ranjau sakelas Avenger, kapalna keur di jalan ka Puerto Princesa di Palawan. Éta ditugaskeun ka Armada Katujuh Angkatan Laut AS anu markasna di Sasebo, Nagasaki di Jepang."
mt: "The U.S. Navy also said it was investigating the incident. It also released a statement, "The crew is working to determine the best method to safely and expeditiously remove the vessel and its ordnance." The vessel was en route to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It was assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Navy, which is headquartered in Sasebo, Nagasaki, Japan."
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: Dinten Minggon siang, Presiden Amérika Donald Trump dina kalimah pernyataan nu dikintunkeun ku sekretarisna, nyarios yén tentara Amérika bakal ninggalkeun Syria. Pengumuman éta dicarioskeun saatos Trump nelpon présidén Turki Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turki ogé bakal ngurus pejuang ISIS anu ditangkep, saur pernyataan éta, nagara -nagara Éropa parantos nampik pikeun dibalikkeun.
mt: On Monday afternoon, US President Donald Trump said in a statement released by his secretary that American troops would leave Syria. The announcement came after Trump called Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey will also take care of ISIS fighters captured, as stated, European countries have agreed to repatriate.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Pasukan koalisi sareng pasukan Afghanistan pindah ka daérah éta pikeun ngamankeun lokasi sareng pesawat koalisi sanes tos dikirim pikeun ngabantosan. Kacalakaan kajadian di daerah pegunungan, jeung dipercaya akibat serangan musuh. Usaha néangan lokasi kacilakaan kahalang ku cuaca butut jeung medan anu lungkawing.
mt: Coalition and Afghan forces moved to the area to secure the site and another coalition aircraft was sent to assist. The crash occurred in mountainous terrain, and was believed to be the result of enemy fire. The search for the crash site was hampered by bad weather and difficult terrain.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: Saatos bendungan di wangun di 1963, usum banjir anu bakal nyebarkeun sedimen panjang walungan di eureunkeun. Sédimén ieu diperyogikeun pikeun nyieun gundukan pasir jeung basisir nu gunana pikeun habitat sato liar. Hasilna, 2 spesies lauk janten punah sareng 2 anu sanesna terancam punah, kalebet humpback chub. Sanaos tingkat cai ngan bakal naék sababaraha meter saatos banjir, para pejabat ngarepkeun éta bakal cekap bisa ngabalikeun keusik anu ngikis ka hilir.
mt: After the dam was built in 1963, the annual floods that spread sediment along the river's length were halted. This sediment was used to create sand dunes and beaches for wildlife habitat. As a result, two fish species became extinct and two others are threatened with extinction, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few meters after the flood, officials hope that this will be able to restore the erosion that has been washed downstream.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "Kedutaan Besar Amerika Serikat anu aya di Nairobi, Kénya ngaluarkeun peringatan yén ""ékstrémis ti Somalia"" ngarencanakeun serangan bom bunuh diri di Kénya sareng Éthiopia. A.S. nyatakeun yén nampi inpormasi ti sumber anu henteu didedahkeun sacara khusus anu nyebatkeun panggunaan pengebom bunuh diri pikeun ngancurkeun ""Landmark penting"" di Étiopia sareng Kenya."
mt: "The United States Embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, issued a warning that ""Somali extremists"" are planning suicide bombings in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. said it received information from a confidential source that the use of suicide bombers is intended to destroy ""Landmark"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "Pengacara Yunani nu terkenal, Sakis Kechagioglou jeung George Nikolakopoulus téh dipenjara di penjara Korydallus, Athena, sabab aranjeunna kanyahoan gratifikasi jeung korupsi. kusabab ieu, masalah gede di komunitas legal Yunani naek ku paparan aksi illegal anu dilakukeun ku hakim, sareng para pengacara di taun-taun katukang Sababaraha minggu lalu, saatos inpo éta diterbitkeun ku wartawan Makis Triantafylopoulos di acara tv nu terkenal ""Zoungla"" di Alpha TV, member parlemen jeung pengacara, Petros Mantouvalos diturunkeun jabatanna ti kantorna sabab pipiluen dina gratifikasi jeung korupsi nu ilégal. Salaku tambahan, hakim anu luhur Evangelos Kalousis dipenjara sabab anjeunna kanyahoan korupsi sareng paripolah anu goreng."
mt: "Two Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulus, were jailed in Korydallus prison, Athens, because they were found guilty of bribery and corruption. Because of this, a big problem in the Greek legal community increased with the illegal actions of judges and lawyers in recent weeks, after the news was published by journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in the popular TV show "Zoungla" on Alpha TV, member of parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was removed from his office because of his involvement in bribery and corruption. In addition, judge Evangelos Kalousis was jailed because he was found guilty of corruption and illegal actions."
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: Robin Uthappa ngadamel skor babak anu pangluhurna, 70 runs ku ngan 41 bal ku neunggeul 11 opat poin sareng 2 genep poin. Panakol kriket pertengahan, Sachin Tendulkar sareng Rahul Dravid, nampilkeun permaenan anu sae sareng nyetak saratus angka ku duaan. Tapi, saprak éléh kaptén wicket India ngan nyieun 36 lumpatan, éléh 7 wicket pikeun ngeureunkeun babak.
mt: Robin Uthappa made the highest score of the innings, 70 runs off 41 balls with 11 fours and 2 sixes. The middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, also scored centuries. But, since the captain lost his wicket, India only made 36 runs off 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: "Administrator Commons Adam Cuerden ngungkapkeun kakeselna kusabab omongan anjeunna ka Wikinews sasih kamari dihapus. Anjeuna [Wales] dasarna ngabohong ka urang ti awal. Kahiji, ngalakonan lamun iyeu teh keur alesan hukum. Kadua, pura-pura ngadangukeun urang, nepikeun ka waktos ngahapus karyana."" Kakeheulan masarakat nu nyababkeun kana usaha ngajukeun draf kebijakan ngeunaan eusi seksual keur situs nu nyediakeun jutaan media berlisensi terbuka."
mt: "Commons administrator Adam Cuerden revealed his frustration with his interactions with Wales on Wikinews last week. He said [Wales] has been dismissive from the start. First, he was acting as if he were a law enforcement officer. Second, he pretended to be surprised by our actions, leading to the deletion of our content."" The community's actions led to the drafting of a policy on sexual content for sites that provide millions of open-licensed media."
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "Administrator Commons Adam Cuerden ngungkapkeun kakeselna kusabab omongan anjeunna ka Wikinews sasih kamari dihapus. Anjeuna [Wales] dasarna ngabohong ka urang ti awal. Kahiji, ngalakonan lamun iyeu teh keur alesan hukum. Kadua, pura-pura ngadangukeun urang, nepikeun ka waktos ngahapus karyana."" Kakeheulan masarakat nu nyababkeun kana usaha ngajukeun draf kebijakan ngeunaan eusi seksual keur situs nu nyediakeun jutaan media berlisensi terbuka."
mt: "Commons administrator Adam Cuerden revealed his frustration with his interactions with Wales on Wikinews last week. He said [Wales] has been dismissive from the start. First, he was acting as if he were a law enforcement officer. Second, he pretended to be surprised by our actions, leading to the deletion of our content."" The community's actions led to the drafting of a policy on sexual content for sites that provide millions of open-licensed media."
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "Henteu sadayana ngadukung lebetna jajaran istri. jalmi anu meunang medali pérak di Olympic taun 2004, Amir Khan nyaurkeun, ""Jauh dina lubuk hati kuring, kuring rasa awéwé teu kedah gelut. Éta pendapat kuring."" Sanajan ku koméntarna éta, anjeunna nyebutkeun lamun bakal ngadukung pesaing Inggris dina Olimpiade 2012 anu diayakeun di London."
mt: "Not all of them are in the camp. The silver medalist at the 2004 Olympics, Amir Khan said, ""Deep in my heart, I feel women should not fight. That's my opinion."" Despite his comments, he said he would support the British fighter at the 2012 Olympics, which will be held in London."
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, pembalap motor umur 13 taun, pupus saatos tabrakan di Indianapolis Motor Speedway. Nalika dina pangkonan pamanasan , Lenz murag tina sapédah na, teras ditarajang ku sasami pembalap Xavier Zayat. Anjeunna langsung di rawat ku staf medis di tempat sareng di angkut ka rumah sakit lokal dimana anjeunna teras maot. Zayat heunteu raheut dina kacilakaan eta.
mt: 13-year-old motorcyclist Peter Lenz died after a collision at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While in the warm-up, Lenz fell from his bike, then hit by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately treated by medical staff on the spot and taken to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Naék pasawat téh tiasa janten hal nu nyingsieunan jalmi sagala umur jeung kondisi, komo deui upami anjeunna tara pernah naék pasawat atawa gaduh trauma. Ieu sanés hal anu dipikaera: ieu henteu bénten jeung kasieunan sareng henteu resepan pribadi kana hiji hal anu dipiboga seueur jelma. kanggo sababaraha jalmi, ngartoskeun hal-hal tentang kumaha cara kerjana pesawat sareng naon wae anu kajadian nalika ngapung tiasa mantosan manehna ngalawan kasieun kumargi teu terang sareng teu ngontrol
mt: Boarding an airplane can be a traumatic experience for some people, especially those who have never flown or have a fear of flying. This is not a phobia and is not a personal choice to avoid flying. For some people, understanding how an airplane works and what happens during flight can help overcome their fear of flying.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Ayeuna perjalanan udara jarang dipesen langsung ngalangkungan maskapai saacan milarian heula sareng ngabandingkeun hargana. Kadang penerbangan anu sarua oge hargana bisa beda dina sababaraha agregator jeung ngabayar keur ngabandingkeun nu muncul terus jeung oge ningali tina situs web saacan mesen.
mt: Now, air travel is rarely booked directly with the airline before completing and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have different prices on several aggregators and paying to compare what is always appearing and also looking from the website before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Pausahaan kurir dibayar awis kanggo ngirimkeun barang kalawan énggal. Rémén ogé, waktos penting pisan kalawan dokumen bisnis, barang dagangan atawa suku cadang kanggo perbaikan anu nyedek. Di rute-rute tangtu, pangusahaan anu leuwih gede boga kapal sorangan, tapi jang rute lainna jeung pangusahaan anu leuwih leutik, aya masalah. Upami aranjeunna ngirimkeun barang ku angkutan udara, dina sababaraha rute, éta tiasa diperyogikeun sababaraha dinteun pikeun ngabongkar muatanna sareng sajabana. Hiji-hijina cara méh leuwih gancang nyaéta ngirimkeun dina koper. aturan maskapai moal ngijinkeun aranjeunna ngirim barang lamun teu aya panumpangna, anu jadi tujuan anjeun.
mt: Courier companies are paid to deliver goods quickly. They are also important for time-sensitive business documents, merchandise or spare parts for repairs. On certain routes, larger companies have their own ships, but on other routes and smaller companies, there is a problem. If they send goods by air, in some routes, it can be disassembled several days to load and so on. The only almost faster way is to send in a suitcase. airlines do not allow you to send goods if there are no passengers, which is your goal.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Anjeun kedah milih maskapai Frequent Flyer anjeun dina gabungan sareng ati-ati. Sanaos anjeun mikir yén ngiringan maskapai anu anjeun anggo paling seueurna nyaéta intuitif, anjeun kudu sadar yén kaistiméwaan anu ditawarkeun sering béda jeung poin-poin frequent flyer tiasa langkung gampang diala dina maskapai anu béda tapi dina aliansi anu sami.
mt: You should choose your frequent flyer airline carefully. While you may think that choosing the airline you fly most often is intuitive, you should be aware that perks offered can vary greatly from airline to airline and frequent flyer points can be easier to earn on different airlines but in the same alliance.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Nginum inuma beralkohol sacukupna. Alkohol ngaruhna béda-béda ka tiap jalmi, sareng apal watesan anjeun téh penting pisan. Kajadian kasehatan jangka paos anu manawi ti ngaleueut kaleuleuwihan tiasa kaasup karuksakan hate sarta sumawonten kebutaan sarta tiwasna. Bahaya potensial meningkat sabot mengonsumsi alkohol anu diproduksi sacara teu legal. Inuman ilegal tiasa ngandung bahan-bahan anu nyilakakeun nu salah sahijina metanol, anu bisa nyieun jalma buta sareng maot sanajan dosisna saeutik.
mt: Drinking alcohol in moderation. Alcohol affects people differently, and knowing your limits is important. Long-term health problems that can result from excessive drinking include liver damage and blindness, and death. The potential dangers increase when consuming alcohol produced illegally. Illegal alcohol can contain harmful substances such as methanol, which can cause blindness and death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Distrik Kanal (basa Belanda: Grachtengordel) nyaéta kawasan kasohor abad ka-17 anu ngurilingan Binnenstad, Amsterdam. Sadaya kabupaten ditunjuk salaku Warga Warisan Dunia UNESCO kusabab nilai budaya sareng sajarah anu unik, sareng péta milikana paling luhur di nagara éta.
mt: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is a famous 17th-century area surrounding the Binnenstad, Amsterdam. All boroughs are designated as World Heritage UNESCO because of their unique cultural and historical value, and their highest property in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, 12 km belah kidul na Siem Reap. Kuil di puncak gunung ieu diwangun di akhir abad ka 9, pas jaman pamarentahan Raja Yasovarman. Suasana pura anu suram ditambih pemandangan situ Tonle Sap bakal ngadamel pangalaman naék ka bukit moal tiasa dipohokeun. Ngunjungan ka situs éta tiasa dibarengkeun kalayan merenah sareng numpak parahu ka situ. Urang peryogi Angkor Pass kanggo lebet ka kuil, jadi ulah hilap nyandak paspor pas anjeun ka arah Tonle Sap.
mt: 12 km south of Siem Reap. This temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view of the Tonle Sap lake will make the experience of climbing the hill unforgettable. Visiting this site can be combined with a relaxing boat ride on the lake. Angkor Pass is required to enter the temple, so do not forget your passport when heading towards Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antartika nyaeta tempat anu paling tiis di Bumi jeung ayana di sakuriling kutub nu Kidul. Kunjungan wisata téh awis, ngabutuhkeun kabugaran fisik, ngan tiasa dilakukeun dina halodo atawa bulan November-Februari, sareng biasana diwatesan ngan ka Semenanjung, Kapuloan sareng Laut Ross. Babaraha rebu staff cicing di dieu keur usum panas di sakuriling opat lusin pangkalan anu sabagian gede araya di daerah eta; ngan saeutik anu ngendong di usum tiris. padalaman Antartika mangrupikeun dataran anu panjangna 2-3 km anu katutupan ku es. Tur udara spesialis kadang indit ka pedalaman, pikeun neteg gunung atanapi ngahontal Kutub, anu gaduh dasar anu ageung.
mt: Antarctica is the coldest, driest and windiest continent and is almost entirely south of the Antarctic Circle.  Tourists are rare, requiring physical fitness, and can only be visited in summer or November-February, and usually limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea.  Thousands of staff live there during the summer in around 80 research stations, most of which are located in this area; few spend the winter.  Antarctica is a continent of ice, with an average elevation of 2-3 km and covered by ice.  Special flights sometimes go to the interior, to climb mountains or reach the Pole, which has a rocky base.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Observatorium anu pra-modéren biasana tinggaleun jaman, tapi tetep janten musium, atanapi loka pendidikan. Kusabab polusi cahaya di jaman kajayaan na sanés jinis masalah ayeuna, aranjeunna biasana aya di kota atanapi di kampus, langkung gampang kahontal tibatan anu diwangun dina jaman modéren. Teleskop panilitian nu moderen teh nyaeta pasilitas ageung di daerah kampung anu cuacana alus.
mt: Modern observatories are usually located in remote areas, away from light pollution, but they are often museums or educational facilities. Because light pollution is not a problem in modern times, they are usually located in cities or on college campuses, which are easier to access than those built in the modern era. Modern scientific telescopes are large facilities in rural areas with good weather.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Aya seueur pantai, kusabab Auckland gaduh 2 palabuan. Anu paling kasohorna aya di 3 kawasan. Pantai North Shore (di distrik harbok kidul) nu aya di Samudra Pasifik jeung nu ngabentang ti Long Bay di kidul nepi ka Devonport di kaler. Hampir kabeh pantai keusikna aman jang ngojay jeung iyuh margi tatangkalan pohutukawa. Pantai Tamaki Drive aya di Palabuan Waitemata, di pinggireun kota kelas luhur Mission Bay sareng Saint Heliers di Central Auckland. Ieu pantai kaluarga anu kadang ramé ku toko-toko anu alus ngajajar sisi cai. Ngojay aman.
mt: There are several beaches, because Auckland has two harbours. The most popular are in three areas. North Shore (in the southern district of harbok) is in the Pacific Ocean and stretches from Long Bay in the south to Devonport in the north. Almost all beaches are safe for swimming and have a path of pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive is on the Waitemata Harbour, around the upper-class city of Mission Bay and Saint Heliers in Central Auckland. This family beach is sometimes busy with shops lined up along the water. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Punten émut yén anjeun ngadatangan situs kuburan masal, ogé situs ieu gaduh makna anu teu kaitung kangge kalolobaan penduduk di dunya. Seeur kénéh lalaki sareng awéwé anu salamet sareng linggih di dieu, sareng seueur ogé anu gaduh jalmi nu dipikacinta anu dibunuh atanapi di paksa gawe dugi ka maot didinya, badé urang Yahudi atanapi non-Yahudi. Perlakukeun situs iyeu jeung pinuh martabat, khidmat, jeung rasa hormat sapantesna. Ulah ngajadikeun Holocaust atawa Nazi salaku banyolan. Ulah ngarusak loka kalawan nandaan atawa nyoret-nyoret grafiti ka jero struktur.
mt: It is important to note that this site has meaning beyond the millions of people in the world.  Men and women who survived and are buried here, as well as many who died and were killed or forced to death, were Jewish or non-Jewish.  The treatment of this site and its full dignity, service, and respect is important.  Do not make the Holocaust or Nazis as a slogan.  Do not vandalize the site with graffiti or markings.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Auxiliary languages nyaeta basa jijieunan nu dianggo keur tujuan ngagampangkeun komunikasi kanggo jalmi-jalmi anu jigana gaduh masalah dina berkomunikasi. Aranjeunna dipisahkeun ti lingua francas, anu mangrupikeun basa alami atanapi organik anu parantos janten dominan pikeun 1 sareng sababaraha alesan minangka cara komunikasi antawis panyatur basa anu sanés.
mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed languages used for the purpose of facilitating communication among people who have difficulty communicating in their native languages. They are distinguished from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that have become dominant for one or more reasons as a means of communication among speakers of other languages.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Upami ngaléwat ka Baltic Kalér di musim dingin, pariksa lokasi kabin, sababna ngaléwatan és téh sok seeur suara bising nu bakal ngaganggu anjeun. Palayaran Saint Petersburg kalebet waktos di kota. Panumpang pesiar di bébaskeun tina sarat visa (parios saratna).
mt: If you are traveling to the Baltic in the winter, check the cabin location, because traveling there is often noisy sounds that will disturb you. The flight to Saint Petersburg also includes time in the city. Tourists are exempt from visa requirements (parios saratna).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Bahasa resmi Barcelona nyaeta Catalan sareng Spanyol. Hampir satengahna leuwih milih nyarios nganggo bahasa Catalan, kumargi seueur jalmi anu ngartos, sareng hampir sadaya jalmi nganggo na bahasa Spanyol. Tapi, kalolobaan tanda-tanda ngan dipintonkeun ku basa Katalan saukur sabab atos ditetepkeun ku hukum éta teh janten basa resmi kahiji. nanging, Bahasa Spanyol teh geus loba nu make dina transportasi umum jeung fasilitas nu sejena Pangumuman di Metro biasana diumumkeun dina basa Catalan, tapi upami aya gangguan anu teu direncanakeun diumumkeun ku sistem anu otomatis dina sababaraha basa kalebet basa Spanyol, basa Inggris,basa Perancis, Arab sareng basa Jepang.
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. Almost half of the population prefers to speak in Catalan, because many people think, and almost all of them speak in Spanish. However, most signs are only written in Catalan because it is the first official language. However, Spanish is widely used in public transport and facilities. Announcements in the Metro are usually announced in Catalan, but if there is an unexpected disruption, it is announced by the automatic system in several languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Di nagara maju ayeuna, nyayogikeun tempat kulem sareng sarapan mewah téh parantos di tingkatkeun janten salah sahiji bentuk seni. Pamustunganana, B&B jelas bersaing utamina dina 2 poin utama: ranjang sareng sarapan. Ku sabab éta, di tempat-tempat anu panghadéna siga kitu, jalmi biasana mendakan kasur anu pangméwahna, atawa simbut jieunan leungeun atawa ranjang anu antik. Sarapan tiasa kalebet hidangan musiman daérah atanapi tuangeun ciri khas pribumi. Tataanna tiasa mangrupikeun gedong kolot bersajarah kalayan parabot antik, pakarangan anu dijaga saé tur aya kolam renang.
mt: In advanced countries, the art of bed and breakfast has been elevated to one of the most competitive forms of tourism.  Thus, in the most popular places, guests are usually offered the most luxurious beds, or handcrafted linens, or antique beds. Breakfast can include seasonal regional dishes or local specialties. The setting can be an old historic building with antique furniture, a well-tended garden and a swimming pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Kota Beijing di Cina bakal jadi tuan rumah Olimpiade Usum Tiris taun 2022, anu bakal ngajadikeun Beijing janten kota munggaran anu ngayakeun Olimpiade usum panas jeung usum tiris sakaligus. Beijing bakal janten tuan rumah di upacara pamuka sareng pamungkas acara es jero ruhang. Acara ski sanésna bakal diayakeun di aréa ski Taizicheng di Zhangjiakou, kira-kira 220 km (140 mil) ti Béijing.
mt: Beijing, China will be the host of the 2022 Winter Olympics, making it the first city to host both the Summer and Winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the ice hockey events. The other events will be held at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 mi) from Beijing.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Flu manuk, atawa leuwih dikenal ku flu unggas, tiasa ngainféksi manuk sareng mamalia. Leuwih saeutik ti sarébu kasus dilaporkeun dina manusa, tapi sabagianana parah. Lolobana ngalibatkeun jalma-jalma anu damel ngurus unggas, tapi aya ogé anu résiko pikeun jalmi nun ningalian manuk-manuk.
mt: Bird flu, or avian flu, can infect birds and mammals. Less than 500 cases have been reported in humans, but most are severe. Most involve people who handle birds, but there is also a risk for people who come into contact with infected birds.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Flu manuk, atawa leuwih dikenal ku flu unggas, tiasa ngainféksi manuk sareng mamalia. Leuwih saeutik ti sarébu kasus dilaporkeun dina manusa, tapi sabagianana parah. Lolobana ngalibatkeun jalma-jalma anu damel ngurus unggas, tapi aya ogé anu résiko pikeun jalmi nun ningalian manuk-manuk.

src: Viking nganggo jalur laut Rusia pikeun angkat ka Laut Hideung sareng Laut Kaspia. Sabagian jalur ieu téh nepi ka ayeuna masih tiasa dianggo. Pariksa kamungkinan kudu gaduh ijin khusus, anu panginten sesah ditampi. White Sea-Baltic Canal téh ngahubungkeun Arctic Ocean ka Baltic Sea, ngaliwatan Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga jeung Saint Petersbrug, lolobana dihubungkeun jeung walungan sareng situ. Situ Onega ogé nyambung ka Volga, janten sumping ti Laut Caspian liwat Russia masih tiasa dilakukeun.
mt: Viking uses the Russian waterways to reach the White Sea and the Caspian Sea. Most of these routes are still in use. Permission is required for inspection, and the White Sea-Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, through Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, most of which are connected to rivers and lakes. Lake Onega also connects to the Volga, so a route from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Pos pamariksaa imigrasi biasana panglirenan mimiti nalika turun ti pesawat, kapal, atanapi kendaraan anu sanes. Dina sababaraha karéta lintas-nagara, pamariksaan dilaksanakeun dina karéta anu keur jalan sareng anjeun kedah gaduh kartu idéntitas anu diakui lamun numpak salah sahiji karéta éta. Nalika bobo dina karéta wengi, paspor tiasa dikumpulkeun ka konduktor supados anjeun henteu kaganggu pas nuju bobo..
mt: Immigration checkpoints are usually the first stop after disembarking from a plane, ship, or vehicle. In some intercity trains, the inspection is carried out on the train itself and you must have an accepted identity card if you are riding one of those trains. When boarding a night train, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you are not disturbed during the night..
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: "Umumna Singapura mangrupa tempat anu aman pisan sareng gampang pikeun napigasi, teras anjeun tiasa mésér nanaon waé saatos sumping. Tapi ku margi ditempatkeun di daérah ""tropis luhur"" ngan sawatara darajat kaléreun katulistiwa, anjeun kedah kuat ngarasakeun panasna (salawasna) sareng panonpoé anu kuat (nalika langit lénglang, langkung langki)."
mt: "Singapore is generally a safe and easy place to live, then you can do anything after the crash. But because it is located in the "tropical high" and some southern latitude, you have to endure the heat (especially) and the strong sun (when the sky is clear, the sun is stronger)."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: kue-kue kering ti Jerman raos pisan, sareng di Bavaria, bede-beda sareng kaya pisan rasana, sami siga tatangga palih kiduleun na nyaeta Austria Kueh buah nyaeta hal nu biasa, sareng apel anu dipalah janten kuéh sapanjang taun, teras céri sareng plum nu mecenghul nalika usum panas. Seueur tuangeun Jérman anu dipanggang sok ayaan kacang almon, kacang hazel, jeung kacang-kacang nu sanesna. Kuéh-kuéh anu kasohor biasana sok dipasangkeun jeung sagelas kopi lekoh. Upami anjeun hoyong pastry  anu alit tapi seer rasana, cobian  we pastry nu namina teh tergantung kana daérah na, kadang disebut na teh Berliner, Pfannkuchen atanapi Krapfen.
mt: German cakes are very good, and in Bavaria, they are very different in taste, just like their neighbors to the east, Austria. Fruit cakes are common, and apples baked into cakes all year, then cherries and plums when it is hot. Many German pastries are often served with a strong cup of coffee. If you want a small pastry but with a lot of taste, try the pastry named after the region, sometimes called a Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Upami anjeun hoyong ameung ningalan dunya tapi irit, pikeun kabutuhan, gaya atanapi tantangan, aya sababaraha cara pikeun ngalaksanakeuna. Dasarna, anjeun ka golongkeun kana 2 kategori, dianggo nalika anjeun ngarambat atanapi nyobian ngawatesan biaya anjeun. Tulisan ieu difokuskeun anu terakhir. Kanggo maranehanana anu rela ngorbankeun kanyamanan, wanci, sarta kapastian kanggo nyorong pengeluaran nu paling saeutik, tingal anggaran minimum. Naséhat sapertos kitu nganggap yén palancong ulah maok, ngeliwatan bates, ilubiung dina pasar ilegal, ngemis, atanapi ngaeksploitiasi batur pikeun kapentingan sorangan.
mt: If you are willing to sacrifice comfort, time, and certainty to save money, there are a few ways to do it. For the sake of this article, we will assume that you are willing to give up some of these things. Here are some tips to help you save money on your next trip. Don't fly, go through border crossings, participate in the black market, beg, or exploit others for your own benefit.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Panjang antara Point Marion sareng Fairmont nyayogikeun sababaraha kaayaan nyetir anu paling nangtang di Jalan Raya Buffalo-Pittsburgh, seringna ngalewatan daerah pedalaman nu terpencil. Upami anjeun henteu biasa nyetir dina jalan pilemburan, jaga fokus anjeun: tanjakan anu curam, jalur anu leutik, jeung jalan nu loba péngkolan nukik. Wates kacepetan anu diumumkeun jauh langkung handap tina ruas jalan sateuacana sareng anu salajengna — biasana 35-40 mil/jam (56-64 km/jam) — sareng anu minuhan peraturan langkung penting tibatan anu sanés. Anéhna, sinyal telepon sélulér téh langkung kiat di dieu ti batan sapanjang ruteu séjénna, contona Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont is known for some of the most dangerous driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, which often runs through remote, mountainous areas. If you're not used to driving in heavy traffic, keep your focus: steep hills, narrow lanes, and winding roads. Speed limits are much lower than on the rest of the highway — usually 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and there are more rules than elsewhere. Interestingly, cell phone signals are much weaker along this route than on other stretches, for example the Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Panjang antara Point Marion sareng Fairmont nyayogikeun sababaraha kaayaan nyetir anu paling nangtang di Jalan Raya Buffalo-Pittsburgh, seringna ngalewatan daerah pedalaman nu terpencil. Upami anjeun henteu biasa nyetir dina jalan pilemburan, jaga fokus anjeun: tanjakan anu curam, jalur anu leutik, jeung jalan nu loba péngkolan nukik. Wates kacepetan anu diumumkeun jauh langkung handap tina ruas jalan sateuacana sareng anu salajengna — biasana 35-40 mil/jam (56-64 km/jam) — sareng anu minuhan peraturan langkung penting tibatan anu sanés. Anéhna, sinyal telepon sélulér téh langkung kiat di dieu ti batan sapanjang ruteu séjénna, contona Pennsylvania Wilds.
mt: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont is known for some of the most dangerous driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, which often runs through remote, mountainous areas. If you're not used to driving in heavy traffic, keep your focus: steep hills, narrow lanes, and winding roads. Speed limits are much lower than on the rest of the highway — usually 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and there are more rules than elsewhere. Interestingly, cell phone signals are much weaker along this route than on other stretches, for example the Pennsylvania Wilds.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Canyoning (atanapi: canyoneering) nyaéta perkawis badé ka jero talaga, teu mikiran talagana téh garing atawa eusianna pinuh ku cai. Ngalalana di jurang ngahijikeun sababaraha kagiatan sapertos ngojay, naék gunung sareng luluncatan--tapi ngabutuhkeun sakedik latihan atanapi awak nu kuat pikeun mulaina (dibandingkeun sareng naék gawir, neuleum, atanapi ski di alpen).
mt: Canyoning (also: canyoneering) is the sport of descending canyons by means of techniques such as rappelling, scrambling, climbing, and jumping. It is similar to caving, but in canyoning the water is flowing. It is similar to bouldering, but in canyoning the water is flowing. ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: "Asup ka mobil anjeun jeung ngalakukeun perjalanan jauh  ngagaduhan daya tarik intrinsik dina kesederhanaanana. Heunteu sapertos kanaraan anu leuwih gede, maneh tiasa wae geus wauh pisan mobil maneh jeung nyaho batas kamampuannana. Ngadegkeun tenda di properti pribadi atawa di dayeuh kalawan ukuran sabaraha oge tiasa gampil metot perhatian anu henteu dipikahayang. Singkatna, nganggo mobil anjeun mangrupikeun cara anu saé kangge perjalanan darat, tapi jarang pisan dianggo pikeun ""kémping"". Kémping dina mobil tiasa waé upami anjeun gaduh mobil nu ageung, SUV, sedan, atawa Station Wagon anu korsi na ngagolér."
mt: "Get in your car and take a long drive and there is an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you can easily see the limits of your car's capabilities. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town with a smaller size can easily draw attention that is not expected. In short, using your car for camping is a great way to go, but rarely used. Camping in your car can be done if you have a large car, SUV, sedan, or Station Wagon with a large trunk."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Kota modern Casablanca diadegkeun ku pamayang Berber di abad ka 10 SM, teras dianggo ku bangsa Fenisia, Romawi, sareng Merenid janten palabuhan strategis nu disebut Anfa. Portugis ngancurkeun jeung diwangun deui eta make ngaran Casa Branca ngan ukur ditinggalkeun sanggeus lini di 1755. Sultan Maroko ngawangun deui kota janten Daru l-Badya sareng dingaranan Casablanca ku padagang Spanyol anu netepkeun padagangan diditu. Casablanca téh salah sahiji tempat anu paling metot di sakuriling Maroko kanggo balanja. Sakuriling Madinah anu lami mah, anjeun tiasa gampil mendakan tempat-tempat anu ngajual barang tradisional Maroko, sapertos tagine, karajinan, barang kulit, hookah, jeung spéktrum Geegaw, tapi éta téh sadayana kanggo turis.
mt: Casablanca was founded by Berber pirates in the 10th century BC, then used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and Merenid dynasties as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed and rebuilt it in 1755, but abandoned it shortly thereafter. The Sultan of Morocco rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and named it Casablanca by Spanish merchants who settled there for trade. Casablanca is one of the most modern cities in Morocco for shopping. Around the old Medina, you can easily find places that sell traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagine, crafts, leather goods, hookah, and a spectrum of Geegaw, but all of that is for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Di palih kalér nu gampil didongkapan aya kota saé sareng romantis Sintra nu kakoncara ku turis asing saatos kaéndahanna dicatet ku Tuan Byron. Beus Scotturb 403 biasana indit unggal poe ka Sintra, ereun di Cabo da Roca. Teras di bagéan kalér, cobian dongkap ka wangunan suci Our Lady of Fatima (Kuil), tempat nampakna Maria anu kakoncara di sakumna dunya.
mt: In the north, easily accessible and romantic Sintra is a favorite of foreign tourists after its beauty was recorded by Lord Byron. Bus 403 usually runs daily to Sintra, then to Cabo da Roca. Then, turn left to the Our Lady of Fatima (Church), where the Virgin Mary appeared to the world.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: Di taun 1994, suku Nagorno-Karabakh Arménia di wilayah Azérbaijan perang ngalawan suku Azeris. Ku ayana dukungan ti Arménia, républik anu anyar tiasa diciptakeun. Nanging, teu aya nagara anu ngaku ieu nagara secara resmi , bahkan Arménia ogé'. Argumen diplomatik ngeunaan wewengkon eta teras ngarusak hubungan antawis Armenia sarta Azerbaijan.
mt: In 1994, the Armenian-majority region of Nagorno-Karabakh fought a war against the Azeris. With the support of Armenia, a new republic was created. However, no country officially recognizes this state, not even Armenia. Diplomatic arguments about this region have damaged relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.

src: Salah sahiji kaleuwihan di Charlotte, Carolina Kalér, nyaéta seueur pilihan-pilihan anu saé pikeun kulawarga. Warga ti daérah séjén osok nyebatkeun karamahan kaluwarga salaku alesan utama ngalih kadinya, sareng pengunjung osok ngarasa kota éta gampil dinikmati bari nyandak budak. Di 20 taun kapengker, jumlah pilihan nu aman kanggo murangkalih di Uptown Charlotte téh nambihan meuni seueur. Taksi umumna henteu dianggo ku kaluwargi-kaluwargi di Charlotte, sanajan aya gunana dina kaayaan anu tangtu. Kudu mayar leuwih pikeun ngangkut langkung ti 2 panumpang teh, janten pilihan ieu tiasa langkung mahal tibatan ti nu diperlukeun.
mt: One of the advantages of Charlotte, North Carolina, is the many family-friendly options. Families from other areas often cite affordability as the main reason for moving there, and visitors often feel the city is easy to enjoy while raising children. In the past 20 years, the number of options safe for toddlers in Uptown Charlotte has increased significantly. Taxis are rarely used by families in Charlotte, although there are times when they are necessary. It costs more to transport more than two passengers, making this option more expensive than is needed.
ref: One of strong points of Charlotte, North Carolina, is that it has an abundance of high-quality options for families. Residents from other areas often cite family-friendliness as a primary reason for moving there, and visitors often find the city easy to enjoy with children around. In the past 20 years, the amount of child-friendly options in Uptown Charlotte has grown exponentially. Taxis are not generally used by families in Charlotte, though they can be of some use in certain circumstances. There is a surcharge for having more than 2 passengers, so this option might be more expensive than necessary.

src: Sateuacan Spanyol sumping dina abad ka-16, Chili kalér aya dina kakawasaan Inca sedengkeun urang pribumi Araucanians (Mapuche) cicing di Chili tengah sareng kidul. Mapuche ogé mangrupikeun salah sahiji kelompok pribumi Amérika terakhir anu mandiri, henteu sapinuhna nyerep kana pamaréntahan anu nganggo basa Spanyol dugi ka saatos kemerdekaan Chili. Sanaos Chili nyatakeun kamerdekaanana di taun 1810 (di tengah Perang Napoleon nu ninggalkeun Spanyol tanpa pamarentahan pusat anu aya gunana sababaraha taun), kameunangan anu nentukeun pikeun Spanyol henteu katepi nepi ka taun 1818.
mt: Before Spain's conquest in the 16th century, northern Chile was part of the Inca Empire while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) lived in central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were one of the last indigenous groups in the Americas to remain independent of colonial rule, refusing Spanish language and culture until the independence of Chile. Although Chile declared its independence from Spain in 1810 (during the Napoleonic Wars which left Spain without a central government for several years), Spanish control was not fully broken until 1818.
ref: Before the Spanish arrived in the 16th century, northern Chile was under Inca rule while the indigenous Araucanians (Mapuche) inhabited central and southern Chile. The Mapuche were also one of the last independent American indigenous groups, that were not fully absorbed into Spanish-speaking rule until after Chile's independence. Although Chile declared independence in 1810 (amid the Napoleonic wars that left Spain without a functioning central government for a couple of years), decisive victory over the Spanish was not achieved until 1818.

src: Cinque Terre anu boga harti 5 bumi, ngandung 5 kampung basisir alit nyaéta Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza jeung Monterosso anu aya dina propinsi Liguria di Italia. Éta teh didaftarkeun dina Daftar Pusaka UNESCO. Salila saabad, jelema geus ngabangun teras di luhur lanskap terjal jeung curam tepat diluhur jurang anu ngahareupan ka laut. Salah sahiji daya tarikna téh nyaéta kurangna pengembangan perusahaan nu katingali. Jalan satapak, karéta, sareng kapal téh anu nyambungkeun kampung-kampung, sareng mobil mah teu tiasa lebet upami ti luar.
mt: Cinque Terre, literally "Five Lands", consists of five villages—Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso—on the Italian Riviera. It was added to the UNESCO World Heritage Site list in 1997. For centuries, people have built terraces on the rugged, coastal landscape to cultivate grapes and olives. One of the main attractions is the lack of large-scale industry. The villages are connected by a path known as the Sentiero Azzurro, which runs along the coast and provides access to the five villages. The path is also used for hiking and cycling. Cars are not allowed in the villages.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

It was added to the UNESCO World Heritage Site list in 1997. For centuries, people have built terraces on the rugged, coastal landscape to cultivate grapes and olives. One of the main attractions is the lack of large-scale industry. The villages are connected by a path known as the Sentiero Azzurro, which runs along the coast and provides access to the five villages. The path is also used for hiking and cycling. Cars are not allowed in the villages.
ref: Cinque Terre, which means Five Lands, comprises the five small coastal villages of Riomaggiore, Manarola, Corniglia, Vernazza and Monterosso located in the Italian region of Liguria. They are listed on the UNESCO World Heritage List. Over the centuries, people have carefully built terraces on the rugged, steep landscape right up to the cliffs that overlook the sea. Part of its charm is the lack of visible corporate development. Paths, trains and boats connect the villages, and cars cannot reach them from the outside.

src: Alesan kacilakaan di usum tiis nu pang umumna nyaéta jalan anu leueur, trotoar (sisi jalan), sareng hususna tanjakan. Sahenteuna, anjeun butuh sapatu anu sol na sasuai. Sapatu usum panas kan biasana leueur ai dina és sareng salju, malah sababaraha sapatu usum tiis ge kirang cekap. Polana kedah cukup jero, 5 mm (1/5 inci) atawa langkung, sareng bahanna kudu halus dina suhu anu tiis. sabagean sapatu ngabogaan paku, malihan mah aya oge paku kanggo sapatu tambihan ameh sapatu henteu leueur dina usum baseuh, cocok pisan pikeun kalobaan sapatu, pikeun hak sapatu jeung sol na oge. Hak sapatu téh kudu péndék jeung lebar. Keusik, batu-batu leutik atawa uyah (kalsium klorida) biasana disebar di jalan méh nambah napel.
mt: The most common cause of accidents in icy conditions is slippery roads, sidewalks (sidewalks), and especially inclines. In particular, you need boots that fit well. Boots for cold weather are usually slippery in the snow and ice, but some boots are not slippery in the snow, suitable for most boots, for the sole of the boot and the sole of the boot. The sole of the boot should be short and wide. Keusik, small stones or salt (calcium chloride) is usually scattered on the road to increase the grip.
ref: The most common cause for accidents in winter is slippery roads, pavements (sidewalks) and especially steps. At a minimum, you need footwear with suitable soles. Summer shoes are usually very slippery on ice and snow, even some winter boots are deficient. The pattern should be deep enough, 5 mm (1/5 inch) or more, and the material soft enough in cold temperatures. Some boots have studs and there is studded add-on equipment for slippery conditions, suitable for most shoes and boots, for the heels or heels and sole. Heels should be low and wide. Sand, gravel or salt (calcium chloride) is often scattered on roads or paths to improve traction.

src: "Kapuloan Cook mangrupikeun nagara pulo anu boga hubungan bébas jeung Selandia Baru, lokasina di Polinesia, di tengah Sagara Pasifik Kidul. Ieu téh nyaéta kapulauan anu terdiri ti 15 pulau anu kasebar di lautan salega 2,2 juta km2. Kusabab zona waktuna sami sareng Hawaii, kapuloan ieu kadang disebut ""Hawaii handap"". Sanaos langkung alit, éta ngingetan sababaraha pangunjung anu tos sepuh di Hawaii ka nagara kalayan tanpa hotél wisata ageung sareng kamajuan sanés. Kapuloan Cook henteu boga dayeuh nanging boga 15 pulo anu béda. Pulo utama nyaéta Rarotonga sareng Aitutaki."
mt: "The Cook Islands are a self-governing country in free association with New Zealand, located in the Pacific Ocean, between New Zealand and Hawaii. It is a 15-island nation, with a total land area of 240 square kilometres (92.6 sq mi) and a population of about 20,000. The Cook Islands' 15 islands have varying geologies and landforms, with eight of the fifteen being coral atolls. The country is located 2,800 kilometres (1,750 mi) northeast of New Zealand, 5,000 kilometres (3,100 mi) southwest of Hawaii, and 1,240 kilometres (770 mi) north of Tahiti. The nation has universal suffrage and democratic government, with parliamentary democracy and a president as the head of state. The Cook Islands uses the New Zealand dollar as its currency, and New Zealand citizens are entitled to citizenship of the Cook Islands, with the converse also true."
ref: "The Cook Islands are an island country in free association with New Zealand, located in Polynesia, in the middle of the South Pacific Ocean. It is an archipelago with 15 islands spread out over 2.2 million km2 of ocean. With the same time zone as Hawaii, the islands are sometimes thought of as ""Hawaii down under"". Though smaller, it reminds some elderly visitors of Hawaii before statehood without all the large tourist hotels and other development. The Cook Islands do not have any cities but are composed of 15 different islands. The main ones are Rarotonga and Aitutaki."
