src: Idin kedah di pesen sateuacanna. Anjeun kedah ngagaduhan idin pikeun cicing di Sirena. Sirena mangrupiken hiji-hijina stasuin ranger anu nawiskeun kos-kosan sareng tuangeun panas  sakalian kémping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, sareng Los Patos nawiskeun kémping anu teu aya jasa tuang. Anjeun tiasa nyuhunkeun ijin taman ka patugas khusus di Puerto Jiménez, tapi aranjeunna teu nampi kartu krédit. Layanan taman (MINAE) atos teu ngaluarkeun izin taman langkung ti sabulan sateuacan waktos anu diperkirakeun kanggo dongkap. CafeNet El Sol nawiskeun jasa pemesanan tempat saharga $30 AS, atanapi $10 kanggo tiket sadinten pinuh; detil aya dina halaman Corcovado.
mt: You must reserve in advance. You must have a permit to camp at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers cabins and hot showers, as well as camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos do not offer camping services. You can get a park permit from the special ranger in Puerto Jiménez, but they don't accept credit cards. The park service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of the expected closure date. CafeNet El Sol offers cabin reservations for $30 US, or $10 per person per night; details are on the Corcovado page.
ref: Permits must be reserved in advance. You must have a permit to stay overnight at Sirena. Sirena is the only ranger station that offers dormitory lodging and hot meals in addition to camping. La Leona, San Pedrillo, and Los Patos offer only camping with no food service. It is possible to secure park permits directly from the Ranger Station in Puerto Jiménez, but they do not accept credit cards The Park Service (MINAE) does not issue park permits more than one month in advance of anticipated arrival. CafeNet El Sol offers a reservation service for a fee of US$30, or $10 for one-day passes; details on their Corcovado page.

src: Piknik saaayana nganggo ski: kagiatan ieu ogé disebat ski ka pedalaman, ski tur, atanapi ski hiking. Ieu aya hubunganna tapi biasana henteu ngalibatkeun tur ski gaya alpin atawa naék gunung, anu pamungkasna dilaksanakeun di médan curam anu meryogikeun ski sareng sapatu bot anu leuwih kaku. Bayangkeun rute ski sapertos rute nanjak. Dina kaayaan anu saé, anjeun bakal tiasa nutupan jarak anu langkung jauh tibatan leumpang - tapi jarang pisan anjeun sami sareng kecepatan ski antar negeri tanpa mawa ransel anu beurat dina jalur anu rata.
mt: A picnic with skis: this activity is also called backcountry skiing, ski touring, or ski hiking. It has a connection to alpine skiing or uphill skiing, which is usually performed on steep terrain that requires ski and boot bindings. Imagine a ski route like a hiking route. In good conditions, you can cover more distance than skinning - but rarely will you match the speed of cross-country skiing without a heavy pack on a flat trail.
ref: Backpacking by ski: This activity is also called backcountry ski, ski touring or ski hiking. It is related to but usually not involving alpine style ski touring or mountaineering, the latter ones done in steep terrain and requiring much stiffer skis and boots. Think of the skiing route as of a similar hiking route. In good conditions you will be able to cover somewhat greater distances than walking – but only very seldom you will get the speeds of cross country skiing without a heavy backpack in groomed tracks.

src: Guncangan lebet deui datang langkung gancang tibatan budaya kaget (fase bulan madu dikirangan), langkung lami, sareng tiasa langkung parah. Wisatawan anu teu sesah nyesuaikeun dirina sareng budaya anyar biasana malah sesah pas uwih deui ka budaya aslina. Lamun anjeun uwih deui ka nagara asal saatos linggih di luar negeri, anjeun pasti atos adaptasi sareng budaya anu anyar sareng kaleungitan sakedik kabiasaan ti budaya asli anjeun. Nalika anjeun mimitian ka luar negeri, jalma-jalma tiasa sabar sareng ngarti, terang yén palancong di nagara anyar kedah adaptasi. Jalmi-jalmi manawi henteu sadar yen kesabaran sarta pengertian oge diperlukeun kanggo para turis anu wangsul ka bumi.
mt: The second culture shock comes faster than the honeymoon phase (cultural shock), sooner, and can be worse. Tourists who are not happy with the new culture are often unhappy when they return to their original culture. When you first go abroad, people can be patient and understand that tourists in a new country must adapt. People who do not realize that patience and understanding are also needed for tourists who return to their home.
ref: Re-entry shock comes on sooner than culture shock (there's less of a honeymoon phase), lasts longer, and can be more severe. Travellers who had an easy time adjusting to the new culture sometimes have a particularly hard time readjusting to their native culture. When returning home after living abroad, you've adapted to the new culture and lost some of your habits from your home culture. When you went abroad at first, people were probably patient and understanding, knowing that travellers in a new country need to adapt. People may not anticipate that patience and understanding are also necessary for travellers returning home.

src: Moose (kawanoh ohe disebat elk) asli na mah henteu galak, ngan bakal mertahankeun dirina lamun ngarasa kaanceum. Lamun jelema heunteu nganggap rusa picilakaeun, maranéhna bisa waé ngadeukeutan jeung kusabab saking deukeut teuing matak nyilakakeun maranéhna sorangan.
mt: Moose (also known as elk) are not usually aggressive, but will defend themselves if they feel threatened. If people do not respect moose, they can easily injure themselves because of their close proximity to the animals.
ref: Moose (also known as elk) aren't inherently aggressive, but will defend themselves if they perceive a threat. When people don't see moose as potentially dangerous, they may approach too closely and put themselves at risk.

src: Moose (kawanoh ohe disebat elk) asli na mah henteu galak, ngan bakal mertahankeun dirina lamun ngarasa kaanceum. Lamun jelema heunteu nganggap rusa picilakaeun, maranéhna bisa waé ngadeukeutan jeung kusabab saking deukeut teuing matak nyilakakeun maranéhna sorangan.

src: Di beurang anu panas, wisatawan tiasa ningali fatamorgana anu nampakkeun ilusi sepertos cai (atawa benda lainna). Picilakaeun lamun wisatawan ngudag fatamorgana, miceun-miceun energi jeung cai anu sesana. Malah gurun anu pangpanasna ogé tiasa janten tiris pisan upami wengi mah. Hipotérmia nyaéta résiko panggedéna lamun teu nganggo anggoan haneut.
mt: In hot weather, tourists can see a mirage that appears as an illusion of water (or other objects). If tourists drink mirage water, they will become dehydrated and thirsty. Even the hottest deserts can be very cold at night. Hypothermia is the greatest risk if not wearing proper clothing.
ref: In the heat of the day, travelers can experience mirages that give the illusion of water (or other things). These can be dangerous if the traveler pursue the mirage, wasting precious energy and remaining water. Even the hottest of deserts can become extremely cold at night. Hypothermia is a real risk without warm clothing.

src: Républik Dominika (Spanyol: Republik Dominika) Mangrupikeun nagara Karibia anu  nempatan bagian belah wetan pulau Hispaniola, anu di bagi sareng Haiti. Iwal ti tetempoan keusik bodas sareng pagunungan, nagara ieu mangrupikeun bumi pikeun dayeuh Éropa anu pangkolotna di Amerika, ayeuna bagian ti Santo Domingo. Pulo éta mimitina dicicingan ku Tainos sareng Caribes. Jalmi-jalmi Caribes nyaéta jalmi-jalmi anu nyarios basa Arawakan anu atos anjog kira-kira 10.000 SM. DIna sababaraha taun pondok saatos datangna penjelajah éropa, populasi Tainos di kirangan  secara signifikan ku parebut Spanyol. Dumasarkeun kana Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) antara taun 1492 nepi keun ka taun 1498 penjajah Spanyol tos meuncit sakitar 100,000 jalma Taínos.
mt: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern two-thirds of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti. Besides its white-sand beaches and tropical climate, the Dominican Republic is also home to the oldest European city in the Americas, Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taíno people, an Arawakan-speaking group who practiced agriculture (particularly of maize, yucca and beans) and fishing. They had no central government but were ruled through villages and tribes. They called themselves Kiskeya, "Mother of the Land", or Boriquén, "Land of Valiant and Noble Men". Christopher Columbus landed on the island on December 5, 1492, during his first voyage, and later claimed it for Spain. The island became a springboard for the Spanish conquest of the Caribbean and the American mainland. The name Quisqueya, which comes from the indigenous language, was given to the island by the Taínos. The name was changed to Hispaniola when the island was claimed by Spain.
ref: The Dominican Republic (Spanish: República Dominicana) is a Caribbean country that occupies the eastern half of the island of Hispaniola, which it shares with Haiti Besides white sand beaches and mountain landscapes, the country is home to the oldest European city in the Americas, now part of Santo Domingo. The island was first inhabited by the Taínos and Caribes. The Caribes were an Arawakan-speaking people who had arrived around 10,000 BCE. Within a few short years following the arrival of European explorers, the population of Tainos had significantly been reduced by the Spanish conquerors Based on Fray Bartolomé de las Casas (Tratado de las Indias) between 1492 and 1498 the Spanish conquerors killed around 100,000 Taínos.

src: "Olahraga salju nurunan gunung, kalebet ski sareng seluncur salju, nyaéta olahraga kasohor nu ngalibatkeun nyorodot dina taneuh anu katutupan salju nganggo alat ski atanapi papan selucur anu dipasang dina sampéan anjeun. Ski nyaéta salah sahiji kagiatan nyaba nu utama jeung loba nu resep, sakapeung dipikawanoh ku ""gelandang ski"", anu ngarancang sakabéh liburan sabudeureun tempat ski éta. Ski atos aya ti saprak jaman baheula — gambar di guha anu ngagambarkeun jalma anu maén ski atos aya ti 5000 taun Sateuacan Maséhi! Ski nurunan bukit minangka olahraga dimimitian sahenteuna abad ka-17, sarta dina taun 1861 klub ski rékréasi munggaran dibuka ku urang Norwégia di Australia."
mt: "Skiing down a mountain, including skiing and sledding, is a popular sport that involves sliding down snow-covered ground on skis or sleds attached to one's feet. Skiing is one of the oldest forms of winter recreation and is often known by the term "ski holiday", which designs all the fun around the ski resort. Skiing has been around since ancient times — pictures of people skiing date back 5000 years before Christ! Skiing down a hill is a sport that began in the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by the Norwegians in Australia."
ref: "Downhill snowsports, which include skiing and snowboarding, are popular sports involving sliding down snow-covered terrain with skis or a snowboard attached to your feet. Skiing is a major travelling activity with many enthusiasts, occasionally known as ""ski bums,"" planning entire vacations around skiing at a particular location. The idea of skiing is very old — cave paintings depicting skiers date back as far as 5000 BC! Downhill skiing as a sport goes back to at least the 17th century, and in 1861 the first recreational ski club was opened by Norwegians in Australia."

src: Kapuloan Afrika Wétan téh lokasina dina Samudra Hindia sisi basisir wétanna Afrika. Madagascar sajauh ieu jadi anu panggedéna, sareng mangrupikeun buana terpisah dina kahirupan sato liar. Kaseueuran pulo-pulo leutik mangrupikeun nagara bagian mandiri, atanapi aya hubunganana sareng Perancis, sareng dikenal salaku pantai méwah. orang arab oge anu mawa Islam ka pulau eta, jeung bisa loba mangaruhan di daerah Comoros jeung Mayotte Pangaruh Eropa jeung kolonialisme dimimiti tina abad ka-15, keur penjelajah Portugis, Vasco da Gama manggihkeun rute Cape ti Eropa ka India.
mt: The East African islands are located in the Indian Ocean off the east coast of Africa. Madagascar is the largest, and is a separate island in terms of wildlife. The small island chain is a semi-autonomous region, or has a relationship with France, and is known as the "scattered islands". Arabs and Muslims also came to the island, and have had a lot of influence in the Comoros and Mayotte areas. European and colonial influence began in the 15th century, with Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama finding the Cape route from Europe to India.
ref: The East African Islands are in the Indian Ocean off the eastern coast of Africa. Madagascar is by far the biggest, and a continent on its own when it comes to wildlife. Most of the smaller islands are independent nations, or associated with France, and known as luxury beach resorts. The Arabs also brought Islam to the lands, and it took in a big way in the Comoros and Mayotte. European influence and colonialism began in the 15th century, as Portuguese explorer Vasco da Gama found the Cape Route from Europe to India.

src: Aya tradisi hudang dugi ka énjing dina wengi Paskah di sababaraha tempat anu kabuka pikeun ningali panonpoé naék. Tangtos waé aya wawaran téologis Kristen kanggo talari ieu,nanging manawi éta téh ritual Usum Semi sarta Kesuburan pra-Kristen. Langkung loba garéja tradisional anu sering ngarayakeun Wengi Paskah dina dinten Saptu dina ahir minggu Paskah, sareng para jamaah sering ngaayakeun acara di tengah wengi kanggo ngarayakeun kebangkitan Kristus.
mt: There is a tradition of sunrise viewing on Easter morning in some places that are open to see the sun rise. There is no theological Christian warrant for this, but if it is a ritual of the Spring Equinox and Fertility pre-Christian. More traditional churches often celebrate Easter Sunday on the Saturday evening at the end of Easter week, and parishioners often hold events in the middle of the night to celebrate the resurrection of Christ.
ref: There's a tradition to pass the Easter night awake at some exposed point to see the sunrise. There are of course Christian theological explanations for this tradition, but it may well be a pre-Christian Spring and Fertility ritual. More traditional churches often hold an Easter Vigil on Saturday night during the Easter weekend, with the congregations often breaking into celebration at the stroke of midnight to celebrate Christ's resurrection.

src: Ekuador ngawajibkeun urang Kuba kedah nampi serat uleman sateuacan lebet ka Ekuador liwat bandara internasional atanapi perbatasan. Serat ieu kedah dilegalkeun ku Kementrian Luar Nagri Ekuador, sareng kedah sasuai sareng syarat-syarat anu geus ditangtukeun. Syarat ieu dirancang pikeun nyayogikeun aliran migrasi anu leuwih kaatur diantara dua nagara. warga Kuba anu ngagaduhan US Green Card tiasa ngadatangan Konsulat Ekuador supados tiasa bebas tina persyaratan ieu Paspor anjeun kedah berlaku sahenteuna 6 bulan kaping anjeun angkat. Tiket bulak balik kedah aya kanggo ngabuktikeun lilana anjeun tetep diditu.
mt: Ecuador requires Cuban citizens to obtain a visa before entering Ecuador through international airports or borders. This visa must be approved by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and must comply with the requirements set. This requirement is designed to regulate migration flows between the two countries. Cubans with US Green Cards can visit the Ecuadorian consulate to be exempt from this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months from the date of your arrival. Round-trip tickets must be presented to prove that you will be leaving.
ref: Ecuador requires that Cuban citizens receive an invitation letter prior to entering Ecuador through international airports or frontier admission points. This letter must be legalized by the Ecuadorian Ministry of Foreign Affairs, and comply with certain requirements. These requirements are designed to provide an organized migratory flow between both countries. Cuban citizens who are US green card holders should visit an Ecuadorian Consulate to obtain an exemption to this requirement. Your passport must be valid for at least 6 months beyond your travel dates. A round/onward trip ticket is needed to prove the length of your stay.

src: Kacasoca tiasa langkung mirah di nagara luar, utamana di nagara anu penghasilanna-kirang anu ongkos pagawéna langkung handap. Partimbangan ngetes panon di bumi teh, utamina upami asuransi anjeun nutupan éta, sareng nyandak resep di tempat sanés. Merek-merek anu mahal nu aya di sababaraha daérah gaduh dua masalah; sabagian na palsu, jeung anu meunang impor hargana leuwih awis.
mt: The price of contact lenses can be higher in other countries, especially in countries with low production costs and low labor costs. Testing on the ground, especially if your insurance does not cover it, and getting a prescription from another place. Brands that are available in some areas have two problems; some are fake, and those that are imported are cheaper.
ref: Eyeglasses can be cheaper in a foreign country, especially in low-income countries where labour costs are lower. Consider getting an eye exam at home, especially if insurance covers it, and bringing the prescription along to be filed elsewhere. High-end brand-name frames available in such areas may have two problems; some may be knock-offs, and the real imported ones may be more expensive than at home.

src: Mata uang resmi Falklands téh nyaéta pound Falkland (FKP) anu nilaina sami sareng hiji pound Inggris (GBP). Artos tiasa ditukerkeun di hiji-hijina bank nu aya di pulau anu lokasina di Stanley sebrangeun toko FIC West. Pon Inggris sacara umum bakal ditampi di kapuloan mana wae sareng kartu Stanley sareng dolar AS ogé sering ditampi. Di pulo kapuloan kartu kiridit henteu tiasa katampi, sanaos mata uang Inggris sareng AS tiasa ditarima; tanyakeun ka anu bogana pikeun nangtoskeun naon padika pembayaran anu tiasa ditampi. Ampir teu mungkin nuker keun duit Falkland di luar pulo, matak kudu nuker keun heula saacan ninggalkeun pulo.
mt: The official currency of the Falklands is the Falkland pound (FKP), which is worth the same as a pound sterling (GBP). It can be exchanged at the only bank on the island in Stanley, as well as at FIC West. British pounds are generally accepted on the islands and Stanley cards and US dollars are also often accepted. Credit cards are not accepted, but British and US currency can be used; ask what forms of payment are accepted. It is unlikely that Falkland pounds can be exchanged outside the island, as they must be exchanged before leaving the island.
ref: The official Falklands currency is the Falkland pound (FKP) whose value is set equivalent to that of one British pound (GBP). Money can be exchanged at the only bank in the islands which is located in Stanley across from the FIC West store. British pounds will generally be accepted anywhere in the islands and within Stanley credit cards and United States dollars are also often accepted. On the outlying islands credit cards will probably not be accepted, although British and United States currency may be taken; check with the owners in advance to determine what is an acceptable payment method. It is nearly impossible to exchange Falklands currency outside of the islands, so exchange money prior to leaving the islands.

src: Kalobaan kuil ngarayakeun festival taunan mimiti bulan November nepi ka pertengahan Mei. Rupa-rupa sesuai kalender taunan masing-masing kuil. Kalolobaan acara kuil dirayakeun salaku bagéan tina tepang taun kuil atanapi milangkala déwa atanapi acara-acara gedé anu séjén anu aya hubunganana sareng kuil. Perayaan kuil Kerala resep pisan keur ditonton, kalayan prosési rutin gajah dihias, orkéstra kuil, sareng perayaan séjénna.
mt: The festival is celebrated annually from November to mid-May. The various rituals of the temples are in accordance with the annual calendar of each temple. The temple festivals are celebrated as part of the temple's annual festival or the birthday of the deity or other major events that are related to the temple. The Kerala temple festivals are particularly famous for their regular elephant processions, temple orchestras, and other celebrations.
ref: Most of the temples do have an Annual festival starting from November end to Mid of May, which varies according to each temple's annual calendar. Most of the temple festivals is celebrated as part of temple's anniversary or presiding deity's birthday or any other major event associated with the temple. Kerala's temple festivals are very interesting to see, with regular procession of decorated elephants, temple orchestra and other festivities.

src: Cara anu jelas naek pasawat di kelas utama atanapi bisnis nyaéta mayar artos nu seueur pikeun meunang kaistiméwaan khusus (atanapi, langkung saé, gaduh perusahaan anjeun ngalakukeun hal pikeun anjeun). tapi, eta teh henteu murah; sapangalaman abdi, anjeun bisa wae mayar 4 kali langkung awis tinu harga ekonomi anu kanggo bisnis biasa sareng sawelas kali langkung awis kanggo kelas anu kahiji Sacara umum, henteu aya gunana neangan diskon kanggo korsi bisnis atanapi kelas munggaran pikeun penerbangan langsung ti A ka B. Maskapai penerbangan apal pisan yén aya sekelompok penerbang anu daék mayar langkung mahal keur menangkeun hak istimewa pikeun indit ka hiji tempat kalayan gancang sareng nyaman, sareng meakeun biaya nu sesuai.
mt: The obvious way to upgrade to business or first class is to pay a lot for perks (or, more generally, to have your company do it for you). But this is not cheap; in my experience, you can pay four times the price of a regular economy fare and seven times the price of a regular first-class fare for a direct flight from A to B. Airlines are well aware that there is a group of travelers who are willing to pay more for the privilege of getting to a place quickly and comfortably, and to pay the appropriate price.
ref: The obvious way of flying in first or business class is to fork out a thick wad of money for the privilege (or, better yet, get your company to do it for you). However, this does not come cheap: as rough rules of thumb, you can expect to pay up to four times the normal economy fare for business, and eleven times for first class! Generally speaking, there is no point in even looking for discounts for business or first-class seats on direct flights from A to B. Airlines know well that there is a certain core group of flyers who are willing to pay top dollar for the privilege of getting somewhere fast and in comfort, and charge accordingly.

src: Maskapai sapertos Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines parantos ngaluaskeun layanana ka Afrika, sareng nawarkeun konéksi ka seueur dayeuh-dayeuh ageung di Afrika kalawan pangaos bersaingjeung maskapai Éropa lianna. Maskapai Turkish ngalayang ka 39 tujuan di 30 nagara di Afrika ti taun 2014. Upami anjeun gaduh waktos tambahan lalampahan, periksa sabaraha tawaran tarif sadayana lalampahan anjeun ka Afrika sareng tarif lalampahan keliling dunya. Tong hilap keur nambahan biaya langkung kanggo visa tambahan, pajak indit, transportasi darat, jeung nu sanés. keur sagala tempat di luar Afrika.
mt: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways and Turkish Airlines have recently opened up service to Africa, and are offering connections to many major cities in Africa competing with European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 countries in Africa from 2014. If you have extra time, check out some of the best deals on flights to Africa and around the world. Also, be sure to add on extra fees for visas, taxes, ground transportation, and other fees. For all places outside of Africa.
ref: Airlines such as Emirates, Etihad Airways, Qatar Airways & Turkish Airlines have greatly expanded their services to Africa, and offer connections to many major African cities at competitive rates than other European airlines. Turkish Airlines flies to 39 destinations in 30 African countries as of 2014. If you have additional travel time, check to see how your total fare quote to Africa compares with a round-the-world fare. Don't forget to add in the extra costs of additional visas, departure taxes, ground transportation, etc. for all those places outside of Africa.

src: Ngagaleuh tuangeun di supermarket biasana mangrupikeun cara anu paling murah pikeun nyandak dahareun. Tanpa kasempetan masak, pilihan dugi ka dahareun anu cepat saji. Tosérba ayeuna nambihan deui jenis-jenis tuangeun anu siap saji. Sababaraha malah aya ogé aya nu nyayogikeun oven microwave atanapi alat séjén anu tiasa dianggo pikeun manaskeun tuangeun. Di sababaraha nagara atawa rupi toko sahenteuna aya hiji restoran di tempat,remen oge anu rada informal kalawan pangaos kahontal.
mt: Cooking in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get food. Without the opportunity to cook, the choice goes to ready-to-eat food. Supermarkets are now adding more types of ready-to-eat food. Some even have microwave ovens or other appliances that can be used to cook food. In some countries or regions, there is a restaurant in the place, even a little informal with the ease of getting.
ref: Buying food in supermarkets is usually the cheapest way to get fed. Without cooking opportunities, choices are however limited to ready-made food. Increasingly supermarkets are getting a more varied section of ready-made food. Some even provide a microwave oven or other means to heat food. In some countries or types of stores there is at least one on-site restaurant, often a rather informal one with affordable prices.

src: Variasi basa Perancis anu dinyarioskeun di Bélgia jeung Swiss téh sakedik béda tina basa Perancis anu dinyarioskeun di Perancis, sanaos duanana sami-sami mirip jeung kedah dingartikeun. Khususna, sistem penomoran di Bélgia jeung Swiss anu nyarios bahasa Prancis gaduh rada aneh tibatan anu nyarios bahasa Prancis di nagara Prancis, sareng cara ngucapkeuna ogé bénteun saalit. Sanaos kitu, sadaya urang Bélgia jeung Swiss anu nyarios basa Perancis parantos diajar basa Perancis standar di sakola, jadina aranjeunna téh tiasa ngartos anjeun komo upami anjeun nganggo sistem panomeran Perancis standar.
mt: Variations of French spoken in Belgium and Switzerland are slightly different from French spoken in France, although they are mutually intelligible.  Especially, the numbering system in Belgium and Switzerland is a bit strange compared to French in France, and the pronunciation is also different.  However, all Belgians and Swiss who speak French have been taught standard French in school, so they can understand each other if they use the standard French numbering system.
ref: The varieties of French which are spoken in Belgium and Switzerland differ slightly from the French spoken in France, though they are similar enough to be mutually intelligible. In particular, the numbering system in French-speaking Belgium and Switzerland has some slight peculiarities that are different from the French spoken in France, and the pronunciation of some words is slightly different. Nevertheless, all French-speaking Belgians and Swiss would have learned standard French in school, so they would be able to understand you even if you used the standard French numbering system.

src: Ngan sababaraha maskapai anu nawarkeun kénéh tarif kapapaténan, anu masihan diskon alit waragad pamakaman di menit ahir. Maskapai anu nawiskeun ieu jasa kalebet Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa pikeun penerbangan anu asalna ti Amérika Serikat atanapi Kanada, sareng WestJet. Dina sagala kaayaan, anjeun kedah mesen nganggo telepon langsung ka maskapaina.
mt: Only a few airlines are still offering the fourth day of bereavement fares, which offer a small cash discount. Airlines offering this service include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating in the United States or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must call the airline directly to purchase.
ref: Only a few airlines still offer bereavement fares, which slightly discount the cost of last-minute funeral travel. Airlines that offer these include Air Canada, Delta Air Lines, Lufthansa for flights originating from the U.S. or Canada, and WestJet. In all cases, you must book by phone directly with the airline.

src: Nganggo aplikasi GPS panunjuk arah dina hp mangrupikeun jalan anu paling gampil pikeun janten panunjuk arah nalika anjeun di luar negeri. Ieu tiasa ngahémat artos timbang meser peta pikeun GPS, atawa alat GPS anu mandiri atawa nyéwa hiji ti pausahaan séwa mobil. Upami anjeunteu ngagaduham konéksi data pinkeu hapé atawa jaringan na di luar jangkauan, kinerja na tiasa kawatés atanapi henteu sayogi.
mt: Using GPS navigation apps on your phone can be a great way to get directions when you're abroad. It can save you the cost of buying a map for your GPS, or renting one from a car rental company. If you're in an area with poor data or network coverage, however, your GPS may not work or may not be useful.
ref: Using GPS navigation apps on your smartphone can be the easiest and most convenient way to navigate when out of your home country. It can save money over buying new maps for a GPS, or a standalone GPS device or renting one from a car rental company. If you don't have a data connection for your phone, or when it is out of range, their performance can be limited or unavailable.

src: Ningalian tempat jeung alam liar na Galapagos paling alus nganggo kapal, siga nu dilakukeun ku Charles Darwin dina taun 1835. Langkung ti 60 palayaran nyebrang ti cai Galapagos - rata-rata 8 dugi ka 100 panumpang. Lolobana masarakat téh mesen tempat jauh sateuacanna (sabab kapal biasana pinuh pas usum na ramé). Pastikeun anjeun mesen ka agén anu mangrupikeun spésialis Galapagos anu jembar pangaweruh tur ngagaduhan réa jinis kapal. Ieu bakal mastikeun karesep atanapi kakirangan anjeun téh cocok sareng kapal anu cocok sareng maranéhna.
mt: The best way to see the Galapagos' wildlife and scenery is by boat, as Charles Darwin did in 1835. More than 60 cruises visit the Galapagos, with an average of eight to 100 passengers. Most of the population is remote (because boats are usually full during the high season). Make sure you book through an agent who specializes in Galapagos and has a wide range of boats. This will ensure that your preferences or requirements are matched with the right boat.
ref: Seeing the sites and wildlife of the Galapagos is best done by boat, just as Charles Darwin did it in 1835. Over 60 cruise ships ply the Galapagos waters - ranging in size from 8 to 100 passengers. Most people book their place well in advance (as the boats are usually full during the high season). Be sure the agent through whom you book is a Galapagos specialist with a good knowledge of a wide variety of ships. This will ensure that your particular interests and/or constraints are matched with the ship most suitable to them.

src: Kasino biasana ngalakukeun seueur usaha pikeun maksimalkeun pungsi waktos sareng artos anu di anggo ku tamu. Jandela sareng jam biasana teu aya, sareng panto kaluarna biasana sesah dipilarian. Aranjeunna biasana ngagaduhan katuangan khusus, inuman sareng nawiskeun hiburan pikeun sémah tetep dina kasenangan sareng tetep di lokasi. Sababaraha tempat nawarkeun inuman alkohol di imah. Kumaha oge, mabok teh ngurangan kana kaputusan, kabeh tukang judi nu hade ngarti pentingna tetep sadar.
mt: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize the time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and the exits are usually heavily guarded. They usually provide special drinks, food and entertainment for the gamblers to remain comfortable and on-site. Some places offer alcoholic drinks in the house. Also, getting drunk reduces the chances of winning, all gamblers who know the importance of staying sober.
ref: Casinos typically make many efforts to maximize time and money spent by guests. Windows and clocks are usually absent, and exits can be hard to find. They usually have special food, drink and entertainment offers, to keep guests in a good mood, and keep them at the premise. Some venues offer alcoholic beverages on the house. However, drunkenness impairs judgement, and all good gamblers know the importance of staying sober.

src: Kabeh kata benda, sinareng kata Sie kanggo anjeun, osok dimimitian ku hurup gede, sanajan aya di tengah-tengah kalimat Ieu téh cara anu penting keur ngabédakeun sababaraha kecap kerja jeung benda. Ieu tiasa ngadamel maca leuwih gampil, sanaos nulis téh émang rada sesah karna butuh malarian kecap kerja sareng kecap sipat dianggo di bentuk anu tiasa dibuktikeun kabeneran na.
mt: All nouns, including the pronoun Sie, begin with a capital letter, although there are exceptions in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between verbs and nouns. It makes reading easier, although writing is a bit cumbersome because it requires the use of verbs and adjectives in a form that can be proven to be true.
ref: All nouns, alongside the word Sie for you, always begin with a capital letter, even in the middle of a sentence. This is an important way to distinguish between some verbs and objects. It also arguably makes reading easier, though writing is somewhat complicated by the need to find out whether a verb or adjective is used in a substantivized form.

src: "Di babaraha tempat di dunya, ngageupayan leungeun nyaeta gestur ramah anu hartina ""halo"". Tapi, di Malaysia, sahenteuna diantara urang Melayu lembur, éta hartosna ""kadieu,"" mirip jeung curuk anu ditekuk kana awak, sikep anu dianggo di nagara-nagara kulon tertentu, jeung kudu dianggo pikeun tujuan éta waé. Sami ogé, saurang wisatawan Inggris di Spanyol tiasa salah ngartikeun dadah nu ngalibatkeun talapak panangan pas berhadapan sareng nu ngadadahan (tibatan jalmi anu didadahan) salaku tanda pikeun balik deui."
mt: "In many places around the world, extending the arm is a friendly gesture meaning "hello." But in Malaysia, especially among the Malay majority, it means "come here," similar to a clenched fist held to the chest, used in certain Western countries for that purpose. Also, a British tourist in Spain might misinterpret a drug dealer's hand gesture involving the soles of the feet when facing the dealer (as opposed to the person being sold drugs) as a sign to "come back."
ref: "In many parts of the world, waving is a friendly gesture, indicating ""hello."" However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

However, in Malaysia, at least among the Malays in rural areas, it means ""come over,"" similar to the index finger bent toward the body, a gesture which is used in certain Western countries, and should be used only for that purpose. Similarly, a British traveller in Spain may mistake a wave goodbye involving the palm facing the waver (rather than the person being waved at) as a gesture to come back."

src: Glasier téh teu stabil, tapi ngalir turun gunung. Ieu bakal nyababkeun retakan, celah, anu tiasa dihalangan ku sasak salju. Témbok sareng hateup guha és téh tiasa runtuh jeung retakan tiasa ditutup. Dina tungtung glasier, balok-balok ageung lepas, ragrag sareng tiasa waé luncat atanapi ngagulung salajengna tina tungtung.
mt: The glacier is unstable, but flowing downhill. This will cause crevasses, which can be bridged by snow bridges. Walls and ceilings of caves may collapse and crevasses may be filled. At the end of the glacier, large blocks may calve, crack and may roll or slide away from the terminus.
ref: The glaciers are not stable, but flow down the mountain. This will cause cracks, crevasses, which may be obscured by snow bridges. The walls and roofs of ice caves can collapse and cracks can get closed. At the edge of glaciers huge blocks break loose, fall down and perhaps jump or roll farther from the edge.

src: Goma mangrupakeun kota wisata di Républik Démokratik Kongo di tungtung wétan caket Rwanda. Dina taun 2002 Goma ancur ku lahar ti gunung merapi Nyiragongo anu ngubur kalolobaan jalan kota, hususna pusat kota. Nalika Goma lumayan aman, tiap kunjungan iwal ti Goma mah kedah apal keur aya perang naon nu lumanggung  di propinsi Kivu kalér. Kota ieu ogé ngarupakeun dasar panaékan gunung merapi Nyiragongo babarengan sareng sababaraha panaékan Pagunungan Gorilla pangmurahna di Afrika. Anjeun tiasa nganggo boda-boda (ojek) kanggo ngurilingan Goma. Harga normalna (lokal) kira-kira 500 Franc Kongo kanggo jarak anu caket.
mt: Goma is a tourist city in the Democratic Republic of the Congo in eastern Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was flooded by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which destroyed many roads, especially the city center. When Goma is relatively safe, any visit to Goma must be aware of what war is going on in the northern province of Kivu. This city is also the base of the cheapest gorilla trekking in Africa. You can use a boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to tour Goma. The normal price (local) is about 500 Congolese francs for short distances.
ref: Goma is a tourist city of the Democratic Republic of Congo in the extreme east near Rwanda. In 2002 Goma was destroyed by lava from the Nyiragongo volcano which buried most of the town’s streets, particularly the town centre. While Goma is reasonably safe, any visits outside of Goma should be researched to understand the state of the fighting that persists in the North Kivu province. The city is also the base to climb the Nyiragongo volcano along with some of the cheapest Mountain Gorilla tracking in Africa. You can use boda-boda (motorcycle taxi) to get around Goma. The normal (local) price is ~500 Congolese Francs for the short ride.

src: "Kémping kumaha waé di handapeun sisi kota Grand Canyon peryogi ijin pedalaman. Idin di watesan pikeun mayungan gaung, sareng sayogi dina dinten ka 1 unggal bulan, 4 bulan sateuacan mimiti bulan. Kusabab éta, ijin kemping mulai ti sasih Mei téh bakal aya kaping 1 Januari. Ruang keur wilayah nu paling terkenal, sapertos Bumi Perkemahan Bright Angel anu sabelahan jeung Phantom Ranch, nu umumna pinuh ti awal tempatna buka. Aya pangwatesan jumlah ijin jang kahoyong langsung jeung aya dijero layanan ""kahiji dongkap, kahiji dilayanan""."
mt: "How about camping under the rim of the Grand Canyon?  Idin at the rim for hiking, and stay on day 1 of each month, 4 months before the first month.  Because of this, camping permits will start on May 1st.  The most popular areas, such as Bright Angel Campground, which is adjacent to Phantom Ranch, are usually full from the opening of the season.  There are limits on the number of permits issued directly and there are ""first come, first served"" services."
ref: Any camping below the rim in Grand Canyon requires a backcountry permit. Permits are limited to protect the canyon, and become available on the 1st day of the month, four months prior to the start month. Thus, a backcountry permit for any start date in May becomes available on 1 Jan. Space for the most popular areas, such as the Bright Angel Campground adjacent to Phantom Ranch, generally fill up by the requests received on first date they are opened to reservations. There are a limited number permits reserved for walk-in requests available on a first come, first served basis.

src: Sababaraha hotél ngagaduhan warisan ti jaman kadigjayaan karéta uap sareng jalur laut; sateuacan Perang Dunya Kadua, di abad ka-19 sareng abad awal ka-20. Hotél-hotel ieu tempat cicingna jalmi-jalmi anu beunghar sareng anu kasohor, sareng gaduh réstoran keur makan malam méwah sareng hiburan wengi. perlengkapan nu jaman baheula, sareng kurangna pasilitas anyar, jeung ogé yuswa anu anggun teh bagian ti ciri khas aranjeunna. Sanaos biasana dipiboga sacara pribadi, aranjeunna sakapeung nampung para pangunjung nagara sareng aparat tinggi. WIsatawan anu seueur artos parantos tiasa ngalayang di sakumna dunya, putus sareng cicing di hotel ieu.
mt: Some hotels have a legacy of the age of steam and sea travel; before World War II, in the 19th and early 20th centuries. These hotels were the places of the rich and famous, and had luxurious dining rooms and nightclubs. Old-fashioned furnishings, and lack of new facilities, and also the age of grace are part of their character. Although usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate government officials and high-ranking visitors. Tourists who are very important can be found in all over the world, and stay in these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: Sababaraha hotél ngagaduhan warisan ti jaman kadigjayaan karéta uap sareng jalur laut; sateuacan Perang Dunya Kadua, di abad ka-19 sareng abad awal ka-20. Hotél-hotel ieu tempat cicingna jalmi-jalmi anu beunghar sareng anu kasohor, sareng gaduh réstoran keur makan malam méwah sareng hiburan wengi. perlengkapan nu jaman baheula, sareng kurangna pasilitas anyar, jeung ogé yuswa anu anggun teh bagian ti ciri khas aranjeunna. Sanaos biasana dipiboga sacara pribadi, aranjeunna sakapeung nampung para pangunjung nagara sareng aparat tinggi. WIsatawan anu seueur artos parantos tiasa ngalayang di sakumna dunya, putus sareng cicing di hotel ieu.
mt: Some hotels have a legacy of the age of steam and sea travel; before World War II, in the 19th and early 20th centuries. These hotels were the places of the rich and famous, and had luxurious dining rooms and nightclubs. Old-fashioned furnishings, and lack of new facilities, and also the age of grace are part of their character. Although usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate government officials and high-ranking visitors. Tourists who are very important can be found in all over the world, and stay in these hotels.
ref: Some hotels have a heritage from the golden age of steam railways and ocean liners; before the Second World War, in the 19th or early 20th centuries. These hotels were where the rich and the famous of the day would stay, and often had fine dining and nightlife. The old fashioned fittings, the lack of the latest amenities, and a certain graceful agedness are also part of their character. While they are usually privately owned, they sometimes accommodate visiting heads of state and other dignitaries. A traveller with piles of money might consider a round the world flight, broken up with stays in many of these hotels.

src: "Ku ayana kabel optik fiber di handapeun laut anu nyambung ka Éropa tur satelit broadband, Greenland kasambung ka 93% populasi anu ngagaduhan aksés internét. Hotel anjeun atanapi tempat nu nampi anjeun teh bakal migaduh WiFi atanapi komputer anu aya internetan, sareng kabeh bumi di daerah eta gaduh warung internet atanapi sababaraha tempat aya WiFi gratis. Sapertos disebatkeun di luhur, sanaos kecap ""Eskimo"" angger tiasa ditarima di Amérika Serikat, kecap éta dianggap ngahina ku seueur jalmi Arktik non-Amérika, utamana di Kanada. Sanaos anjeun manawi ngadéngé sanggem anu dianggo ku jalmi pribumina Greenland, pamakéanna kedah dihindari ku jalmi sejen. warga asli Greenland nyebut diri manehna Inuit di Kanada sareng Kalaalleq (jamak tina Kalaallit), Greenlander, di Greenland Kajahatan, sareng niat goreng pikeun urang asing umumna, hampir teu dipikanyaho di Greenland. Malah di kota-kota, teu aya ""daérah anu jahat."" Cuaca tiis panginten hiji-hijina bahaya nyata anu bakal datang pikeun nu teu siap-siap sateuacanna. Upami anjeun ngadatangan Greenland salami usum tiris (émut langkung jauh ka kalér anjeun angkat, langkung tiis cuacana), penting pikeun mawa baju anu cukup haneut. Dina usum panas, poe nu panjang pisan tiasa nyababkeun masalah kulem anu cekap sareng masalah kaséhatan anu pakait. Tapi, jaman kiwari mah aya seniman graffiti ogé anu mapan, acara graffiti jeung tembok anu ""légal"". Lukisan-lukisan graffiti dina nu kieu téh leuwih ka karya seni sanes tulisan-tulisan nu teu kabaca."
mt: "Local news reports that fiber optic cables under the sea connecting to Europe and broadband satellites, Greenland is connected to 93% of the population with internet access. Your hotel or place of stay will have WiFi or a computer with internet, and all land in this area has internet cafes or some places have free WiFi. As mentioned above, although the word ""Eskimo"" may be acceptable in the United States, the word is considered offensive by many Arctic non-Americans, especially in Canada. Although Greenlanders use the word ""Eskimo"" among themselves, visitors should avoid using it with non-Greenlanders. Greenlanders refer to themselves as Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural of Kalaallit), Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and the desire to avoid outsiders, is generally unknown in Greenland. Even in cities, there are no ""bad areas."" The cold is the only real danger that will come for the unprepared. If you visit Greenland in the winter (it is even colder further north, and even colder still), it is important to bring warm enough clothing. In the summer, long days can cause problems with heat exhaustion and related health issues. However, graffiti art is also present, and there are graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti in this case is more like art than the unreadable scribblings."
ref: "Thanks to undersea fiber optic cable links to Europe and broadband satellite, Greenland is well connected with 93% of the population having internet access. Your hotel or hosts (if staying in a guesthouse or private home) will likely have wifi or an internet connected PC, and all settlements have an internet cafe or some location with public wifi. As mentioned above, though the word ""Eskimo"" remains acceptable in the United States, it is considered pejorative by many non-U.S. Arctic peoples, especially in Canada. While you may hear the word used by Greenlandic Natives, its use should be avoided by foreigners. The native inhabitants of Greenland call themselves Inuit in Canada and Kalaalleq (plural Kalaallit), a Greenlander, in Greenland. Crime, and ill-will toward foreigners in general, is virtually unknown in Greenland. Even in the towns, there are no ""rough areas."" Cold weather is perhaps the only real danger the unprepared will face. If you visit Greenland during cold seasons (considering that the further north you go, the colder it will be), it is essential to bring warm enough clothing. The very long days in the summer can lead to problems getting sufficient sleep and associated health issues. During the summer, also watch out for the Nordic mosquitoes. Although they do not transmit any diseases, they can be irritating."

src: Jardín de la Unión. Ruang ieu diwangun jantén atrium keur biara di abad ka 17, anu mana Templo de San Diego téh nyaéta hiji-hijina bangunan nu aya kénéh. Ayeuna damel salaku alun-alun puseur, sareng teras aya seueur kagiatan, beurang sareng wengi. Aya sababaraha réstoran di sakuriling taman, sarta dina sonten sareng wengina mindeng diayakeun konsér haratis ti gazébo puseur. Callejon del Beso (Gang Ciuman). Dua balkon anu dipisahkeun ngan ukur 69 séntiméter mangrupikeun imah ti legénda cinta nu tos lami. Pikeun sabaraha sén hungkul, budak alit bakal nyaritakeun anjeun carita éta.
mt: Jardín de la Unión. This garden was built as an atrium for a 17th century monastery, of which the Temple of San Diego is the only remaining building. It is now used as a central plaza, and in the evenings and nights is often the site of concerts from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Kissing Alley). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters make up the house of the legend of love that still lasts. For a few cents, a young girl will tell you the story.
ref: Jardín de la Unión. This space was built as the atrium for a 17th-century convent, of which the Templo de San Diego is the sole surviving building. It now functions as the central plaza, and always has a lot of things going on, day and night. There are a number of restaurants surrounding the garden, and in the afternoons and evening there free concerts are often given from the central gazebo. Callejon del Beso (Alley of the Kiss). Two balconies separated by only 69 centimeters is home of an old love legend. For a few pennies some children will tell you the story.

src: Naek gunung nyaeta aktivitas leumpang suku di tempat nu alami, osok oge di jalan panaekan. Day hiking ngalibatkeun jarak kurang ti hiji mil ka jarak anu langkung panjang anu tiasa rengse dina hiji dinten. Keur leumpang sapoe di jalan satapak téh butuh sakedik persiapan, sareng jalmi anu lumayan bugar mah pasti bakal ngarasa nikmat. Kulawargi sareng murangkalih alit panginten peryogi langkung seueur persiapan, tapi sadinten di luar bumi tiasa gampang dilakukeun komo sareng orok sareng murangkalih.
mt: Mountaineering is a form of hiking that is undertaken in regions where there are significant topographic changes. Day hiking is a form of mountaineering that involves travelling a distance of less than one mile in a day. For a solo hike on a single track, a lot of preparation is required, and a fit person will enjoy it. Families and small children require more preparation, but a day trip off-world can be easily accomplished with a backpack and children.
ref: Hiking is an outdoor activity which consists of walking in natural environments, often on hiking trails. Day hiking involves distances of less than a mile up to longer distances that can be covered in a single day. For a day hike along an easy trail little preparations are needed, and any moderately fit person can enjoy them. Families with small children may need more preparations, but a day outdoors is easily possible even with babies and pre-school children.

src: "Ciri khas Norwegia nyaéta fjords anu lungkawing jeung gawir anu ngadadak nanjak, kurang langkung sapertos dataran luhur. Dataran luhur ieu sering disebat ""vidde"" nu hartina tempat lega kabuka, tempat lega nu teu aya bates. di Rogaland jeung Agder mah maranehna sok nyebut ""hei"" teh pikeun ngagambarkeun taneuh lapang nu katutupan semak belukar"
mt: "Norway is characterized by fjords and mountains, less than the highlands. Highlands are often called ""vidde"" which means open, flat land covered with heather"
ref: "Typical for Norway are steep fjords and valleys that suddenly give way to a high, more or less even plateau. These plateaus are often referred to as ""vidde"" meaning a wide, open treeless space, a boundless expanse. In Rogaland and Agder they are usually called ""hei"" meaning a treeless moorland often covered in heather."

src: Usum turis kanggo stasiun bukit biasana ngahontal penclut na salila usum panas India. Kumaha oge, eta teh boga kaalusan jeung pesona nu beda lamun pas  usum tiis, jeung loba stasiun pasir anu ngagaduhan salju nu loba sareng nawarkeun kagiatan siga ski jeung papan salju.
mt: Tourist traffic to hill stations usually peaks during the Indian summer. However, this is also the time when the weather is different and the scenery is different from the winter, and many beaches that have plenty of snow offer activities such as skiing and snow.
ref: The tourist season for the hill stations generally peaks during the Indian summer. However, they have a different kind of beauty and charm during winter, with many hill stations receiving healthy amounts of snow and offering activities such as skiing and snowboarding.

src: Yarakin, keur maneh nepi di pelabuhan sakabehna arek leuwih jelas. Maneh arek kapanggih jeung laleumpang anu narumpang kapal. Manranehna arek mere maneh informasi. Pokokna anjeun bakal masang bewara pikeun nawiskeun bantosan anjeun, wara-wiri di darmaga, ngadeukeutan jalmi anu ngabersihkeun kapal, nyobian keur nyarios ka pelaut di bar, sareng sajabana. Cobian ngobrol ka saseueur-seueurna jalmi . Saatos sababaraha lami, sadaya bakal terang anjeun sareng bakal masihan pituduh ngeunaan kapal anu nuju milari padamel.
mt: Of course, as the ship neared the harbor, the boys became more obvious. Some boys were found with the crew who were stranded on the ship. Some of the boys informed the crew. Basically, they would set up a warning to help the crew, waving at the dock, cleaning the ship, trying to talk to the sailors in the bar, and so on. After a while, everything became clear and they would give instructions about the ship that was about to sail.
ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Yarakin, keur maneh nepi di pelabuhan sakabehna arek leuwih jelas. Maneh arek kapanggih jeung laleumpang anu narumpang kapal. Manranehna arek mere maneh informasi. ref: Be assured that once you hit the marinas everything will be pretty obvious. You will meet other boat hitchhikers and they will share their information with you. Basically you'll be putting up notices offering your help, pacing the docks, approaching people cleaning their yachts, trying to make contact with sailors in the bar, etc. Try to talk to as many people as possible. After a while everyone will know you and will give you hints as to which boat is looking for someone.

src: Pulo Hong Kong masihan nami wilayah Hong Kong anu mangrupikeun tempat nu dianggap ku turis janten pusat utama. Barisan wangunan anu ngajunjung dina cakrawala Hongkong disamikeun sareng diagram batang anu berkilauan anu muncul ku cai di Palabuan Victoria. Kanggo nyaksian pamandangan anu pangsaéna di Hongkong, tinggalkeun Pulo sareng angkat ka sisi laut Kowloon di sebrangna. Seuseueurna pengembangan perkotaan di Hong Kong dipadetkeun ka reklamasi di sapanjang  basisir kalér. Ieu mangrupikeun tempat anu diaku ku penjajah Inggris salaku jajahanna janten lamun anjeun hoyong ningali buktos wilayah penjajah jaman baheula, ieu mangrupikeun tempat anu saé pikeun ngamimitian.
mt: Hong Kong Island is the main tourist area of Hong Kong. The line of skyscrapers on the skyline of Hong Kong is reflected in the Victoria Harbour. To see the best view of Hong Kong, leave the island and take the ferry to Kowloon on the other side. The urban development of Hong Kong is continued by reclamation along the northern coast. This is the place that the British colonists recognized as their colony when you want to see the evidence of the colonial era, this is the place to start.
ref: Hong Kong Island gives the territory of Hong Kong its name and is the place that many tourists regard as the main focus. The parade of buildings that make the Hong Kong skyline has been likened to a glittering bar chart that is made apparent by the presence of the waters of Victoria Harbour. To get the best views of Hong Kong, leave the island and head for the Kowloon waterfront opposite. The great majority of Hong Kong Island's urban development is densely packed on reclaimed land along the northern shore. This is the place the British colonisers took as their own and so if you are looking for evidence of the territory's colonial past, this is a good place to start.

src: Sanggurdi nyaéta panyangga suku pengendara anu ngagantung dina dua sisi sadel. Eta teh ngadamel langkung stabil pikeun pengendara tapi tiasa nimbulkeun masalah kaamanan kusabab kamungkinan suku pengendara nyangsang di dinya. Upami naek kuda labuh tina kudana tapi sukuna kapepet dina panambangan, aranjeunna tiasa kaseret upami kudana kabur. Pikeun ngaminimalkeun résiko ieu, sajumlah langkah-langkah kaamanan tiasa dilaksanakeun. Kahiji,kalolobaan pengendara nganggo sapatu bot kalawan keuneung sarta sol anu lemes, cekap seseg. Salajengna, sababaraha pelana, khususna pelana Inggris, ngagaduhan palang kaamanan anu ngamungkinkeun kulit aduk murag tina pelana upami ditarik katukang ku pengendara anu murag.
mt: A stirrup is a support for the rider's foot attached to the side of the saddle. It makes riding more stable for the rider but can be dangerous because the rider's foot may become trapped in it. If the rider falls off the horse and the stirrup is caught, the horse may bolt. To minimize this risk, several safety measures can be taken. First, most riders wear boots with a hard sole and heel, which can slip out of the stirrup if the rider falls. Secondly, some saddles, especially English saddles, have safety features that allow the skin to slip out of the stirrup if the rider falls.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Sanggurdi nyaéta panyangga suku pengendara anu ngagantung dina dua sisi sadel. Eta teh ngadamel langkung stabil pikeun pengendara tapi tiasa nimbulkeun masalah kaamanan kusabab kamungkinan suku pengendara nyangsang di dinya. Upami naek kuda labuh tina kudana tapi sukuna kapepet dina panambangan, aranjeunna tiasa kaseret upami kudana kabur. Pikeun ngaminimalkeun résiko ieu, sajumlah langkah-langkah kaamanan tiasa dilaksanakeun. Kahiji,kalolobaan pengendara nganggo sapatu bot kalawan keuneung sarta sol anu lemes, cekap seseg. Salajengna, sababaraha pelana, khususna pelana Inggris, ngagaduhan palang kaamanan anu ngamungkinkeun kulit aduk murag tina pelana upami ditarik katukang ku pengendara anu murag.
mt: A stirrup is a support for the rider's foot attached to the side of the saddle. It makes riding more stable for the rider but can be dangerous because the rider's foot may become trapped in it. If the rider falls off the horse and the stirrup is caught, the horse may bolt. To minimize this risk, several safety measures can be taken. First, most riders wear boots with a hard sole and heel, which can slip out of the stirrup if the rider falls. Secondly, some saddles, especially English saddles, have safety features that allow the skin to slip out of the stirrup if the rider falls.
ref: Stirrups are supports for the rider's feet that hang down on either side of the saddle. They provide greater stability for the rider but can have safety concerns due to the potential for a rider's feet to get stuck in them. If a rider is thrown from a horse but has a foot caught in the stirrup, they could be dragged if the horse runs away. To minimize this risk, a number of safety precautions can be taken. First, most riders wear riding boots with a heel and a smooth, quite narrow, sole. Next, some saddles, particularly English saddles, have safety bars that allow a stirrup leather to fall off the saddle if pulled backwards by a falling rider.

src: Jaringan pertukaran keramahan nyaéta organisasi anu ngahubungkeun palancong sareng warga lokal di kota-kota anu aranjeunna badé datangan. Gabung ka jaringan sapertos kitu biasana ngan ukur kedah ngeusian formulir daring; sanaos sababaraha jaringan nawiskeun atanapi peryogi pamariksaan tambihan. Daptar host anu sadia saterusna disadiakeun dina wangun citak sarta / atawa online, sakapeung-sakapeung kalawan referensi sarta katerangan ku wisatawan sanes. Couchsurfing didirikeun di sasih Januari 2004 saatos programer komputer Casey Fenton mendakan penerbangan anu mirah ka Islandia tapi teu aya tempat kanggo linggih. Anjeunna ngirimkeun surél ka mahasiswa di universitas lokal sareng seueur pisan nampi tawaran akomodasi gratis.
mt: A hospitality exchange network is an organization that connects travelers with local residents in cities they are visiting. Joining such a network usually requires filling out an online form; some networks require or recommend additional background checks. A list of hosts willing to offer accommodation is then made available in print and/or online, sometimes with references and comments from other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton booked a cheap flight to Iceland but had nowhere to stay. He sent an email to local university students and received many offers of free accommodation.
ref: A hospitality exchange network is the organization that connects travelers with locals in the cities they are going to visit. Joining such a network usually just requires filling out an online form; although some networks offer or require additional verification. A listing of available hosts is then provided either in print and/or online, sometimes with references and reviews by other travelers. Couchsurfing was founded in January 2004 after computer programmer Casey Fenton found a cheap flight to Iceland but did not have a place to stay. He emailed students at the local university and received an overwhelming number of offers for free accommodation.

src: Hostels condong utamina ka para pamuda- tamu biasa dina yuswa duapuluhan - tapi oge anjeun sering mendakan wisatawan anu lewih kolot. Kulawarga anu sareng murangkalihna jarang katingal, nanging sababaraha losmén ngijinkeun aranjeunna di kamar nyalira.
mt: Hostels tend to cater mainly to backpackers, the typical guests in their twenties, but they also often accommodate older tourists. Families with young children are rare, but some hostels allow them to stay in dormitories.
ref: Hostels cater primarily to young people – a typical guest is in their twenties – but you can often find older travellers there too. Families with children are a rare sight, but some hostels do allow them in private rooms.

src: Ngalungkeun bumerang mangrupikeun kaahlian anu kasohor anu hoyong digaduh ku seueur turis. Upami anjeun hoyong diajar ngalungkeun bumerang anu balik deui ka panangan anjeun, pastikeun anjeun gaduh bumerang anu tiasa balik deui. Seeurna bumerang anu aya di Australia kanyataanna henteu balik deui. Saena mah lamun pamula tong nyobian ngalungkeun mun keur angin gedé.
mt: Throwing boomerangs is a well-known skill that can be learned by many tourists. If you want to learn to throw a boomerang that returns to you, make sure you have a boomerang that can return. Most boomerangs in Australia do not return. However, if you are a beginner and you throw it in a strong wind.
ref: Boomerang throwing is a popular skill that many tourists want to acquire. If you want to learn throwing a boomerang that comes back to your hand, make sure you have a suitable boomerang for returning. Most boomerangs available in Australia are in fact non-returning. It is best for beginners to not try throwing in windy

src: Kalawan 17.000 pulo anu aya, katuangan Indonesia nyaeta istilah umum anu ngawengku sagala rupa macem masakan wewengkon anu kapanggih di sakumna bangsa. Nanging, lamun dipake tanpa kualifikasi saterasna, istilah ieu condong hartina katuangan anu asalna ti tengah sarta wetan pulo utami Jawa. Ayeuna kalebet sayogi sapanjang Nusantara, asakan Jawa ngaladénan sajeroning masakan sederhana, rasa utama anu sapertos jawa sapertos kacang, cabé cabé, gula (khususna gula jawa) sareng sagala rupa rempah-rempah aromatik.
mt: 17,000 islands, Indonesian cuisine is a general term that includes all kinds of food found in all the nations. However, if used without qualification, this term tends to mean food from the central and eastern main island of Java. Now including the entire Nusantara, Javanese flavor dominates in simple dishes, main flavors such as Java such as peanuts, chilies, sugar (especially Javanese sugar) and all kinds of aromatic spices.
ref: With 17,000 islands to choose from, Indonesian food is an umbrella term covering a vast variety of regional cuisines found across the nation. But, if used without further qualifiers, the term tends to mean the food originally from the central and eastern parts of the main island Java. Now widely available throughout the archipelago, Javanese cuisine features an array of simply seasoned dishes, the predominant flavorings the Javanese favor being peanuts, chillies, sugar (especially Javanese coconut sugar) and various aromatic spices.

src: Pikeun anu henteu akrab sareng jargon medis, kecap nular sareng tepa gaduh hartos anu beda. Panyakit anu nular nyaeta mangrupikeun panyakit anu disababkeun ku pathogen, sapertos virus, bakteri, jamur atanapi parasit sejenna. Panyakit nu népa mangrupikeun panyakit anu gampang ditularkeun kusabab cakeut sareng jalma anu katépaan. Seueur pamaréntahan ngabutuhkeun pandatang anu sumping, atanapi warga anu incah ti nagara-nagara asalna, pikeun divaksinasi kanggo sagala rupa panyakit. Sarat-sarat ieu téh gumantung kana naon anu tos didongkapan ku turis atanapi naon anu bade didongkapan.
mt: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, "communicable" and "contagious" are not synonymous. A communicable disease is one caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or parasite. A contagious disease is one that is easily transmitted because of close contact with an infected person. Many governments require incoming visitors or citizens from certain countries to be vaccinated against a variety of diseases. These requirements vary depending on what diseases are prevalent in those countries.
ref: For those unfamiliar with medical jargon, the words infectious and contagious have distinct meanings. An infectious disease is one that is caused by a pathogen, such as a virus, bacterium, fungus or other parasites. A contagious disease is a disease which is easily transmitted by being in the vicinity of an infected person. Many governments require visitors entering, or residents leaving, their countries to be vaccinated for a range of diseases. These requirements may often depend on what countries a traveller has visited or intends to visit.

src: Panyadia VPN pribadi (jaringan virtual pribadi) mangrupikeun cara anu saé pikeun nyegah sénsor sareng nyaring IP komérsial. Éta téh leuwih alus tibatan proxy web ku sababaraha sabab: maranéhna ngarute ulang patalimarga internét, lain ngan http hungkul. Aranjeunna biasana nawiskeun rubakpita anu langkung sae sareng jasa kualitas anu langkung sae. Eta dienkripsi sahingga langkung hese kanggo di mata-mata.
mt: Private VPNs (virtual private networks) are a good way to avoid surveillance and circumvent commercial IP addresses. They are better than web proxies for several reasons: they route around censored websites, not just http. They usually offer better speeds and better quality service. They are also encrypted so they are safer for spying.
ref: Personal VPN (virtual private network) providers are an excellent way of circumventing both political censorship and commercial IP-geofiltering. They are superior to web proxies for several reasons: They re-route all Internet traffic, not only http. They normally offer higher bandwidth and better quality of service. They are encrypted and thus harder to spy on.

src: Kusabab telepon diarahkeun na ku internét, anjeun teu kedah nganggo perusahaan telepon di tempat anjeun cicing atau angkat-angkatan. Teu aya oge sarat pikeun anjeun kengingkeun nomor lokal ti komunitas anu anjeun linggih; anjeun tiasa kengingkeun koneksi internet satelit di Wilds of Chicken, Alaska sareng milih nomor anu nunjukeun anjeun aya di Arizona anu cerah. Osok oge, anjeun kedah meser nomor global anu misah anu ngamungkinkeun telepon PSTN ngahontal anjeun. Asalna nomor eta nu nyebabkeun perbedaan keur batur nelpon anjeun.
mt: Because the phone is connected to the Internet, you do not have to use a local phone company where you live or roam. You can also dial a satellite Internet connection in the Wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number that shows you are in Arizona, bright and early. Also, you must dial a global number that separates you from the PSTN to reach you.
ref: Because calls are routed over the Internet, you do not need to use a phone company located where you live or where you travel. There is also no requirement that you obtain a local number from the community in which you live; you can obtain a satellite Internet connection in the wilds of Chicken, Alaska and select a number which claims you're in sunny Arizona. Often, you have to buy a global number separately that allows PSTN phones to call you. Where the number is from makes a difference for people calling you.

src: Ngucapkeun basa Italia kawilang gampang sabab lolobana kecap dibaca dumasar kana kumaha tulisanna Hurup utama anu ditimbangkeun nyaéta c sareng g, sabab cara ngucapkeunana gumantung kana hurup vokalna. Oge, pastikeun ngomong r jeung rr beda; caro artina kijang, lamun carro artina kareta.
mt: Italian is easy to pronounce because most words are spelled as they are pronounced. The main consonants that are weighted are c and g, because their pronunciation depends on the vowels. Also, make sure to distinguish r and rr; caro means deer, carro means car.
ref: Pronunciation is relatively easy in Italian since most words are pronounced exactly how they are written The main letters to watch out for are c and g, since their pronunciation varies based on the following vowel. Also, make sure to pronounce r and rr differently: caro means dear, whereas carro means chariot.

src: Izmir mangrupikeun kota katilu panggedéna di Turki anu pendudukna sakitar 3.7 juta, palabuan pangbadagna kadua sanggeus Istanbul, sareng gaduh angkutan umum nu saé. Kota kolot Smyrna, nu ayeuna tos modern, berkembang, sareng janten pusat dagang padet, aya cakeut dina teluk sareng dikurilingan ku gunung-gunung. Jalan anu lalega, gedong anu payunana kaca sareng pusat balanja modéren anu dihias jeung téhel beureum tradisional dina atepna, pasar abad ka-18, sareng masjid-masjid jeung garéja-garéja kuno, sanaos kota gaduh suasana anu langkung mirip Éropa Tengah tibatan tradisional Turki.
mt: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of about 3.7 million, the second largest port after Istanbul, and has a good public transport system. The ancient city of Smyrna, now a modern, growing, and major trading centre, lies in a bay and is surrounded by mountains. Wide streets, glass-fronted shops and modern shopping centres, decorated with traditional Turkish tulips, an 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, give the city a more Central European than traditional Turkish feel.
ref: İzmir is the third largest city in Turkey with a population of around 3.7 million, the second biggest port after Istanbul, and a very good transport hub. Once the ancient city of Smyrna, it is now a modern, developed, and busy commercial center, set around a huge bay and surrounded by mountains. The broad boulevards, glass-fronted buildings and modern shopping centers are dotted with traditional red-tiled roofs, the 18th century market, and old mosques and churches, although the city has an atmosphere more of Mediterranean Europe than traditional Turkey.

src: Ningali Bunga Sakura, dipikanyahona hanami, tos jadi bagian budaya Jepang ti abad ka 8. Konsép éta dongkap ti Tiongkok dimana kembang plum janten kembang pilihan. Di Jepang, pesta sakura kahiji diayakeun ku kaisar jang manehna sorangan jeung anggota aristokrasi disakuriling Pangadilan Kekaisaran.
mt: Hanami, the viewing of cherry blossoms, has been part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept was borrowed from China, where the plum blossom was the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom festival was held by the reigning emperor and members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Palace.
ref: Cherry blossom viewing, known as hanami, has been a part of Japanese culture since the 8th century. The concept came from China where plum blossoms were the flower of choice. In Japan, the first cherry blossom parties were hosted by the emperor only for himself and other members of the aristocracy around the Imperial Court.

src: Yerusalem mangrupiken ibu kota sareng kota panggedéna di Israél, sanaos kaseeuran nagara-nagara anu sanés di PBB henteu ngaku éta ibu kota Israél. Kota kuno di bukit Judean gaduh sajarah anu matak dugi ka rébuan taun. Kota iyeu nyaeta kota suci pikeun katilu agama monoteistik, nyaeta Yahudi, Kristen, jeung Islam. Kota iyeu jadi pusat spiritual, religius jeung budaya. Kusabab kapentingan agama di kota, sareng khususna seueur situs di daerah Kota Lawas, Yerusalem janten salah sahiji tujuan wisata utama di Israél. Yarusalem gaduh seueur situs sajarah, arkéologis, sareng budaya, sareng pusat perbelanjaan anu ramé, sareng rumah makan.
mt: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, although other countries in the UN do not recognize it as the capital of Israel. The ancient city on the Judean Hills has a history dating back thousands of years. The city is holy to three monotheistic religions, Judaism, Christianity, and Islam. The city is the center of spiritual, religious, and cultural life. Because of the religious importance of the city, especially in the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historical, archaeological, and cultural sites, and shopping centers, and restaurants.
ref: Jerusalem is the capital and largest city of Israel, though most other countries and the United Nations do not recognize it as Israel's capital. The ancient city in the Judean Hills has a fascinating history spanning thousands of years. The city is holy to the three monotheistic religions - Judaism, Christianity and Islam, and serves as a spiritual, religious, and cultural center. Due to the religious significance of the city, and in particular the many sites of the Old City area, Jerusalem is one of the main tourist destinations in Israel. Jerusalem has many historic, archeological and cultural sites, along with vibrant and crowded shopping centers, cafés, and restaurants.

src: Taman Nasional Kruger (KNP) ayana di beulah wétan Afrika kidul sareng ngabentang sapanjang wates Mozambik beulah wetan, Zimbabwé ka beulah kalér, sareng wates kidul nyaéta Walungan Buaya. Leuweung ieu teh legana nepi ka 19,500 km² jeung kabagi jadi 14 zona alam, tiap-tiap zona teh pikeun kahirupan liar anu beda. Taman ieu mangrupikeun salah sahiji obyék wisata utama Afrika Kidul sareng dianggap unggulan di Taman Nasional Afrika Kidul (SANPark). Sapertos sadaya Taman Nasional Afrika Kidul sanés, unggal dintenna aya konsérvasi sareng biaya asup ka taman. Meser Wild Card tiasa jadi nguntungkeung 1 jalma. Kartu iyeu tiasa digunakeun ka taman-taman pilihan di Afrika kidul atawa sakabeh Taman Nasional Afrika kidul.
mt: Kruger National Park (KNP) is located in northeastern South Africa and extends 352 km (219 mi) along the border with Mozambique, 492 km (306 mi) along the border with Zimbabwe, and 58 km (36 mi) along the border with Swaziland. The park lies partly in the province of Limpopo, but also stretches into Mpumalanga. The park has nine main gates allowing entrance to the park: Phalaborwa, Punda Maria, Orpen, Letaba, Phalaborwa, Malelane, Numbi, Crocodile Bridge, and Paul Kruger gates. The park is approximately 352 km (219 mi) long, and from 65 km (40 mi) to 90 km (56 mi) wide. The park is 19,485 km² (7,523 sq mi) in extent, slightly larger than the state of New Jersey. The park is home to 147 mammals, 507 birds, 114 reptiles, 33 amphibians, and 49 fish. The park is also home to the Big Five game animals. The park is also home to the largest baobab trees in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of elephants in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of lions in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of leopards in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of cheetahs in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of wild dogs in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of hyenas in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of vultures in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of jackals in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of antelopes in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of antelopes in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of antelopes in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of antelopes in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of antelopes in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of antelopes in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of antelopes in the world. The park is also home to the largest population of antelopes in the world. The
ref: The Kruger National Park (KNP) lies in the north-east of South Africa and runs along the border of Mozambique in the east, Zimbabwe in the north, and the southern border is the Crocodile River. The park covers 19,500 km² and is divided in 14 different ecozones, each supporting different wildlife. It is one of the main attractions of South Africa and it is considered the flagship of South African National Parks (SANParks). As with all South African National Parks, there are daily conservation and entry fees for the park. It may also be beneficial for one to buy a Wild Card, which provides entry to either selections of parks in South Africa or all of the South African National Parks.
