src: Anu ngajulang ka luhur di tungtung kalér Machu Picchu téh nyaéta gunung nu lungkawing ieu, mineng janten latar poto ruruntuhan. katingalina mah asa rada pikasieuneun ti handap mah, jeung naek kadinya mah nangtawing tur hese, ngan lamun jang jalma anu jag-jag mah bisa wae naek kadinya ku waktu 45 menit mah. Pijakan-pijakan batu ditendeun di sapanjang kalolobaan jalan, sarta di haturan anu langkung nangtawing, disadiakeun kabel waja minangka cecekelan. Saurna, bakal beakeun napas, sareng jaga kana bagian anu langkung nangtawing, khususna lamun baseuh, sabab tiasa gancang bahaya. Aya guha alit cakeut ka bagian luhur anu kedah diléwatan, cekap de'et sareng agak heurin.
mt: The upper north end of the Inca Trail is guarded by a mountain ridge, which makes a picturesque backdrop for the ruins. From below, it looks a bit intimidating, and the climb is steep and strenuous, but for the fit, it takes about 45 minutes. The stone steps are laid along the entire length of the trail, and on the steeper parts, there are steel cables to hold onto. Be prepared to pant, and be careful on the steeper parts, especially if it's wet, as it can be slippery. There is a small cave at the top that must be passed through, ducking and stooping.
ref: Towering above the north end of Machu Picchu is this steep mountain, often the backdrop to many photos of the ruins. It looks a bit daunting from below, and it is a steep and difficult ascent, but most reasonably fit persons should be able to make it in about 45 minutes. Stone steps are laid along most of the path, and in the steeper sections steel cables provide a supporting handrail. That said, expect to be out of breath, and take care in the steeper portions, especially when wet, as it can become dangerous quickly. There's a tiny cave near the top that must be passed through, it is quite low and a rather tight squeeze.

src: Tuangeun Majorcan, sami sapertos nu di wilayah Mediterania, dasarna roti, sayuran jeung daging (khususna babi), sareng sadayana nganggo minyak zaitun. Tuangeun anu sederhana sareng kakoncara, khususna nalika usum panas, nyaéta Pa amb Oli: Roti sareng minyak zaitun, tomat sareng bumbu nu aya sapertos kéju, lauk tuna, jsb.
mt: Majorcan cuisine, like that of the Mediterranean in general, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (especially pork), all of which are usually prepared with olive oil. A simple and inexpensive summer dish is Pa amb Oli: bread and olive oil, tomato and herbs such as cheese, tuna, etc.
ref: Majorcan cuisine, like that of similar zones in the Mediterranean, is based on bread, vegetables and meat (specially pork), and uses olive oil throughout. A simple popular dinner, especially during the summer, is the Pa amb Oli: Bread with olive oil, tomato, and any available condiments such as cheese, tunafish, etc.

src: katuangeun Hangi dipasak dinu liang anu panas dinu taneuh Lubang eta dipanaskeun ku batu panas tina seneu, atanapi di sababaraha tempat panas bumi nu ngadamel taneuh janten panas sacara alami. Hangi osok digunakeun kanggo masak tuangeun anu dipanggang nganggo gaya tradisional. Sababaraha tempat di Rotorua nawarkeun hangi panas bumi, upami hangi anu sanés tiasa dicobian di Christchurch, Wellington sareng tempat nu sanés.
mt: Hangi is cooked in a pit oven in the ground, which is heated by hot stones from a volcano, or in some places by naturally occurring hot earth.  Hangi is often used to cook food that is roasted in a traditional manner.  Some places in Rotorua offer hot spring hangi, but other hangi can be tried in Christchurch, Wellington and other places.
ref: A Hangi Meal is cooked in a hot pit in the ground. The pit is either heated with hot stones from a fire, or in some places geothermal heat makes areas of ground naturally hot. The hangi is often used to cook a traditional roast style dinner. Several places in Rotorua offer geothermal hangi, while other hangi can be sampled in Christchurch, Wellington and elsewhere.

src: Waktos ngadatangan biara na, awewe kudu ngangge rok nu nutupan nepi ka tuur jeung kudu nutupan taktakna, oge. Seuseueurna biara émang nyayogikeun acuk kanggo wanoja anu dongkap tanpa persiapan, tapi upami anjeun nyandak nyalira, hususna anu warnana cerah, biarawan atanapi biarawati di lawang panto bakal mesem ka anjeun. Dina barisan nu sarua, lalaki kudu nganggé' calana panjang nu nutupan tuur. Ieu ogé tiasa ditambut ti barang anu dipajang di payun tapi da éta pakean teu dikumbah sementara atos seeur nu nyobian. 1 nomor pas keur kabéh lalaki!
mt: 1. When entering the convent, women must wear a skirt that covers to the knee and must cover their shoulders. The nuns and nuns at the door will be shocked if you wear bright colors. In the same line, men must wear long pants that cover the knee. This can also be seen from the items displayed on the shelf but that clothing is not washed while the other is trying. 1 point for all men!
ref: While visiting the monasteries, women are required to wear skirts covering the knees and have their shoulders covered, too. Most of the monasteries do provide wraps for women who come unprepared, but if you bring your own, especially one with bright colors, you'll get a smile from the monk or nun at the entrance. Along the same line, men are required to wear trousers covering the knees. This too can be borrowed from the stock at the entrance but that clothing isn't washed after every user so you may not feel comfortable wearing these skirts. One size fits all for men!

src: Lamun anjeun sumping ka daérah Arktik atanapi Antartika waktu usum tiris anjeun bakal ngalaman peuting kutub, nu hartina panonpoé henteu medal ka luhur cakrawala. Ieu teh nawarkeun kasempetan anu sae kanggo ningali Aurora borealis, margi langit bade langkung poek atawa kirang kira-kira ti tabuh sakitu. Kusabab wilayah kasebut jarang dieusian, sareng ku sabab polusi cahaya sanés janten masalah, anjeun ogé bakal tiasa nganikmatan béntang.
mt: If you are traveling to the Arctic or Antarctic during the summer, you will experience polar night, meaning the sun will not rise above the horizon at all. This is a great opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be darker or lighter around midnight. Because these areas are not often illuminated, and because light pollution is not a problem, you will also be able to see the stars.
ref: If you visit the Arctic or Antarctic areas in the winter you will experience the polar night, which means that the sun doesn't rise above the horizon. This offers a good opportunity to see the Aurora borealis, as the sky will be dark more or less around the clock. As the areas are sparsely populated, and light pollution therefore often not a problem, you will also be able to enjoy the stars.

src: Di daérah terpencil, nu euweuh sinyal hp, telepon satelit tiasa jadi pilihan. Telepon satelit umumna lain gagantina keur telepon selular, dimana anjeun kudu aya di luar ruangan anu teu aya halangan kana satelitna keur nelepon. Layanan ieu sering dipake ku pangiriman, kaasup kapal pesiar, sarta ekspedisi anu ngabogaan data jara tebih sarta kaperluan soanten. Panyadia jasa telepon lokal anjeun kuduna bisa masihan inpormasi nu leuwih terang ngeunaan nyambungkeun kana layanan ieu.
mt: In remote areas, where there is no cell phone signal, a satellite phone may be an option. Satellite phones are not a substitute for cell phones, where you must be outside and not have any obstructions to the satellite for a call. This service is often used by shipping, including cruise ships, and expeditions that have data far away and some need. Local service providers can provide more information about connecting to this service.
ref: In remote locations, without cell phone coverage, a satellite phone may be your only option. A satellite phone is not generally a replacement for a mobile phone, as you have to be outdoors with clear line of sight to the satellite to make a phone call. The service is frequently used by shipping, including pleasure craft, as well as expeditions who have remote data and voice needs. Your local telephone service provider should be able to give more information about connecting to this service.

src: Ibukota Moldova nyaéta Chişinău. Basa lokal na mah nyaeta Romania, ngan basa Rusia leuwih seeur nu nganggo. Moldova nyaéta républik multi-étnis anu sangsara kusabab masalah konplik étnis. Di taun 1994, konplik ieu ngakibatkeun dijieunna Républik Transnistria anu diproklamirkeun sorangan di Moldova wétan, gaduh pamaréntahan jeung mata uang sorangan tapi heunteu diaku ku hiji waé nagara anggota PBB. Hubungan ékonomi geus diwangun deui di antara dua bagéan Moldova najan gagalna rundingan pulitik. Agama anu utama di Moldova nyaéta Kristen Ortodok.
mt: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is more widely spoken. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic complications. In 1994, this complication led to the creation of the Transnistria Republic, which declared itself independent from Moldova in the west, had its own government and currency, but was not recognized by any other UN member state. Economic relations have been re-established between the two parts of Moldova, but political negotiations have failed. The main religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christianity.
ref: The capital of Moldova is Chişinău. The local language is Romanian, but Russian is widely used. Moldova is a multi-ethnic republic that has suffered from ethnic conflict. In 1994, this conflict led to the creation of the self-proclaimed Transnistria Republic in eastern Moldova, which has its own government and currency but is not recognised by any UN member country. Economic links have been re-established between these two parts of Moldova despite the failure in political negotiations. The major religion in Moldova is Orthodox Christian.

src: "Kusabab Montevideo kiduleun ékuator, usum panas dina usum salju di Hemisphere kalér jeung sabalikna Montevideo nyaeta di wilayah subtropis; di usum panas, suhu +30°C teh kajadian anu biasa. Usum salju tiasa leuwih tiris : suhu jarang turun dugi ka beku, tapi angin sareng asor ngagabung jantén langkung parah tibatan naon anu disarioskeun térmométer. Teu aya nu disebut usum ""hujan"" atawa ""halodo"" téh: nu aya ngan hujan tuluy sapanjang taun."
mt: "Because Montevideo is south of the equator, the summer is the winter in the northern hemisphere and vice versa; in the summer, temperatures of +30°C are common. The winter can be very cold: temperatures rarely drop below freezing, but the wind and humidity make it feel much colder than what the thermometer reads. There is no such thing as a "rainy season" or "monsoon": it just rains all year round."
ref: "Since Montevideo is south of the Equator, it is summer there when it's winter in the Northern Hemisphere and vice versa. Montevideo is in the subtropics; in the summer months, temperatures above +30°C are common. The winter can be deceptively chilly: temperatures rarely go below freezing, but the wind and humidity combine to make it feel colder than what the thermometer says. There are no particular ""rainy"" and ""dry"" seasons: the amount of rain stays roughly the same throughout the year."

src: "Mural atanapi cocorétan anu teu dipikahayang téh disebutna grafiti. Sanajan jauh ti fenomena moderen, loba jelema nyangkut paut keun iyeu jeung parilaku remaja anu sok ngarusak tempat-tempat umum sareng pribadi nganggo cat semprot. Tapi, jaman kiwari mah aya seniman graffiti ogé anu mapan, acara graffiti jeung tembok anu ""légal"". Lukisan-lukisan graffiti dina nu kieu téh leuwih ka karya seni sanes tulisan-tulisan nu teu kabaca."
mt: "Mural or graffiti is called graffiti. Although far from a modern phenomenon, many people associate it with the behavior of teenagers who often vandalize public and private places with spray paint. But, nowadays there are also graffiti artists who are established, graffiti events and "legal" walls. Graffiti paintings in this way are more like works of art than illegible writing."
ref: "Unwanted murals or scribble is known as graffiti. While it's far from a modern phenomenon, most people probably associate it with youth vandalizing public and private property using spray paint. However, nowadays there are established graffiti artists, graffiti events and ""legal"" walls. Graffiti paintings in this context often resemble artworks rather than illegible tags."

src: Pikeun sababaraha festival, sabagian gede anu hadir di festival musik mutuskeun pikeun kemping di area eta, jeung kalobaan semah nganggap iyeu nyaeta bagian penting ti pangalaman. Upami anjeun hoyong leuwih caket ka acara na, anjeun kudu dongkap leuwih isuk méh meunang tempat kemping anu caket jeung musik. Émutkeun yén sanajan musik di panggung utama tos beresan, tiasa waé aya sababaraha hiji bagian anu nyetél musik nepi ka wengi pisan. Babaraha festival ngabogaan area kemping khusus kanggo kaluarga anu gaduh murang kalih.
mt: For many festivals, a large portion of those attending the music festival camp out in the area, and most consider this to be an important part of the experience. If you want to be closer to the action, you'll need to get up earlier and snag a camping spot closer to the music. Even though the main stage music may die down, there may still be a few one-off performances that go on until the wee hours. Some festivals have a family camping area for those with young children.
ref: For some festivals, the vast majority of the attendants to music festivals decide to camp on site, and most attendants consider it a vital part of the experience. If you want to be close to the action you're going to have to get in early to get a camping site close to the music. Remember that even though music on the main stages may have finished, there may be sections of the festival that will keep playing music until late into the night. Some festivals have special camping areas for families with young children.

src: Ngemutan loba lokasi pueblo anu tebih timamana, anjeun moal mendakan raramean pas wengi lamun anjeun henteu angkat ka Albuquerque atanapi Santa Fe. Ngan, hampir kabéh kasino diluhur nyadiakeun inuman, jeung babaraha diantarana nyadiakeun hiburan nu kasohor namina (utamana nu gedé-gedé anu tepat di sakitaran Albuquerque jeung Santa Fe). Ati-ati: didieu bar kota leutik henteu tiasa jadi tempat anu saé pikeun ngumpul para tamu tina luar nagari. Pikeun hiji hal, palebah Kaler New Meksiko gaduh masalah serius dina mabok bari nyetir, sareng konsentrasi supir anu mabok ageung  caket bar-bar di kota leutik.
mt: Many of the remote pueblos are not accessible by road at night unless you are staying in Albuquerque or Santa Fe. Almost all casinos offer alcohol, and some offer famous entertainment (especially the large ones near Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small town bars cannot be a good place for out-of-towners to gather. For one thing, New Mexico has a serious problem with drunk driving, and the concentration of drunk drivers in small town bars is high.
ref: Given how remote many of the pueblos are, you won't be able to find a significant amount of nightlife without traveling to Albuquerque or Santa Fe. However, nearly all of the casinos listed above serve drinks, and several of them bring in name-brand entertainment (primarily the large ones immediately surrounding Albuquerque and Santa Fe). Beware: small-town bars here are not always good places for the out-of-state visitor to hang out. For one thing, northern New Mexico has significant problems with drunk driving, and the concentration of intoxicated drivers is high close to small-town bars.

src: "Bir lokal nu utama nyaeta 'Number 1', bir na henteu kompleks, tapi pikaresepeun sareng nyegerkeun. Bir lokal nu lain disebat ""Manta"". Aya seueur anggur Perancis anu tiasa dibawa, tapi anggur Selandia Baru sareng Australia langkung saé mun hoyong dibabawa. Cai keran anu tiasa dileueut langsung emang aman kanggo dileueut, nanging cai botolan gampil dipilarian lamun anjeun sieun. Pikeun warga Australia, kopi 'bodas lekoh' téh asing. Nu hideung alit nyaéta 'éspréso', kapucino anu nganggo krim (sanés budah), sareng entéh disuguhkeun teu nganggo susu. Cokelat panasna nyaéta standar Belgia. Jus buahna awis tapi ngeunah."
mt: "The local beer is 'Number 1', not complex, but refreshing and invigorating. Local beer is called 'Manta'. There are many French wines that can be brought, but New Zealand and Australian wines are better if brought. Tap water is safe to drink, but bottled water is easier to carry if you are thirsty. For Australians, 'black coffee' is strange. Small change is 'espresso', cappuccino with cream (not milk), and tea is served without milk. Hot chocolate is the Belgian standard. Fruit juices are sour but rich."
ref: "The main local beer is 'Number One', it is not a complex beer, but pleasant and refreshing. The other local beer is called ""Manta"". There are many French wines to be had, but the New Zealand and Australian wines might travel better. The local tap water is perfectly safe to drink, but bottled water is easy to find if you are fearful. For Australians, the idea of 'flat white' coffee is foreign. A short black is 'espresso', cappuccino comes heaped high with cream (not froth), and tea is served without milk. The hot chocolate is up to Belgian standards. Fruit juices are pricey but excellent."

src: "Urang Guaran mangrupikeun kalompok pribumi anu paling penting anu nyicingan Paraguay Wétan, hirup salaku pamburu semi-nomadis anu ogé latihan tani. Daerah Chaco nyaéta kampung halaman pikeun kelompok suku asli sapertos Guaycurú jeung Payaguá, anu bertahan hirup ku cara moro, babarengan, jeung ngala lauk. Di abad ka-16 Paraguay, saméméhna dikenal ""Propinsi Hindia Ageung"", lahir salaku hasil tina panjajah Spanyol anu pendak sareng wargi pribumi. Urang Spanyol ngamimitian jaman ngajajah anu lumangsung salila tilu abad. Pas Asunción diadegkeun di taun 1537, Paraguay suksés mertahankeun seueur karakter sareng idéntitas aslina."
mt: "The Guarani are the largest indigenous group in Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunter-gatherers and farmers. The Chaco region is the homeland of the original indigenous groups such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá. In the 16th century, before it was known as "the Province of the Indies", Paraguay was born as a result of Spanish colonization and indigenous peoples. The Spanish began a three-century period of colonization. When Asunción was founded in 1537, Paraguay successfully maintained much of its original character and identity."
ref: "The Guaraní were the most significant indigenous group inhabiting what is now Eastern Paraguay, living as semi-nomadic hunters who also practised subsistence agriculture. The Chaco region was home to other groups of indigenous tribes such as the Guaycurú and Payaguá, who survived by hunting, gathering and fishing. In the 16th century Paraguay, formerly called ""The Giant Province of the Indies"", was born as a result of the encounter of Spanish conquerors with the native indigenous groups. The Spaniards started the colonization period which lasted for three centuries. Since the foundation of Asunción in 1537, Paraguay has managed to keep a lot of its indigenous character and identity."

src: "Jalma ti Paris kakoncara pikeun égosentris, kasar, jeung sombong. Sanajan ieu ngan saukur stéréotip anu henteu akurat, cara paling saé pikeun bergaul di Paris téh nyaéta ku bersikap pangsaéna ka batur, bersikap siga jalmi anu ""bien élevé"" (digedekeun ku tatakrama). Ieu bakal nyieun ngumbara janten langkung gampil. Spontanitas ala urang Paris arek beak tereh pisan lamun maneh nunjukkeun sopan-santun dasar."
mt: "People from Paris are egocentric, rude, and arrogant. Although this is only a stereotype that is not accurate, the best way to get along in Paris is to be polite to others, behave like a person who is ""well brought up"" (educated in manners). This will make you more approachable. Parisian spontaneity is only too obvious if you show basic courtesy."
ref: "Parisians have a reputation for being egocentric, rude and arrogant. While this is often only an inaccurate stereotype, the best way to get along in Paris still is to be on your best behavior, acting like someone who is ""bien élevé"" (well brought up). It will make getting about considerably easier. Parisians' abrupt exteriors will rapidly evaporate if you display some basic courtesies."

src: MetroRail aya dua jenis na dina kareta komuter di Cape Town atawa sakitaranna: MetroPlus (anu disebut kelas hiji) Sareng Metro (disebut Kelas Tilu). MetroPlus langkung raoseun sareng langkung sepi tapi rada leuwih mahal, sanaos masih langkung mirah tibatan tiket normal metro di Eropa. Unggal kareta gaduh MetroPlus sareng gerbong-gerbong Metro ; gerbong-gerbong MetroPlus sok aya di tungtung kareta paling caket ti Cape town.
mt: There are two types of Metro Rail in Cape Town or its vicinity: MetroPlus (known as Class One) and Metro (known as Class Three). MetroPlus is more spacious and less crowded but more expensive, still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Each MetroPlus car and Metro carriages are at the end of the train closest to Cape Town.
ref: MetroRail has two classes on commuter trains in and around Cape Town: MetroPlus (also called First Class) and Metro (called Third Class). MetroPlus is more comfortable and less crowded but slightly more expensive, though still cheaper than normal metro tickets in Europe. Every train has both MetroPlus and Metro coaches; the MetroPlus coaches are always on the end of the train nearest Cape Town.

src: Wisatawan tiasa mendakan hama sato anu teu dikenal ku aranjeunna di daérah asal na. Hama tiasa ngarusak dahareun, nyieun iritasi, atawa leuwih parah deui tiasa nyieun alérgi, nyebarkeun racun, atawa nularkeun panyakit. Panyakit nu tepa, atawa sato nu bahaya nu tiasa nyilakakeun atawa ngabunuh manusia nganggo kakuatanna, henteu di asupkeun kana kategori hama.
mt: Visitors may encounter unfamiliar animals in their native habitat. Animals may damage property, cause irritation, or worse yet, cause allergies, spread disease, or become infected. Animals that are dangerous or that can kill or injure humans with their strength are not included in the category of pests.
ref: Travellers may encounter animal pests that they are not familiar with in their home regions. Pests can spoil food, cause irritation, or in a worse case cause allergic reactions, spread venom, or transmit infections. Infectious diseases themselves, or dangerous animals that can injure or kill people by force, do not usually qualify as pests.

src: Unggal juru dina toko dieusi ku susunan kartu telepon prabayar anu ngabingungkeun nu tiasa ogé dianggo dina telepon umum atanapi telepon anu biasa. Sanajan seseueurna kartu cocok keur nelepon kamana waé, sababaraha gaduh spesialisasi anu masihan tarif nu nguntungkeun keur nelepon ka sababaraha hiji nagara. Akses ka layanan iyeu biasana ngalewatan nomor telepon bebas biaya anu tiasa dilakukeun ti hampir kabeh telepon sacara gratis.
mt: Each store is stocked with a series of prepaid phone cards that can also be used on regular phones. Although the cards are good for calling anywhere, some have specializations that offer discounts for calling certain countries. Access to these services is usually through a toll-free number that can be dialed from almost any phone for free.
ref: Every corner store is filled with a confusing array of pre-paid phone cards that can be used from pay phones or ordinary telephones. While most cards are good for calling anywhere, some specialise in providing favourable call rates to specific groups of countries. Access to these services is often through a toll-free telephone number that can be called from most phones without charge.

src: Taman nasional Situ Plitvice téh leuweung pisan, utamina ku tangkal beech, cemara, sareng fir, teras campuran tutuwuhan Alpine sareng Mediterranean. Iyeu terkenal ku rupa-rupa jenis kumpulan tutuwuhan nu loba pisan, kusabab wengkuan iklim mikrona, tanah nu beda jeung tingkat jangkungna nu rupa-rupa. Daérah éta ogé tempat pikeun rupa-rupa pisan spésiés sato sareng manuk. Fauna langka sapertos biruang coklat Éropa, ajag, garuda, bueuk, lynx, ucing liar sareng capercaillie tiasa dipendakan di dinya, sareng seueur deui spésiés anu biasa.
mt: The Plitvice Lakes National Park is a forested area, mainly of beech, fir, and pine, interspersed with Alpine and Mediterranean plant life. It is known for its many types of plant life, due to its microclimate, varied soil, and altitudes. The area is also home to many species of animals, including the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, deer, lynx, wildcat, and capercaillie, as well as many common species.
ref: The Plitvice Lakes national park is heavily forested, mainly with beech, spruce, and fir trees, and features a mixture of Alpine and Mediterranean vegetation. It has a notably wide variety of plant communities, due to its range of microclimates, differing soils and varying levels of altitude. The area is also home to an extremely wide variety of animal and bird species. Rare fauna such as the European brown bear, wolf, eagle, owl, lynx, wild cat and capercaillie can be found there, along with many more common species

src: Parusahaan media sering pisan ngawadul tentang maksud ieu, aranjeunna ngaku ieu kanggo nyegah pabajoan. Faktana, kode wilayah sama sakali heunteu ngefek kana penyalinan ilegal; salinan bit per bit di jero disk bakal tiasa diputer jeung alus dina perangkat asli mana wae. Tujuan sabenerna nyate pikeun masihan perusahaan-perusahaan eta leuwih loba kontrol ka pasar anjeunna; eta sadayana tentang perputaran artos.
mt: Media companies often cite this as a reason to prevent copying, but they admit this does not affect illegal duplication; a bit-for-bit copy on a disk can be played and copied perfectly on any device. The real goal is to give these companies more control over their markets; this is all about control of content.
ref: "The media companies routinely lie about the purpose of this, claiming that it is to ""prevent piracy"". In fact, region codes have absolutely no effect on illegal copying; a bit-for-bit copy of a disk will play just fine on any device where the original will. The actual purpose is to give those companies more control over their markets; it's all about money spinning."

src: Nalika pangecékan imigrasi biasana teu aya atanapi ngan formalitas pas anjeun sumping di nagara anjeun, kontrol béa cukai tiasa janten ngarepotkeun. Pastikeun anjeun apal naon nu tiasa dicandak naon anu henteu sareng kudu dibatas menurut peraturanna.
mt: Immigration checks are usually not present or are just formalities when you arrive in your country, customs fees can be time consuming. Make sure you know what can be brought in and what is prohibited by their regulations.
ref: While immigration check is usually absent or a formality when you arrive in your homeland, customs control can be a hassle. Make sure you know what you can and cannot bring in and declare anything over the legal limits.

src: Cochamó Valley - destinasi kahiji naek jungkrang di Chile, diwauh salaku Yosemithe ti Amerika Selatan, jeung rupa-rupa dinding granit gede jeung karang. Penclut kaasup tetempoan anu menakjubkeun ti penclut. Pendaki ti sakumna penjuru dunya teras ngawangun rute anyar di antawis potensi tembok na anu tak aya seep na.
mt: The Cochamó Valley - the first destination in Chile to be accessed by boat, is likened to Yosemite of South America, and features large granite walls and cliffs. The scenery includes stunning views of the lake. Climbers from all over the world have now established new routes between the potential walls and the lack of a seep.
ref: Cochamó Valley - Chile's premier climbing destination, known as the Yosemite of South America, with a variety of granite big walls and crags. Summits include breath-taking views from peaks. Climbers from all parts of the world are continually establishing new routes amongst its endless potential of walls.

src: Upami anjeun hoyong ngapung ngalilingi dunya di Hemisphere Kidul, pilihan penerbangan sareng tujuan na saalit kusabab kurang na rute transoceanic. teu aya aliansi maskapai anu sanggup nyayogikeun layanan ka 3 benua sakabehna di bumi bagean kidul (jeung SkyTeam teu nyayogikeun pisan dina jalur ieu) Nanging, Star Alliance nyakup kabéh rute kajabi bagian wétan Pasifik Kidul ti Santiago de Chile ka Tahiti, anu mangrupakeun penerbangan LATAM Oneworld. Penerbangan ieu sanés hiji-hijina pilihan upami anjeun badé nyebrangan South Pacific sareng basisir kulon South America. (tingali di handap)
mt: If you want to fly around the world in the Southern Hemisphere, your flight and destination options are limited because of the lack of transoceanic routes. There is no airline alliance that can provide service to all three continents in the southern hemisphere (and SkyTeam does not serve this route at all) But, Star Alliance covers all routes in the southern Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This is not the only option if you want to cross the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)
ref: If you want to fly around the world completely in the Southern Hemisphere, the choice of flights and destinations is limited due to the lack of transoceanic routes. No airline alliance covers all three ocean crossings in the Southern Hemisphere (and SkyTeam covers none of the crossings). However, Star Alliance covers everything except the eastern South Pacific from Santiago de Chile to Tahiti, which is a LATAM Oneworld flight. This flight is not the only option if you want to skip the South Pacific and the west coast of South America. (see below)

src: Dina internasional, kasebat aya nepi ka 200 usaha pikeun ngumbara. Lobana téh usaha mandiri. Salaku penerus Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours gaduh puluhan panyadia wisata sightrunning di opat buana. Dimimitian ku Running Tours Barcelona di Barcelona jeung Copenhagen Running di Kopenhagen,  Running Tours Prague di Praha geuwat nyusul jeung nu séjénna.
mt: Internationally, there are over 200 companies offering running tours. Most are independent. As a successor to Global Running Tours, Go Running Tours has dozens of sightseeing running tours in four continents. Starting with Running Tours Barcelona in Barcelona and Copenhagen Running in Copenhagen, Running Tours Prague in Prague followed and others.
ref: Internationally, there are nearly 200 running tour organizations. Most of them operate independently. The Global Running Tours successor, Go Running Tours networks dozens of sightrunning providers on four continents. With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

With roots in Barcelona's Running Tours Barcelona and Copenhagen's Running Copenhagen, it was quickly joined by Running Tours Prague based in Prague and others.

src: "Safari téh mungkin atraksi wisata panggedéna di Afrika jeung mangrupa tujuan utama pikeun para wisatawan. Istilah safari sacara umum di paké pikeun ngarujuk kana jalan-jalan ninggali satwa éndah Afrika, khusuna Savanna. Sababaraha sasatoan, sapertos gajah sareng jerapah, biasana sok ngadeukeutan mobil sareng peralatan anu biasa bakal masihan pamandangan anu saé. Maung, cheetah, sareng macan tutul kadang-kadang osok éraan, sareng anjeun bakal tiasa ningali langkung jelas lamun nganggo teropong. Safari laleumpang (oge katelah ""leumpang dina jukut"", ""safari nanjak"", atanapi ""leumpang"") nyaeta nanjak salila babaraha jam atanapi babaraha dinten."
mt: "Safari is probably the largest tourist attraction in Africa and is the main destination for tourists. The term safari is generally used to refer to a trip to see the beautiful African wildlife, especially the savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, often approach vehicles and equipment will provide a good view. Lions, cheetahs, and leopards sometimes appear, and you will be able to see more clearly with binoculars. Safari climbing (also called ""climbing in a jeep"", ""safari climbing"", or ""climbing"") is climbing for several hours or several days."
ref: "Safaris are perhaps the greatest tourism draw in Africa and the highlight for many visitors. The term safari in popular use refers to overland travel to view the stunning African wildlife, particularly on savanna. Some animals, such as elephants and giraffes, tend to approach closely to cars and standard equipment will allow good viewing. Lions, cheetahs and leopards are sometimes shy and you will see them better with binoculars. A walking safari (also called a ""bush walk"", ""hiking safari"", or going ""footing"") consists of hiking, either for a few hours or several days."

src: Wisata langkung mirah pikeun kelompok ageung, janten upami anjeun nyalira atanapi ngan ukur gaduh 1 réréncangan, cobian pendak sareng jalma sanésna sareng bentukeun kelompok 4 dugi ka 6 jalmi pikeun harga langkung per jalma. ieu teh kedahna teu janten emutan anjeun teuing kumargi tamu-tamu teh biasana osok diarahkeun kanggo minuhan mobil. Sigana ieu cara licik jalma pikeun yakin yén aranjeunnna kedah mayar leuwih.
mt: Older groups are more likely to be targeted, so if you are only going to have one drink, try to go with a friend and form a group of four to six people for a higher per person price. This is not a good idea because tourists are usually directed to use taxis. This is a sneaky way for people to make sure they get paid more.
ref: Tours are cheaper for larger groups, so if you're by yourself or with just one friend, try to meet other people and form a group of four to six for a better per-person rate. However, this shouldn't really be off your concern, because often tourists are shuffled around to fill the cars. It seems actually to be more a way of tricking people into believing they have to pay more.

src: Salila éta ékonomi San Fransisco nyambung sareng éta janten objek wisata kelas dunya, ékonomi na jadi rupa-rupa. Séktor padamelan nu pang ageungna nyaéta layanan profésional, keuangan, pamaréntah, perdagangan, sareng wisata. Panggambaran nu mineng dina musik, pilem, sastra sareng budaya populér kantos ngabantos kota ieu sareng wangun khas na janten kasohor di sakuliah dunya. San Fransisco geus ngembangkeun wangunan wisata gedé jeung loba hotel, restoran, sareng pasilitas gedung nu pangsaéna. San Fransisco ogé salah sahiji tempat anu pangsaéna di nagara ieu pikeun tuangeun Asia anu sanésna: Koréa, Thailand, India sareng Jepang.
mt: San Francisco's economy has been sustained by the growth of industry and the emergence of new jobs in the arts, tourism, and professional services. The city's population has been increasing steadily since the late 1990s. The unemployment rate in San Francisco has historically been lower than in the surrounding areas. The city's median household income was $63,781 in 2005, and the median family income was $88,133 in 2005. The largest employment sectors are professional services, government, finance, trade, and tourism. Its frequent portrayal in music, films, literature and popular culture has helped make the city and its landmarks known throughout the world. San Francisco has developed a large tourist infrastructure with numerous hotels, restaurants, and top-notch convention facilities. San Francisco is also one of the best places in the nation for other Asian cuisine: Korean, Thai, Indian, and Japanese.

src: mesen tiheula bisa mere rasa genah kanu keur nyaba yen maneh na bakal boga tempat keur sare nalika manehna nepi ditujuan. Agen perjalanan sok nyieun kasatujuan jeung hotel-hotel tangtu, sanajan maneh masih tiasa mesen akomodasi lain, sapertos tempat kemping, ngalewatan agen perjalanan. Agén perjalanan biasana nawiskeun pakét anu ngagaduhan sarapan, transportasi ka/ti bandara, atanapi gabungan paket pesawat sareng hotél. Aranjeunna ogé tiasa nahan pesenan kanggo anjeun upami anjeun peryogi waktos mikir ngeunaan tawaran atanapi mésér dokumén pikeun tujuan anjeun (contona Visa). sagala rupa pamenta kedah ngalangkungan agen travel heula jeung ulah langsung ka pihak hotel.
mt: Travel agents can help you feel confident that you will have a place to stay when you arrive and when you leave your destination. Travel agents often make arrangements with specific hotels, although you can still book other accommodations, such as camping, through a travel agent. Agents often offer packages that include breakfast, transportation to/from the airport, or a combination of plane and hotel. They can also hold reservations for you if you are unsure about offers or booking documents for your destination (for example, Visa). All travel agents should be contacted before you go and not directly to the hotel.
ref: Booking in advance gives the traveller peace of mind that they will have somewhere to sleep once they arrive at their destination. Travel agents often have deals with specific hotels, although you may find it possible to book other forms of accommodation, like camping grounds, through a travel agent. Travel agents usually offer packages that include breakfast, transportation arrangements to/from the airport or even combined flight and hotel packages. They can also hold the reservation for you if you need time to think about the offer or procure other documents for your destination (e.g. visa). Any amendments or requests though should be coursed through the travel agent first and not directly with the hotel.

src: Aplikasi narjamahkeun téks langsung nyaéta aplikasi anu tiasa narjamahkeun sadaya ségmén téks ti 1 basa ka basa lainna. Sababaraha aplikasi dina katégori ieu tiasa nerjemahkeun tulisan di basa asing nu aya dina tanda atawa benda séjén di dunya nyata nalika nu nganggo ngarahkeun hp na ka benda éta. Mesin panarjamah parantos ningkat sacara dramatis, teras ayeuna sering nyayogikeun tarjamahan anu kirang langkung leres (jeung jarang anu teu jelas), tapi kedah ati-ati, sabab mungkin masih kénéh salah. 1 aplikasi anu kakoncara nya éta Google Translate. Urang tiasa nerjemahkeun tanpa internet upami urang donlot heula data bahasana.
mt: A text translation application is an application that can translate all text segments from one language to another language. Some applications in this category can translate written text in foreign languages on objects or things in the real world when the user points the phone at the object. Translation machines have dramatically improved, now often giving fairly accurate (and rarely unclear) translations, but beware, it may still be wrong. One application that works offline is Google Translate. We can translate without internet if we download the language data beforehand.
ref: Real-time text translator apps – applications that are capable of automatically translating whole segments of text from one language into another. Some of the applications in this category can even translate texts in foreign languages on signs or other objects in the real world when the user points the smartphone towards those objects. The translation engines have improved dramatically, and now often give more or less correct translations (and more seldom gibberish), but some care is due, as they still may have gotten it all wrong. One of the most prominent apps in this category is Google Translate, which allows offline translation after downloading the desired language data.

src: Longsoran salju téh sanés hal nu teu normal; gawir nu nangtawing ngan tiasa nahan méh ngalaunan hungkul, teras nu leuwih seueurna bakal turun janten longsor ogé. Masalahna nyaéta salju téh napel, janten kedah butuh sababaraha kali dipicu supados tiasa turun. Lamun sabagéan tos turun, éta tiasa micu sisana. Sakapeung kajadian anu mimiti janten pemicu nyaéta panonpoe anu ngahanasan salju, sakapeung salju langkung ragrag, kadang kajadian alam anu sanés, seringna manusa.
mt: Avalanche is not a normal event; a slope that can hold a few people may be able to hold a few more, but a steeper slope will also avalanche. The problem is that snow piles up, so it needs to be triggered several times before it will avalanche. If some of it does avalanche, it may trigger the rest. Sometimes the initial event that triggers an avalanche is a person who steps off a slope, sometimes the snow is too heavy, sometimes an event of nature, often humans.
ref: Avalanches are not an abnormality; steep slopes can hold only so much slow, and the excess volumes will come down as avalanches. The problem is that snow is sticky, so it needs some triggering to come down, and some snow coming down can be the triggering event for the rest. Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

Sometimes the original trigging event is the sun warming the snow, sometimes some more snowfall, sometimes other natural events, often a human.

src: Kari nyaéta patuangan anu didamel tina rempah-rempah, disayogikeun sareng daging atanapi sayuran. Kari tiasa disayogikeun 'garing' atanapi 'baseuh' gumantung kana jumlah kuahna. Di daérah pedalaman India Kalér sareng Pakistan, yogurt biasa dianggo dina kari; di India Kidul sareng sababaraha daerah basisir sanés di buana, cipati nu biasana dianggo téh.
mt: Curry is a dish made from spices, mixed with meat or vegetables. Curry can be made 'dry' or 'wet' depending on the amount of sauce. In the northern Indian and Pakistani hinterland, yogurt is often used in curry; in southern India and some other non-coastal regions, coconut is usually used.
ref: "A curry is a dish based on herbs and spices, together with either meat or vegetables. A curry can be either ""dry"" or ""wet"" depending on the amount of liquid. In inland regions of Northern India and Pakistan, yogurt is commonly used in curries; in Southern India and some other coastal regions of the subcontinent, coconut milk is commonly used."

src: Jalan ka kutub kidul (atanapi jalan tol) teh nyaeta mangrupikeun 1600 km jalan satapak ti stasion McMurdo di Laut Ross dugi ka kutub. Éta téh salju anu dipadatkeun teras diisi celah-celah na terus ditandaan ku bendera. Ieu ngan tiasa diléwatan ku traktor husus, kereta luncur sareng bahan bakar jeung pason. Lintasan kutub kidul ieu henteu pati gancang, ku sabab traktor na kudu liwat ka péngkolan panjang sabudeureun Pagunungan Transantartika upami hoyong nepi ka dataran luhur.
mt: 1600 km long road to the south pole (or highway) is a compacted snow track from McMurdo Station in Ross Sea to the pole. It is marked with flags. It can only be traversed by special tractors, sleds and fuel. The South Pole road is not very fast, because the tractors have to go through a long detour around the Transantarctic Mountains to reach the high plateau.
ref: The South Pole Traverse (or Highway) is a 1600 km trail from McMurdo Station on the Ross Sea to the Pole. It's compacted snow with crevasses filled in and marked by flags. It can only be traveled by specialized tractors, hauling sleds with fuel and supplies. These aren't very nimble so the trail has to take a long swerve around the Transantarctic Mountains to come onto the plateau.

src: Lebet ka Afrika Kidul nganggo mobil téh nyaéta cara anu paling sae kanggo ningali kaéndahan tempat sareng kanggo dongkap ka tempat-tempat diluar rute wisata biasana. Ieu tiasa dilakukeun dina mobil biasana kalayan perencanaan anu ati-ati tapi disarankeun pisan pikeun nganggu kendaraan 4x4 sareung seueur lokasi anu tiasa diakses ku roda anu dasarna 4x4 Kedah di émutan nalika ngarencanakeun yen sanaos Afrika Kidul stabil, henteu sadaya nagara tatangga stabil. Syarat visa sareng waragad beda-beda ti hiji nagara ka nagara laina dipangaruhan ku nagara asal anjeun. satiap nagara boga peraturan anu unik ngeunaan barang-barang darurat naon wae anu kudu aya di mobil
mt: 4x4s are the best way to see the beauty of the country and to get to places off the beaten track. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but it is recommended to use a 4x4 and many places are only accessible by 4x4. Roads in South Africa are generally stable, but not all neighbouring countries are stable. Visa and currency requirements vary from country to country and are dependent on your country of origin. Each country has its own rules regarding essential items, whatever they may be, that must be in the car.
ref: Entering Southern Africa by car is an amazing way to see all the region's beauty as well as to get to places off the normal tourist routes. This can be done in a normal car with careful planning but a 4x4 is highly advised and many locations are only accessible with a high wheel base 4x4. Keep in mind while planning that although Southern Africa is stable not all neighboring countries are. Visa requirements and costs vary from nation to nation and are affected by the country you come from. Each country also has unique laws requiring what emergency items need to be in the car.

src: kusabab anjeun mawa loba barang- ulah sok nendeun tas ditempat anu teu katempo, komo nalika anjeun ngaliwatan batas nagara. Anjeun tiasa janten nu nyandak narkoba sanaos anjeun teu nyadar éta téh narkona, ieu bakal nyandak anjeun ka masalah ageung. Ieu kaasup ngantrian, margi anjing anu tiasa ngangseu narkoba tiasa dipake iraha wae tanpa bebeja. Sababaraha nagara gaduh hukuman anu parah pikeun pelanggaran nu mimiti; ieu tiasa kalebet hukuman panjara langkung ti 10 taun atanapi hukuman paeh. Tas anu heunteu dijagaan jadi udagan para copét, anu ogé tiasa narik perhatian aparat anu waspada kana ancaman bom.
mt: Because you are carrying a lot of luggage, you often leave your bag unattended, especially when crossing borders. You may be caught with drugs without knowing it, which will get you into big trouble. This includes waiting, dogs that can sniff out drugs can be used anywhere without a warrant. Some countries have harsh penalties for first offenders; this can include imprisonment for more than 10 years or the death penalty. Unattended luggage becomes the target of thieves, who also can attract the attention of vigilant officials to the threat of bombs.
ref: Carrying for others - Never let your bags out of your sight, especially when you are crossing international borders. You could find yourself being used as a drug carrier without your knowledge, which will land you in a great deal of trouble. This includes waiting in line, as drug-sniffing dogs could be used at any time without notice. Some countries have exceedingly draconian punishments even for first time offenses; these can include prison sentences of over 10 years or death. Unattended bags are a target for theft and can also attract attention from authorities wary of bomb threats.

src: Eusi bumi anjeun ku kopi anu pinuh ku rasa enjing-enjing sareng teh chamomile anu nenangkeun wengi-wengi. Nalika anjeun nuju staycation, anjeun gadu waktos pikeun ngawowoy diri nyalira jeung tiasa nyéépkeun sababaraha menit tambahan pikeun nyiapkeun hal anu istimewa. Lamun Anjeun rumaos langkung wantun, bantun kasempetan kanggo midamel jus atawa nyampur sababaraha smoothies: Meureun maneh arek manggihan inuman sederhana anu tiasa maneh nyieun jang sarapan keur maneh balik deui ka rutinitas poean. Lamun Anjeun cicing di dayeuh kalawan budaya ngaleueut anu rupa-rupa, sok geura angkat ka bar atawa pub di lingkungan anu henteu sering Anjeun datangan.
mt: Your morning cup of coffee and chamomile tea to soothe the night. When you're on staycation, you have time to pamper yourself and can add a few extra minutes to prepare something special. If you're in a rush, you have the opportunity to make juice or mix some smoothies:  Forget the kids, find a new breakfast drink to make for yourself on the way back to your routine. If you live in a city with a diverse culture, you may want to go to a bar or pub in an area you don't often visit.
ref: Fill your home with a rich coffee in the morning and some relaxing chamomile tea at night. When you're on a staycation, you have the time to treat yourself and take a few extra minutes to brew up something special. If you're feeling more adventurous, take the opportunity to juice or blend up some smoothies: maybe you'll discover a simple beverage that you can make for breakfast when you're back to your daily routine. If you live in a city with a varied drinking culture, go to bars or pubs in neighborhoods you don't frequent.

src: kampung Haldarsvík nyayogikeun pemandangan pulo anu caket nyaeta Eysturoy sareng ngagaduhan gareja segi dalapan anu aneh. Di halaman geréja, aya patung japati anu didamel tina marmer anu saé di luhur sababaraha makam. Butuh waktu satengah jam keur lelempangan di kampung anu éndah.
mt: The village of Haldarsvík offers a view of the nearby island of Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard is a marble statue of a seated woman atop several graves. It takes half an hour to walk through the picturesque village.
ref: The village of Haldarsvík offer views of the nearby island Eysturoy and has an unusual octagonal church. In the churchyard, there are interesting marble sculptures of doves over some tombs. It's worth half an hour to stroll about the intriguing village.

src: Sanajan anjeun tiasa waé teu butuh visa upami ngadakeun kunjungan pondok ka nagara-nagara tangtu salaku turis atawa kanggo gawé, indit ka ditu salaku siswa internasional sacara umum kudu cicing langkung lami tibatan indit ka ditu salaku turis biasa. Sacara umum, cicing di nagara asing kanggo waktos anu lami ngabutuhkeun visa ti mimitina. Visa pikeun nu diajar mah umumna gaduh sarat daftar sareng prosedur anu bénten tina visa wisatawan biasa atanapi visa bisnis. Keur sabagian besar negara, anjeun kedah gadug surat ajuan ti kampus anu dituju, jeung oge laporan biaya anu bakal ngabiayaan anjeun sahenteuna di taun mimiti. Hubungi institusi sareng departemen imigrasi di nagara anjeun kanggo sarat lengkapna lamun anjeun hoyong diajar di luar negeri.
mt: Although you may not need a visa to visit certain countries as a tourist or for work, in general, staying in a foreign country for a long period of time requires a visa from the start. Visas for students are usually more detailed and have different procedures than regular tourist or business visas. For most countries, you must have a letter of invitation from the institution you are attending, and also a statement of finances that will pay for you once you are there in the first year. Contact the institution and the immigration department in the country you are going to for the complete requirements if you plan to study abroad.
ref: While you may not need a visa for short visits to certain countries as a tourist or for business, going there as an international student generally requires a longer stay than going there just as a casual tourist. In general, staying in any foreign country for an extended period of time will require you to obtain a visa in advance. Student visas generally have different requirements and application procedures from normal tourist or business visas. For most countries, you will need an offer letter from the institution you wish to study at, and also evidence of funds to support yourself for at least the first year of your course. Check with the institution, as well as the immigration department for the country you wish to study in for detailed requirements.

src: Dina usum panas, khususna, anjeun kudu ati-ati kana reungit upami anjeun hoyong naek ka hutan hujan. Sanajan maneh nyetir ngalewatan hutan hujan subtropis, babaraha detik ngabuka panto keur arek asup mobil geus mahi jang reungit jang nyumput asup kajero mobil maneh.
mt: In the summer, especially, you should be careful of lightning if you are driving through a tropical rainforest. Although many seconds of opening the door for a child to enter the car has already been struck by lightning to hide in the car.
ref: In summer, especially, you'll need to watch out for mosquitoes if you decide to hike through the rainforest. Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

Even if you're driving through the subtropical rainforest, a few seconds with the doors open while you get inside the vehicle is enough time for mosquitoes to get in the vehicle with you.

src: Sundarban mangrupikeun leuweung tangkal sabuk bako pang ageungna sadunya, manjang 80 km (50 mil) ka pedalaman Bangladésh sareng India ti basisir. Sundarban parantos dinyatakeun situs warisan dunya UNESCO, bagian leweung dijero India di sebut Taman Nasional Sundarban. Éta leuweung henteu ngan diwangun ku rawa bakau wungkul — di ditu aya sababaraha sésa ti leuweung perkasa anu baheulana nutupan dataran Gangga. Sundarbans ngaliput area saluas 3,850 km² anu 1 pertilu daérah na téh nyaéta cai / rawa. Ti taun 1966, Sundarban téh tos janten tempat parlindungan sato, jeung diperkirakeun ayeuna aya 400 maung Royal Bengal sareng sakitar 30.000 rusa tutul di daérah éta.
mt: Sundarbans is the largest mangrove forest in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) inland from the coast of Bangladesh and India. Sundarbans was declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site, the Indian part of the forest is called Sundarbans National Park. The forest is not only made up of mangrove swamps — there are also remnants of the once mighty Ganges delta. Sundarbans covers an area of 3,850 km², of which 1/3 is water / swamp. Since 1966, Sundarbans has been a wildlife sanctuary, and is estimated to have 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.
ref: The Sundarbans are the largest littoral mangrove belt in the world, stretching 80 km (50 mi) into the Bangladeshi and Indian hinterland from the coast. The Sundarbans has been declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site. The part of the forest within Indian territory is called Sundarbans National Park. The forests aren't just mangrove swamps though — they include some of the last remaining stands of the mighty jungles which once covered the Gangetic plain. The Sundarbans cover an area of 3,850 km², of which about one-third is covered in water/marsh areas. Since 1966 the Sundarbans have been a wildlife sanctuary, and it is estimated that there are now 400 Royal Bengal tigers and about 30,000 spotted deer in the area.

src: Dunya ngagaduhan langkung ti 5.000 basa anu béda, kalebet langkung ti dua puluh basa ngagaduhan langkung ti 50 juta panyatur. Seratan sok tiasa langkung gampil diartosan tibatan cariosan. Ieur biasana leres kanggo alamat, nu sok sesah upami ngan disebatkeun hungkul. Seueur nagara sapinuhna bentes berbahasa Inggris, sarta sumawonten langkung seueur deui, anjeun tiasa ngarep-ngarep kauninga anu kawates - utamana di golongan jalmi anom. Bayangkeun, upami anjeun hoyong, hiji urang Mancun, Boston, Jamaica sareng Sydneysider calik babarengan di méja makan di hiji réstoran di Toronto. Aranjeuna silih ngahibur ku carita ti lemburna masing-masing, dicaritakeun nganggo basa lokal bareng sareng aksena ogé.
mt: The world has more than 5,000 distinct languages, including more than twenty with more than 50 million speakers. Writing can be easier to read than speech. It is usually easier to understand if it is only spoken. Many countries are predominantly English-speaking, and many more are predominantly so in the future - especially among the young. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting together at a table in a restaurant in Toronto. They would all be able to understand each other's stories, told in their own local language and accent.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

Ieur biasana leres kanggo alamat, nu sok sesah upami ngan disebatkeun hungkul. Seueur nagara sapinuhna bentes berbahasa Inggris, sarta sumawonten langkung seueur deui, anjeun tiasa ngarep-ngarep kauninga anu kawates - utamana di golongan jalmi anom. Bayangkeun, upami anjeun hoyong, hiji urang Mancun, Boston, Jamaica sareng Sydneysider calik babarengan di méja makan di hiji réstoran di Toronto. Aranjeuna silih ngahibur ku carita ti lemburna masing-masing, dicaritakeun nganggo basa lokal bareng sareng aksena ogé.
mt: The world has more than 5,000 distinct languages, including more than twenty with more than 50 million speakers. Writing can be easier to read than speech. It is usually easier to understand if it is only spoken. Many countries are predominantly English-speaking, and many more are predominantly so in the future - especially among the young. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting together at a table in a restaurant in Toronto. They would all be able to understand each other's stories, told in their own local language and accent.
ref: The world has over 5,000 different languages, including more than twenty with 50 million or more speakers. Written words are often easier to understand than spoken words, also. This is especially true of addresses, which are often difficult to pronounce intelligibly. Many entire nations are completely fluent in English, and in even more you can expect a limited knowledge - especially among younger people. Imagine, if you will, a Mancunian, Bostonian, Jamaican and Sydneysider sitting around a table having dinner at a restaurant in Toronto. They're regaling each other with stories from their hometowns, told in their distinct accents and local argot.

src: Beus angkat ti terminal beus antar kabupatén (ngalangkungan walungan) sadidinten, sanaos seuseueurna, utamina anu nuju wétan sareng Jakar/Bumthang angkat antara 6:30 sareng 7:30. Kusabab beus antar kacamatan sering pinuh ku jalmi, disarankeun meuli karcisna sababaraha poé kawitna. Lolobana mah di daerah-daerah  aya beus Jepang Coaster anu leutik, anu nyaman jeung kokoh. Taksi babarengan mangrupikeun cara nu gancang jeung nyaman pikeun indit ka tempat nu cakeut, siga Paro (Nu 150) sareng Punakha (Nu 200).
mt: Buses to and from the terminal to the districts (crossing the river) are running today, but the eastbound and Jakar/Bumthang buses are running between 6:30 and 7:30. Because the buses to the districts are often full of people, it is recommended to buy your tickets in advance. Most of the areas have Japanese Coaster buses, which are small, comfortable and sturdy. Taxis are a fast and comfortable way to get to places like Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).
ref: Buses depart the inter-district bus station (across the river) throughout the day, though most, especially those heading to the east and Jakar/Bumthang leave between 06:30 and 07:30. As the inter-district buses are often full, it is advisable to purchase a ticket a few days in advance. Most districts are served by small Japanese Coaster Buses, which are comfortable and sturdy. Shared taxis are a quick and comfortable means to travel to nearby places, such as Paro (Nu 150) and Punakha (Nu 200).

src: "Ditamahan jeung hesena akses, ""Timbutku"" dijadikeun sabagai metafora jang daerah eksotis anu tebih. Ayeuna, Timbuktu teh dayeuh anu miskin, sanaos reputasina ngajadikeunna objek wisata, sarta tos gaduh bandara. Dina taun 1990, éta dilebetkeun kana daptar situs warisan dunya anu bahaya, kusabab ancaman gurun pasir. Éta mangrupikeun 1 titik pangeureunan utami nalika Kaajaiban Dunia Afrika PBS husus Henry Louis Gates. Kota iyeu benten pisan jeung kota-kota lain di nagara eta, sabab leuwih dipangaruhan ku budaya Arab tibatan Afrika."
mt: "Timbuktu" is used as a metaphor for exotic and distant places. Now, Timbuktu is a poor town, but its reputation has made it a tourist destination, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was listed as a World Heritage Site in danger, due to threats from the Sahara desert. It was one of the main points of emphasis in the PBS special Henry Louis Gates' Africa's Great Civilizations. The city is very different from other cities in the country, because it is more influenced by Arab culture than African culture.
ref: "Combined with its relative inaccessibility, ""Timbuktu"" has come to be used as a metaphor for exotic, distant lands. Today, Timbuktu is an impoverished town, although its reputation makes it a tourist attraction, and it has an airport. In 1990, it was added to the list of world heritage sites in danger, due to the threat of desert sands. It was one of the major stops during Henry Louis Gates' PBS special Wonders of the African World. The city is in stark contrast to the rest of the country's cities, because it has more of an Arabic flair than of an African."

src: Para paralimpik bakal diayakeun ti 24 Agustus dugi ka 5 September 2021. Sababaraha acara bakal dilangsungkeun di lokasi séjén di sakumna Jepang. Tokyo teh bakal jadi hiji-hijina dayeuh di Asia anu kungsi jadi tuan rumah 2 olimpiade musim panas, kungsi jadi tuan rumah olimpiade taun 1964. Upami anjeun mesen panerbangan sareng akomodasi kanggo taun 2020 sateuacan reureuh diumumkeun, anjeun tiasa ngalaman kaayaan anu rada sesah. Kawijakan pembatalan bénten-bénten, tapi dugi ka ahir maret seueur kawijakan pembatalan anu dumasar kana virus corona henteu diperpanjang dugi ka Juli 2020, nalika Olimpiade parantos dijadwalkeun. Harga sabagian gede tiket acara diharapkeun kira-kira antara ¥2.500 nepi ¥130.000, jeung harga tiket khusus kira-kira  ¥7.000.
mt: The Paralympics will be held from August 24 to September 5, 2021. Some events will be held at other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the first city in Asia to host two Summer Olympics, having hosted the 1964 Olympics. If you have booked travel and accommodation for 2020 before the cancellation was announced, you may be in a slightly awkward position. Cancellation policies vary, but until March, many cancellation policies based on the coronavirus were extended until July 2020, when the postponed Olympics were scheduled. Most event tickets are expected to be around ¥2,500 to ¥130,000, and special tickets are expected to be around ¥7,000.
ref: The Paralympics will take place from 24 August to 5 September 2021. Some events will be held in other locations throughout Japan. Tokyo will be the only Asian city to have hosted two summer Olympics, having hosted the games in 1964. If you booked your flights and accommodation for 2020 before the postponement was announced, you may have a tricky situation. Cancellation policies vary, but as of late March most coronavirus-based cancellation policies don't extend to July 2020, when the Olympics had been scheduled. It's expected that most event tickets will cost between ¥2,500 and ¥130,000, with typical tickets costing around ¥7,000.

src: "Tornado nyaéta kolom anu muter di hawa nu ukuranna déét, anu nyédot hawa di sakitarna ka lebet sareng ka luhur. Bisa ngahasilkeun angin anu badag (seringna 100-200 mil/jam) sareung bisa ngangkat barang anu beurat dugi ka ngapung, barangna ngapung sareung puting beluingna. Eta dimimitian dina corong turun tina awan badai, sareng janten ""Puting Beliung"" nalika eta nyentuh kana taneuh."
mt: "A tornado is a column of air that rotates, with a diameter of only a few yards, sucking air inwards and upwards. It can produce strong winds (often 100-200 mph) and lift heavy objects into the air. It is formed in a funnel cloud descending from a thunderstorm, and becomes a "Freak" when it touches the ground."
ref: "A tornado is a spinning column of very low-pressure air, which sucks the surrounding air inward and upward. They generate high winds (often 100-200 miles/hour) and can lift heavy objects into the air, carrying them as the tornado moves. They begin as funnels descending from storm clouds, and become ""tornadoes"" when they touch the ground."

src: Upami nagara anu anjeun bakal sumpingan nuturkeun ka salah sahiji nasihat piknik, asuransi kaséhatan piknik anjeun atanapi asuransi pembatalan piknik anjeun tiasa wae kapangaruhan. Anjeun panginten tiasa waé konsultasi sareng nasihat pamaréntah sejen anu sanes pamaréntah anjeun nyalira, tapi nasihatna dirancang pikeun wargana nyalira. 1 contona, rakyat Amérika di Wétan tengah keur ngahadapan situasi anu bénten sareng rakyat Eropa atawa Arab. Piwuruk ngan saukur kasimpulan ringkes tina kaayaan politik di hiji nagara. Pandangan anu disajikeun osok pisan saliwat, umum jeung disederhanakeun pisan dibandingkeun jeung inpormasi anu leuwih jentre di tempat séjén.
mt: If your country is going to follow one of the picnic tips, either a picnic health insurance or a picnic cancellation insurance may be affected. You can also consult and seek advice from other government officials, but their advice is designed for the people of the country. For example, Americans in the Middle East are facing different situations than Europeans or Arabs. Only a brief summary of the political situation in a country is given, often superficially, generally and simplified compared to more detailed information elsewhere.
ref: If the country you will be visiting becomes subject to a travel advisory, your travel health insurance or your trip cancellation insurance may be affected. You may also wish to consult the advice of governments other than your own, but their advice is designed for their citizens. As one example, American citizens in the Middle East might face different situations from Europeans or Arabs. Advisories are merely a brief summary of the political situation in one country. The views presented are often cursory, general and oversimplified compared to the more detailed information available elsewhere.

src: Agénsi perjalanan atos aya ti saprak abad ka-19. Agén perjalanan biasana mangrupikeun  pilihan anu saé pikeun perjalanan anu ngalangkungan pangalaman anu aya di pengker ngenaan alam,  budaya, basa atanapi nagara-nagara anu berpengahasilan rendah. Sanajan kalolobaan agen daek mesen anu reguler, seueur agen ngahususkeun kana jenis-jenis perjalanan nu tangtu, kisaran anggaran atanapi tujuan. Bisa jadi leuwih hadé pikeun nganggo agén anu sering mesen perjalanan anu sami sareng milik anjeun. Tingali kana perjalanan naon nu agén promosikeun, dina situs wéb atawa dina jandela toko.
mt: Travel agencies have been in existence since the 19th century. Travel agents are often a good choice for travel that involves a unique experience in nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most travel agents offer regular services, many specialize in certain types of travel, price ranges or destinations. It may be better to use an agent who often sells the same type of travel as you. Look at the travel that the agent is promoting, on the web site or in the window of the store.
ref: Travel agencies have been around since the 19th century. A travel agent is usually a good option for a journey which extends beyond a traveller's previous experience of nature, culture, language or low-income countries. Although most agencies are willing to take on most regular bookings, many agents specialise in particular types of travel, budget ranges or destinations. It can be better to use an agent who frequently books similar trips to yours. Take a look at what trips the agent is promoting, whether on a website or in a shop window.

src: Aya seueur hal anu anjeun kedah pertimbangkeun sateuacan anjeun mangkat kamana waé. Nalika anjeun aangkatan, ulah ngarepkeun bakalan sami sapertos di imah. Paripolah, hukum, katuangeun, jalan, panineungan, gaya hirup, bahasa, jeung sajabana bakal beda jeung dimana anjeun linggih asalna. Ieu mangrupikeun hal anu anjeun kedah salawasna émut, pikeun nyingkahan kakecewaan atanapi bahkan teu resep kana cara lokal pikeun ngalakukeun hiji hal.
mt: There are many things you should consider before you go anywhere. When you travel, don't expect to be treated the same as at home. Customs, laws, currency, roads, weather, lifestyle, language, and more will be different wherever you are from. This is something you should always be aware of, to avoid disappointment or even disapproval of local ways of doing things.
ref: "There are many things you have to take into consideration before and when you travel somewhere. When you travel, expect things not to be like they are ""back home"". Manners, laws, food, traffic, lodging, standards, language and so on will to some extent differ from where you live. This is something you always need to keep in mind, to avoid disappointment or perhaps even distaste over local ways to do things."

src: Upami angkat ka nagara berkembang pertama kali - atanapi dina bagian anyar dunya - ulah ngaremehkeun poténsial budaya anu beda. Seueur wisatawan anu jugala, atos gaduh pangalaman ku kamekaran dunya wisata, kalayan seueur panyaluyuan budaya anu aralit anu gancang nambihanna. Utamina di waktos-waktos mimiti anjeun, pertimbangkeun nyéépkeun waktos di hotel saé anu bergaya barat, tuangeun, sareng jasa pikeun anjeun nyasuaikeun diri. Entong bobo dina kasur atanapi alas di luhur taneuh di daérah anu anjeun henteu apal situasi sasatoan lokal. Upami anjeun bade kemah kaluar, mawa weh ranjang atanapi tempat kulem gantung pikeun ngajauhan tina oray, kalajengking sareng samacamna.
mt: If you are the first to visit a developing country - or a new part of the world - don't underestimate the potential for cultural differences. Many tourists, after all, have had the experience of world travel, with many cultural differences that are rapidly changing. At first, consider extending your time in a western-style hotel, tuangeun, and services to help you adjust. If you sleep in a tent or bed suspended from the ground in an area you do not know the local situation. If you want to camp out, bring a bed or a hammock to keep away from the oray, scorpions and such.
ref: If traveling in a developing country for the first time – or in a new part of the world – don't underestimate the potential culture shock. Many a stable, capable traveler has been overcome by the newness of developing world travel, where many little cultural adjustments can add up quickly. Especially in your initial days, consider splurging on Western-style and -quality hotels, food, and services to help acclimatize. Do not sleep on a mattress or pad on the ground in areas where you do not know the local fauna. If you are going to camp out, bring a camp cot or hammock to keep you away from snakes, scorpions and such.

src: "Nyieun sareng nyandak salinan kawijakan anjeun sareng kontak panyadia asuransi anjeun. Aranjeunna kedah nunjukkeun alamat e-mail anu ngajamin asuransi sareng nomer telepon internasional pikeun bebejaan/otorisasi sareng ngadamel klaim. Gaduh salinan anu sanés dina koper anjeun sareng online (kirimkeun email ka diri anjeun sorangan sareng lampirana, atanapi simpen dina ""cloud""). Lamun iinditan mawa laptop atawa tablet, salin isina ka memori atawa kaset (anu kajangkau tanpa internet) oge pasihan salinan kabijakan atawa kontak ka nu maturan jalan-jalan atau babaturan di imah anu siap nulungan"
mt: "Make and keep copies of your policy and contact details for your insurer. You must show your email address that insures and international telephone number for emergency/authorization and make a claim. Have a copy in your luggage and online (send an email to yourself and attach, or save in ""cloud""). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, copy the contents to memory or cassette (which can be reached without internet) and keep a copy of the policy or contact to the traveler or socialize at home or ready to help"
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

mt: "Make and keep copies of your policy and contact details for your insurer. You must show your email address that insures and international telephone number for emergency/authorization and make a claim. Have a copy in your luggage and online (send an email to yourself and attach, or save in ""cloud""). If you are traveling with a laptop or tablet, copy the contents to memory or cassette (which can be reached without internet) and keep a copy of the policy or contact to the traveler or socialize at home or ready to help"
ref: "Make and carry copies of your policy and your insurer's contact details with you. They need to show the insurer's e-mail address and international phone numbers for advice/authorizations and making claims. Have another copy in your luggage and online (e-mail to yourself with attachment, or stored in the ""cloud""). If traveling with a laptop or tablet, store a copy in its memory or disc (accessible without the internet). Also give policy/contact copies to traveling companions and relatives or friends back home willing to help."

src: aya sababaraha format pilem anu kungsi dipake dina sababaraha taun katukang. Biasana mah 35 mm pilem (36 dugi 24 mm negatif) anu loba dipake. Éta biasana gampil dieusian deui lamun anjeun séépeun, sareng résolusi anu dihasilkeun kirang langkung sami sareng DSLR nu ayeuna. Sababaraha kamera pilem anu format-medium nganggo format ukuran 6 kali 6 cm, leuwih tepatna negatif 56 kali 56 mm. Ieu masihan résolusi hampir opat kali lipat tibatan 35 mm negatip (3136 mm2 lawan 864).
mt: 35 mm film (36 mm to 24 mm negative) is the most common format used in the last few years. This is usually easy to reprocess if you want, and the resolution produced is roughly the same as a DSLR camera. Some medium format cameras use a 6 by 6 cm (56 mm by 56 mm negative) format, which gives a resolution about four times greater than 35 mm negatives (3136 mm2 versus 864 mm2).
ref: There are many different film formats that have been used over the years. Standard 35 mm film (36 by 24 mm negative) is much the commonest. It can usually be replenished fairly easily if you run out, and gives resolution roughly comparable to a current DSLR. Some medium-format film cameras use a 6 by 6 cm format, more precisely a 56 by 56 mm negative. This gives resolution almost four times that of a 35 mm negative (3136 mm2 versus 864).

src: Cara panggampangna keur mimitian bisnis nyerat perjalanan nyaeta ningkatkeun kamampuan dina halaman web blog perjalanan anu tos aya. Saatos anjeun ngarasa nyaman ngatur tampilan jeung ngaropéa situs wéb, teras engké mah, anjeun tiasa waé ngadamel situs wéb nyalira.
mt: A simple way to start a travel business is to improve the skills of a travel blog that already exists. After you feel comfortable arranging the appearance and operating the website, you can then make a website.
ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

ref: The easiest way to get started in the business of travel writing is to hone your skills on an established travel blog website. After you become comfortable with formatting and editing on the web, then later, you might create your own website.

src: Di bumi, kusabab angger waé kana kuman lokal ieu, kemungkinan anu kacida luhurna anjeun parantos janten kekebalan kana eta panyakit. Nanging di palebah dunya sanésna, dimana sato bakteriologis nu anjeun karek apal, anjeun kamungkinan ageung bakal ngalaman masalah. Oge,di iklim anu langkung haneut, bakteri tumuwuh langkung enggal sarta tahan langkung lami diluar awak na. Ieu kasieunan ti Delhi Belly, Kutukan si Firaun, dendam Montezuma, sareung kabeh baturanna. Siga masalah pernapasan di cuaca nu tiis pisan, masalah peujit dina cuaca anu panas lumrah dipendakan sareng seeurna teh jelas-jelas ngaganggu tapi henteu pati bahaya teuing.
mt: On Earth, because of the local bacteria, the most likely scenario is that you will develop immunity to the disease. However, on other planets, where the native microbiota is unknown, you are likely to have problems. Also, in colder climates, bacteria grow faster and survive longer outside the body. This is the same as Delhi Belly, Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and all its variants.  Respiratory problems in cold weather, digestive problems in hot weather are often blamed, and of course, the obvious is clearly annoying but not dangerous enough.
ref: At home, due to this constant exposure to the local germs, odds are very high that you're already immune to them. But in other parts of the world, where the bacteriological fauna are new to you, you're far more likely to run into problems. Also, in warmer climates bacteria both grow more quickly and survive longer outside the body. Thus the scourges of Delhi Belly, the Pharaoh's Curse, Montezuma's Revenge, and their many friends. As with respiratory problems in colder climates, intestinal problems in hot climates are fairly common and in most cases are distinctly annoying but not really dangerous.
