src: Éropa mangrupikeun buana anu kawilang leutik tapi seueur nagara-nagara mandiri. Dina kaayaan normal, ngumbara di sababaraha nagara hartosna kedah ngalangkungan sababaraha aplikasi visa sareng pamariksaan paspor. Zona Schengen, kumaha ogé, dianggo sapertos 1 nagara dina hal ieu. Salami anjeun cicing di wilayah ieu, anjeun biasana tiasa ngalangkungan wates tanpa kudu ngaliwatan pos-pos pangecékan paspor deui. Saruana, ku gaduh visa Schengen, anjeun teu kedah papisah daftar visa keur unggal nagara anggota Schengen, hasilna ngahémat waktos, artos jeung dokumén.
mt: Europe is a small continent but many countries are independent. In normal circumstances, travelling between several countries requires dealing with several visa applications and passport checks. The Schengen area, for example, is treated as one country in this regard. While you are living in this area, you can usually cross borders without having to go through passport checkpoints again. In addition, having a Schengen visa means you do not have to fill out a separate visa application for each Schengen country, saving time, effort and paperwork.
ref: Europe is a continent that is relatively small but with many independent countries. Under normal circumstances, travelling through multiple countries would mean having to go through visa applications and passport control multiple times. The Schengen zone, however, works somewhat like one country in this respect. As long as you stay in this zone, you can generally cross borders without going through passport control checkpoints again. Similarly, by having a Schengen visa, you do not need to apply for visas to each of the Schengen member countries separately, hence saving time, money and paperwork.

src: Makam Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 panginten mangrupikeun kuburan anu paling kasohor di Lembah, tempat penemuan Howard Carter taun 1922 tentang astana karajaan anu ampir utuh kénéh ti raja ngora. Dibandingkeun sareng makam karajaan anu sanés, kumaha waé gé, makam Tuankhamun boro-boro pantes di datangan, sabab langkung alit sareng hiasanna terbatas. ka saha wae anu minat nempo bukti karusakan mumi pas bade di kaluarkeun tina karandana, bakalan kuciwa, kusabab ngan katempo mastaka sareung taktakna hungkul. Kabeungharan rongkah di makamna téh teu aya deui, tapi parantos dialihkeun ka Musium Mesir di Kairo. Nu bade sumping kalawan wanci kawates mending meakkeun wanci maranehanana di tempat sanes.
mt: Tutankhamun's tomb (KV62). KV62 is the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, where the discovery by Howard Carter in 1922 of the intact royal tomb almost intact. Unlike other royal tombs, how ever, the tomb of Tutankhamun is small and its decoration is limited. Anyone interested in seeing the damage to the mummy when it was removed from its coffin, will be disappointed, because only the skeleton and the skull are visible. The coffin is also missing, but has been transferred to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. The time limit for the burial of the remains of the tomb is over, but the remains are now in another place.
ref: Tomb of Tutankhamun (KV62). KV62 may be the most famous of the tombs in the Valley, the scene of Howard Carter's 1922 discovery of the almost intact royal burial of the young king. Compared to most of the other royal tombs, however, the tomb of Tutankhamun is barely worth visiting, being much smaller and with limited decoration. Anyone interested in seeing evidence of the damage to the mummy done during attempts to remove it from the coffin will be disappointed as only the head and shoulders are visible. The fabulous riches of the tomb are no longer in it, but have been removed to the Egyptian Museum in Cairo. Visitors with limited time would be best to spend their time elsewhere.

src: Pulo Bowen mangrupikeun lalampahan dintenan atanapi nyaba tuntung minggu anu nawiskeun berdayung, naék bukit, toko, restoran, sareng seueur deui. Komunitas oténtik ieu aya di Howe Sound di luar Vancouver sareng gampang di akses via taksi cai anu dijadwalkeun angkat ti Pulo Grandville di kota Vancouver. Pikeun aranjeunna anu resep kagiatan outdoor, nyusuran koridor Laut sareng Langit éta penting pisan. Whistler (1.5 jam jauhna ti Vancouver) teh mahal tapi kawanoh pisan kusabab Olimpiade Usum tiis taun 2010 Dina usum salju, raosan sababaraha tempat ski anu pang saéna di Amerika Kalér, sareng nalika usum panas cobian sapédahan gunung anu otentik.
mt: Bowen Island is a weekend getaway, kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and much more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound outside of Vancouver and is easily accessible via scheduled water taxi from Granville Island in the city of Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, the Sea to Sky corridor is important. Whistler (1.5 hours from Vancouver) is expensive but well known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics In the winter, some of the best ski resorts in North America, and in the summer, try the authentic mountain.
ref: Bowen Island is a popular day trip or weekend excursion offering kayaking, hiking, shops, restaurants, and more. This authentic community is located in Howe Sound just off Vancouver, and is easily accessed via scheduled water taxis departing Granville Island in downtown Vancouver. For those who enjoy outdoor activities, a trek up the Sea to Sky corridor is essential. Whistler (1.5 hour drive from Vancouver) is expensive but well-known because of the 2010 Winter Olympics. In the winter, enjoy some of the best skiing in North America, and in the summer try some authentic mountain biking.

src: Curug Victoria mangrupikeun Kota di Zimbabwe kulon, ngalangkungan wates ti living stone, Zambia sareng caket Botswana. Kota ieu lokasina langsung di gigir curug, sareng ieu téh mangrupikeun atraksi utama, tapi tujuan wisata anu populer ieu nawiskeun pangalaman keur petualang atanapi wisatawan seueur kasempetan kanggo liburan leuwih lami. dina usum panghujan (November dugi ka Maret), kadar cai bakal nga ageungan sareng bakal nambih sae curug na. Anjeun téh dijamin baseuh upami anjeun nyebrang sasak atanapi jalan sapanjang jalur anu caket Curug. Di sisi nu sanes, eta teh pasti disababkeun kumargi kadar cai anu neak janten titingalieun anjeun kanu curug nu sabenerna teh bakal kahalangan ku cai
mt: Victoria Falls is a city in western Zimbabwe, on the Zambezi River at the westernmost end of the Great Rift Valley. The city is known for Victoria Falls, a large waterfall on the Zambezi River. The town lies on the southern bank of the river and is close to the Victoria Falls National Park. The town is famous for the Victoria Falls, which are the largest waterfall in the world. The town lies on the southern bank of the Zambezi River and is close to the Victoria Falls
ref: Victoria Falls is a town in the western portion of Zimbabwe, across the border from Livingstone, Zambia, and near Botswana. The town lies immediately next to the falls, and they are the major attraction, but this popular tourist destination offers both adventure seekers and sightseers plenty of opportunities for a longer stay. In the rainy season (November to March), the water volume will be higher and the Falls will be more dramatic. You are guaranteed to get wet if you cross the bridge or walk along the trails winding near the Falls. On the other hand, it is precisely because the volume of water is so high that your viewing of the actual Falls will be obscured—by all the water!

src: aturan ngeunaan pamotretan biasa oge diterapkeun dina rekaman video, malahan tiasa langkung Upami moto gé teu kenging,  komo deui ngarékam pidéo. Upami ngagunakeun drone, cék heula sateuacanna naon waé anu tiasa direkam sareng naon anu diijinkeun atawa lisénsi tambihan anu dibutuhkeun. ngapungkeun drone di deukeut bandara atawa diluhureun kumpulan jelema mangrupakeun hal anu goreng, sanajan eta hal anu henteu dilarang di tempat anjeun
mt: The rules also apply to video recording, even if you don't intend to, if you record a speech. If you use a drone, check beforehand what can be recorded and what is allowed or requires additional licensing. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is dangerous, although it is not prohibited in the place you are
ref: Rules regarding regular photography also apply to video recording, possibly even more so. If just taking a photo of something isn't allowed, then you shouldn't even think of recording a video of it. If using a drone, check well in advance as to what you are allowed to film and what permits or additional licensing are required. Flying a drone near an airport or over a crowd is almost always a bad idea, even if it's not illegal in your area.

src: Pendaptaran mangrupikan syarat tambahan keur ngaprosés visa. Di sababaraha nagara, anjeun kedah ngadaptarkeun diri anjeun jeung tempat anjeun cicing samentara ka aparat setempat. Ieu panginten butuh pikeun ngeusian formulir sareng pulisi setempat atanapi dongkap ka kantor imigrasi. Dina loba nagara anu boga aturan sapertos éta, hotel-hotel lokal bakal ngurusan pendaptarana (pastikeun anjeun naros). Dina kasus séjén, ngan ukur anu cicing di luar akomodasi turis anu kedah ngadaptar. Nanging, ieu ngajadikeun hukum langkung hanteu jelas, janten aranjeun kedah terang heula sateuacanna.
mt: Registration may require additional requirements for processing visas. In some countries, you must register with local authorities while you are in the country. This usually involves filling out a form and visiting the local police station or immigration office. In many countries with such rules, local hotels will arrange registration (provided you stay there). In other cases, only those living outside tourist accommodations must register. However, this is often unclear, so you should ask first.
ref: Registration is an additional requirement for the visa process. In some countries, you must register your presence and address where you are staying with the local authorities. This might require filling out a form with the local police or a visit to the immigration offices. In many countries with such a law, local hotels will handle the registration (make sure to ask). In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

In other cases, only those staying outside of tourist accommodations need to register.  However, this makes the law much more obscure, so find out beforehand.

src: Janten rélawan sabari liburan téh cara anu mangpaat pisan keur batur, tapi ieu mah sanés perkawis masihan wungkul. Hirup teras janten sukarélawan di luar negeri nyaéta cara anu saé pikeun ngenalkeun budaya sanés, pendak sareng jalmi enggal, ngamahaman diri sorangan, ngahargaan pandangan lain sareng margi meunang kaahlian anyar. Ieu ogé tiasa janten jalan anu saé pikeun ngalonggarkeun anggaran supados tiasa lami cicing di tempat melancong kusabab seueur padamelan sukaréla anu masihan kamar sareng tuangeun sareng sababaraha tempat ogé masihan gaji sanajan alit.
mt: Traveling abroad is a great way to learn about other cultures, meet new people, gain self-confidence, appreciate different viewpoints and gain new skills. It can also be a great way to stretch your budget so you can stay longer in your destination because many jobs are hard to find, pay is low and housing is expensive.
ref: Volunteering while travelling is a great way to make a difference but it's not just about giving. Living and volunteering in a foreign country is a great way to get to know a different culture, meet new people, learn about yourself, get a sense of perspective and even gain new skills. It can also be a good way to stretch a budget to allow a longer stay somewhere since many volunteer jobs provide room and board and a few pay a small salary.

src: "Ulin ka Walt Disney World mangrupa ziarah utami kanggo seueur kulawargi Amerika. Kunjungan anu ""umum"" ngalibatkeun hiber ka Bandara Internasional Orlando, tumpak bus ka hotél Disney, kantun sakitar saminggu di ditu, sarta balik ka imah. Aya seueur macem-macem kemungkinan, tapi ieu téh tetep naon anu réa jalmi maksud pas aranjeunna nyarios tentang ""indit ka Dunya Disney"" Seueur tikét anu diical daring liwat situs lélang sapertos eBay atanapi Craigslist sawaréh dianggo pikeun tikét park-hopper sababaraha-dinten. Sanaos ieu téh kagiatan anu umum, nanging dilarang ku Disney: tikét heunteu tiasa dipindahtangankeun."
mt: "A trip to Walt Disney World is a once-in-a-lifetime experience for many American families. The ""typical"" visit includes flying into Orlando International Airport, taking a bus to a Disney hotel, staying for a few days, and then returning home. There are many options, but this is what most people mean when they talk about ""going to the Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through sites like eBay or Craigslist are used for multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a common practice, it is forbidden by Disney: tickets cannot be transferred."
ref: "Traveling to Walt Disney World represents a major pilgrimage for many American families. The ""typical"" visit involves flying into Orlando International Airport, busing to an on-site Disney hotel, spending about a week without leaving Disney property, and returning home. There are infinite variations possible, but this remains what most people mean when they talk of ""going to Disney World"". Many tickets sold online through auction websites such as eBay or Craigslist are partially used multi-day park-hopper tickets. While this is a very common activity, it is prohibited by Disney: the tickets are non-transferable."

src: Saha waé anu ngarencanakeun ngadatangan ka nagara anu dianggap zona perang kedah gaduh pelatihan profesional. Neangan jang 'Ngalatih kaamanan' di internet tiasa wae mere hasil alamat perusahaan lokal. Kelas biasana bakal ngalingkup kabeh isu anu dibahas didieu leuwih rinci, biasana sareng pangalaman prakték. Hiji kursus biasana bakal lumangsung 2-5 dinten sareng nganggo maén peran, seueur palatihan pitulung kahiji sareng sakapeung pekarang. Buku sareng majalah ngeunaan kasalametan di alam liar seeur dipendakan, tapi tulisan-tulisan ngeunaan wilayah perang jarang.
mt: Anyone planning to visit a country considered a war zone should have professional training.  Searching for 'Train to Safety' on the internet will yield local companies.  Classes usually cover all issues discussed in more detail, usually with hands-on experience.  A course usually lasts 2-5 days and uses role-playing, some first aid training and sometimes a workbook.  Books and magazines on wildlife hazards are common, but writings on war zones are rare.
ref: Anyone planning a visit to a country that could be considered a war zone should get professional training. A search of the Internet for 'Hostile environment course' will probably provide the address of a local company. A course will normally cover all the issues discussed here in far greater detail, usually with practical experience. A course will normally be from 2-5 days and will involve role play, a lot of first aid and sometimes weapons training. Books and magazines dealing with wilderness survival are common, but publications dealing with war zones are few.

src: Aya cara nu beda-beda ngamurnikeun cai, sababaraha leuwih éféktif ngalawan husus ancaman. Di sababaraha tempat manaskeun cai samenit téh tos cekap, lamun di nu lain mah waktosna leuwih lami. Saringan bénten-bénten dina tingkat kaalusanna, sareng upami anjeun hawartos, anjeun kedah nimbangkeun ngagaleuh cai botolan anu diségel tina perusahaan anu terpercaya.
mt: There are different ways to purify water, some more effective against specific threats. In some places, boiling water is effective, but in others it takes longer. Filters vary in their levels of filtration, and if you are unsure, you should buy bottled water from a reputable company.
ref: There are different ways of purifying water, some more effective against specific threats. In some areas boiling water for a minute is enough, in others several minutes are needed. Filters vary in effectiveness, and should you have a concern, then you should consider buying your water in a sealed bottle from a reputable company.

src: Arus belah nyaéta arus balik ti gelombang anu mecahkeun pantai, osok dina karang atanapi samacemna. Kusabab tina topologi jero cai, aliran cai ngumpul dina sababaraha bagian anu langkung jero, sareng arus gancang tiasa ngabentuk dina cai nu langkung jero. Seuseueurna anu maot disebabkeun ku kacapéan kusabab ngojay ngalawan ombak, anu sigana mustahil. Saatos anjeun kaluar tina ombak, ngojay balik deui moal sesah sapertos biasana. Cobian bidik hiji tempat supados anjeun teu katangkeup deui atanapi, gumantung ku kamampuan anjeun sareng upami anjeun tos kanyahoan, anjeun panginten hoyong ngantosan piken disalametkeun.
mt: A rip current is a strong, localized current of water that flows away from the beach, parallel to the shore. Because of the topography of the sea floor, water is piled up in some areas, and a fast current can form in the deeper water. The dead are usually drowned because they are unable to swim against the waves, which are impossible. After leaving the waves, they swim back again, not as usual. Try to aim at a place so that you are not caught again or, depending on your ability and if you know, you can continue to be rescued.
ref: Rip currents are the returning flow from waves breaking off the beach, often at a reef or similar. Due to the underwater topology the return flow is concentrated at a few deeper sections, and a fast current to deep water may form there. Most deaths happen as result of fatigue trying to swim back against the current, which may be impossible. As soon as you get out of the current, swimming back is no more difficult than normally. Try aiming somewhere where you are not caught again or, depending on your skills and on whether you have been noticed, you might want to wait for rescue.

src: Jalur cai Inlandia tiasa janten tema anu sae kanggo liburan. Contona ngadatangan kastil di Loire Valley, Rhine Valley, atanapi nganggo kapal ka kota anu ramé di Danube atanapi rarakitan di sapanjang Kanal Erie. Aranjeuna oge ngatur rute keur jalur hiking jeung numpak sapedah nu terkenal.
mt: The Inland Waterways can be a theme for a vacation. For example, visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine Valley, or cruising to bustling cities along the Danube or the Erie Canal. Then also plan routes for popular hiking and biking trails.
ref: Inland waterways can be a good theme to base a holiday around. For example visiting castles in the Loire Valley, the Rhine valley or taking a cruise to interesting cites on the Danube or boating along the Erie Canal. They also define routes for popular hiking and cycling trails.

src: Di kaler, wilayah iyeu berbatesan sareng Sahel, jeung di Kidul jeung Kulon berbatesan sareng samudera Atlantik. Awéwé: Disarankeun yén unggal wisatawan awéwé ujar yén aranjeunna tos nikah, henteu paduli status kakawinan anu saleresna. Ngaranggo cincin oge ngabantuan pisan (tapi entong 1 cincin anu katingalina mahal pisan. Awéwé kedah sadar yén bédana budaya tiasa ngahasilkeun anu aranjeunna anggap pelecehan sareng teu biasa lamun dituturkeun, dicekel pananganna, jst. Wanikeun keur nolak lalaki, sareng tong sieun upami anjeun keukeuh (perbedaan budaya atanapi lain, sanes berarti éta téh bener!).
mt: In the north, it borders the Sahel, and to the south and west it borders the Atlantic Ocean.  Women are advised that any female tourist who refuses to marry, regardless of marital status.  They also help with the ring (but only one ring that is expensive.  Women should be aware that cultural differences can result in what you consider harassment and unusual if spoken, touched, etc.  Refusing men, and throwing things if you insist (cultural differences or otherwise, not that this is true!).
ref: In the north the region is bounded by the Sahel, and in the south and west by the Atlantic Ocean. Women: It is recommended that any women travellers say that they are married, regardless of actual marital status. It is helpful to also wear a ring (just not one that looks too expensive. Women should realize that cultural differences may result in what they would consider harassment and it is not uncommon to be followed, grabbed by the arm, etc. Be firm in turning down men, and don't be afraid to stand your ground (cultural differences or not, it doesn't make it ok!).

src: Alam liar mangrupikeun salah sahiji hal anu paling nangtang pikeun fotografer, sareng meryogikeun gabungan anu saé tina nasib, kasabaran, pangalaman sareng alat anu hadé. Fotografi satwa liar sering dianggap dawam, nanging sepertos fotografi umumna, hiji gambar bernilai rebuan sanggem. Fotografi sato liar sering meryogikeun lénsa téléfoto anu panjang, sanaos hal sapertos kempelan manuk atanapi sato leutik mah peryogi lénsa anu séjén. Seeur pisan sato éksotis anu hésé dipendakan, sareng kebon sato téh gaduh aturan upami hoyong popotoan keur kabutuhan komérsil. Sato liar manawi tiasa éraan atanapi tiasa nyerang. Lingkunganna manawi tiis, panas, atawa teu puguh.
mt: Wild animals are one of the most challenging subjects for photographers, and combining the best of luck, patience, experience and equipment. Wildlife photography is often considered difficult, but like general photography, a good picture is worth thousands of words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, but subjects such as birds or small animals may require a different lens. Exotic and dangerous animals are often protected by law, and zoos have rules if you want to photograph for commercial purposes. Wildlife can be shy, hot, or just plain ugly.
ref: Wildlife is among the most challenging motifs for a photographer, and needs a combination of good luck, patience, experience and good equipment. Wildlife photography is often taken for granted, but like photography in general, a picture is worth a thousand words. Wildlife photography often requires a long telephoto lens, though things like a flock of birds or a tiny creature need other lenses. Many exotic animals are hard to find, and parks sometimes have rules about taking photographs for commercial purposes. Wild animals might either be shy or aggressive. The environment might be cold, hot, or otherwise hostile.

src: Saha waé anu badé nyetir di lintang anu luhur atanapi ngalangkungan gunung kedah ngémutan kamungkinan salju, és atanapi suhu anu tiris. Di jalan raya nu beku jeung bersalju, gaya gésék na leutik jantenanjeun moal bisa nyetir cara dina aspal garing. salila badai salju, eta saljo saking lobana bisa matak anjeun kajebak jeung labuh wae. Titingalian anjeun tiasa kawates kusabab salju anu turun atanapi katiup angin, atanapi tiasa oge ku kondénsasi atanapi és dina jandéla mobil. Di sisi sanésna, kaayaan turun és tur salju mangrupikeun hal anu biasa di seueur nagara, tur lalu lintas jalan terus bari teu kaganggu sapanjang taun. The suggestion changed the word 'loba' to make it more polite and more suitable for the context.
mt: 1. Drivers should slow down on high altitudes or mountain passes. 2. Snow and ice can make it difficult to stop. 3. Snow and wind can reduce visibility. 4. Condensation and fog can reduce visibility. 5. Snow and ice are common in many countries, and traffic is not usually affected.
ref: Anyone who's going to drive at high latitudes or over mountain passes should consider the possibility of snow, ice, or freezing temperatures. On icy and snowy roadways, friction is low and you cannot drive as if you were on bare asphalt. During blizzards, enough snow to get you stuck can fall in very little time. Visibility may also be restricted by falling or blowing snow or by condensation or ice on vehicle windows. On the other hand, icy and snowy conditions are normal in many countries, and traffic goes on mostly uninterrupted all year round.

src: Kacuali anjeun saurang diplomat, damel ka luar negeri umumna hartosna anjeun kedah ngajantenkeun pajeg panghasilan di nagara dimana anjeun cicing. Struktur pajeg panghasilan béda-béda di tiap nagara, sareng tarip atanapi kurung pajeg na oge béda jauh ti nagara hiji ka nagara nu sanés. di negara-negara federasi, siga Amerika Serikat sareng Kanada, pajak pendapatan ditarik di tingkat federasi sareng tingkat lokal, jadi tarif na tiasa beda-beda ti tempat ka tempat.
mt: As a diplomat, you are usually exempt from paying income tax in the country where you live. Income tax structures vary from country to country, and the tax rate or bracket can vary greatly from one country to another. In federal states, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is collected at the federal level and the local level, so the rate may vary from place to place.
ref: Unless you are a diplomat, working overseas generally means that you will have to file income tax in the country you are based in. Income tax is structured differently in different countries, and the tax rates and brackets vary widely from one country to another. In some federal countries, such as the United States and Canada, income tax is levied both at the federal level and at the local level, so the rates and brackets can vary from region to region.

src: Paméran Dunya (anu biasa disebut World Exposition, atanapi ngan saukur Expo) mangrupikeun paméran internasional seni sareng sains nu ageung. Nagara nu ngiringan nampilkeun penampilan seni sareng pendidikan di paviliun nasional pikeun nunjukeun masalah dunya atanapi budaya sareng sejarah nagara anjeunna. Paméran Internasional Hortikultural mangrupikeun acara husus anu nampilkeun paméran kembang, kebon botani, sareng hal-hal sanés anu aya hubunganna sareng pepelakan. Sanajan dina téori acara ieu tiasa lumangsung unggal taun (salami acaranana di nagara anu béda), dina praktékna henteu. Acara-acara modél kieu biasana jalan ti 3 ka 6 sasih, sareng biasana tempatna dina lapangan nu paling sakedik legana 50 hektar.
mt: A World's Fair (also known as a World Exposition, or simply Expo) is a large international exhibition designed to celebrate cultural, industrial, or scientific progress. Countries participating in such expos usually build their own pavilions to exhibit their achievements. World Horticultural Expositions are a special type of World's Fair that focus on horticulture, botanical gardens, and related topics. Although such events are theoretically held every year (according to the guidelines of the Bureau of International Expositions), in practice they are held every three to six years, and are usually held in a different country each time. Such events usually last three to six months, and are usually held in a large park or other large open space.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Paméran Dunya (anu biasa disebut World Exposition, atanapi ngan saukur Expo) mangrupikeun paméran internasional seni sareng sains nu ageung. Nagara nu ngiringan nampilkeun penampilan seni sareng pendidikan di paviliun nasional pikeun nunjukeun masalah dunya atanapi budaya sareng sejarah nagara anjeunna. Paméran Internasional Hortikultural mangrupikeun acara husus anu nampilkeun paméran kembang, kebon botani, sareng hal-hal sanés anu aya hubunganna sareng pepelakan. Sanajan dina téori acara ieu tiasa lumangsung unggal taun (salami acaranana di nagara anu béda), dina praktékna henteu. Acara-acara modél kieu biasana jalan ti 3 ka 6 sasih, sareng biasana tempatna dina lapangan nu paling sakedik legana 50 hektar.
mt: A World's Fair (also known as a World Exposition, or simply Expo) is a large international exhibition designed to celebrate cultural, industrial, or scientific progress. Countries participating in such expos usually build their own pavilions to exhibit their achievements. World Horticultural Expositions are a special type of World's Fair that focus on horticulture, botanical gardens, and related topics. Although such events are theoretically held every year (according to the guidelines of the Bureau of International Expositions), in practice they are held every three to six years, and are usually held in a different country each time. Such events usually last three to six months, and are usually held in a large park or other large open space.
ref: A World's Fair (commonly called World Exposition, or simply Expo) is large international festival of arts and sciences. Participating countries present artistic and educational displays in national pavilions to showcase world issues or their country's culture and history. International Horticultural Expositions are specialised events which showcase floral displays, botanical gardens and anything else to do with plants. Although in theory they can take place annually (so long as they are in different countries), in practice they are not. These events normally last anywhere between three and six months, and are held on sites no smaller than 50 hectares.

src: Sanajan loba sato di kebon biasa ningal jelema, sato liar mah tetep wéh liar jadi ulah dibere dahar atanapi diganggu. Numutkeun pihak pangurus taman, jaga jarak sahenteuna 100 yard/méter tina biruang jeung serigala sareng 25 yard/méter tina sagala sato jarah anu séjén! Henteu paduli sakumaha lindeukna maranéhna katingali, bison, kijang, rusa angeung, biruang, sareng hampir kabéh sato badag bisa nyerang. Unggal taun, seueur pangunjung anu cilaka kumargi aranjeuna henteu ngajaga jarak anu dianjurkeun. Sasatoan ieu téh arageung, liar, sareng tiasa ngabahayakeun, janten pasihan jarak kanggo maranehna. Iwal ti éta, bewara upami bau tiasa mancing beruang jeung sasatoan liar lianna, janten tong nyandak kadaharan anu berbau jeung jaga kabersihan ténda.
mt: While most animals in the park are used to people, wild animals are still wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park officials, keep a distance of at least 100 yards from bears and wolves and 25 yards from all other large animals! No matter how cute they look, bison, deer, elk, bears, and almost all large animals can attack. Every year, many visitors are injured because they do not keep the recommended distance. This animal is wild, dangerous, and can be dangerous, so keep your distance. In addition, beware if you smell something that may attract bears and other wild animals, so keep your food and keep your campsite clean.
ref: Though many of the animals in the park are used to seeing humans, the wildlife is nonetheless wild and should not be fed or disturbed. According to park authorities, stay at least 100 yards/meters away from bears and wolves and 25 yards/meters from all other wild animals! No matter how docile they may look, bison, elk, moose, bears, and nearly all large animals can attack. Each year, dozens of visitors are injured because they didn't keep a proper distance. These animals are large, wild, and potentially dangerous, so give them their space. In addition, be aware that odors attract bears and other wildlife, so avoid carrying or cooking odorous foods and keep a clean camp.
